title: Ben Kay PREC
address: 1050 Howe St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1P5, Canada

reviews.name: Peter Birks
reviews.text: My partner and I are first time home buyers and we recently worked with Ben to successfully find our dream home. Ben completely exceeded my expectations on all fronts and we could not be happier with him.  He is incredibly kind, knowledgable, responsive, and hard working.  Ben helped us navigate a very difficult market in Vancouver, and seriously was our calming rock during the process.  He guided us through every step of the process and we always felt like we were in the best hands.  Ben worked tirelessly to help us a find our perfect home for an amazing price.  He would always take initiative to assure we never missed out on a viewing or a timely inspection.  He also had nice touches like his welcome package, his thoughtful emails, his prompt responses, and his pain free way of dealing with documents. I would highly recommend Ben to anyone looking for a home. He is the best!

reviews.name: Lindsey Porter
reviews.text:
My partner and I had the absolute pleasure of working with Ben during our recent house hunting journey as first time home buyers. Ben is incredibly professional, immensely warm and kind. He took the time to really get to know us and our evolving search criteria as we navigated a very challenging market. He was thoughtful, patient and extremely detail orientated. He is profoundly knowledgable and you could easily tell he was well respected amongst fellow real estate colleagues.

He never missed a beat and was so thorough always including every detail. Ben was always 100% transparent with us, which is something I found truly invaluable because I knew he would always provide us honesty. He is prompt and very timely. He created a safe space for us to feel we could contact him at any point with any questions. He always made us feel validated and immediately addressed any concerns we were having.

He truly went above and beyond to find us our amazing home. Ben worked tirelessly and did absolutely everything beyond just the sale of the house itself to make us feel so confident and happy with our purchase. His emails were my favourite thing to receive always. They were so well put together and easy to understand and follow. He truly walks you through the house buying experience from start to finish and I have nothing but AMAZING things to say about Ben.

We have already recommended him to all our friends and family and would HIGHLY recommend him without a doubt to anyone wishing to sell/purchase a home. He's the absolute best and we cannot wait to work with him again in the future.

reviews.name: Jessica Baker
reviews.text:
I was recommend Ben from a friend and I couldn't be happier with the service that he provided.
As first time buyers my partner and I had a number of questions and concerns but Ben guided us through the full process from start to finish. Ben answered all questions we had plus shared additional information that we never even thought to ask. Ben has a special skill in explaining things in a way that makes you understand everything.
Besides Ben's amazing communication skills he also never once made us feel any kind of pressure whatsoever. I would recommend Ben to anyone who is in the market!

reviews.name: Julia Kozlov
reviews.text: We recently worked with Ben as our realtor to purchase our very first home (a condo)! As first time homebuyer, he made our journey and the entire experience super smooth. We highly appreciated Ben's knowledge and diligence in gathering and reviewing all building and unit related documents. He saved us a lot of work and was able to flag critical issues with us! His due process in catching possible issues in the unit was also invaluable. Overall, Ben is a pleasure to work with! He makes the first time purchasing process exciting and not scary or gruesome! His communication skills are excellent, he is flexible, his process is well thought out and we appreciated all the little touches like his Welcome box :) We highly recommend Ben as your condo realtor any day and we can't wait to work with him again in the future!

reviews.name: Mike Klemarewski
reviews.text:
This was my first time buying a home, and working with Ben was fantastic. He did a great job making sure I understood what the whole process was going to look like from the start all the way to completion.

Ben is great at getting to know you and understanding what you are looking for in a home. After an initial meeting and then looking at a couple of places, Ben knew what kind of places I would fit my taste going forward.

I never felt pressured by Ben. He is very friendly, kind, and you know he is working to find the best home for you. Purchasing a home for the first time is intimidating, and it was amazing to have someone so supportive helping me out.

I would work with Ben again in a heartbeat.

reviews.name: Steve Bridgewater
reviews.text:
Ben was recommended to me via friends, and now I too will be recommending him to others searching for a new home.

I found Ben's service to be outstanding in all areas relating to our search and subsequent purchase of a new apartment in Lower Lonsdale. In particular his attention to detail, deep knowledge of markets and thoughtful advice around the many considerations involved in making significant life decisions mean he stands out as a real professional.

A careful listener, Ben at no point pushed us in any direction, but was also entirely willing to tactfully speak his mind and tell us exactly what he thought about a property, and our own ideas. We found this to be a perfect combination. At all times he was responsive and available when we needed him, and we found the eventual buying process to be swift, focused, and professional.

Steve Bridgewater

reviews.name: Matt Spence
reviews.text: It was a pleasure working with Ben.  As new home buyers we had a lot of questions and concerns, but Ben walked us through the process step by step.  He was very patient, professional, and ultimately  helped us find a lovely home at a great price.  We highly recommend him to anyone, especially first time home buyers!

reviews.name: Alena Maisenovich
reviews.text: Ben is exceptional! Always on your side, super knowledgeable in real estate business and happy to provide a piece of advice in the most intelligent, patient and positive manner. We can't stress enough how happy we were to work with him and we are looking forward to cooperate in future!

reviews.name: Reid Poyntz
reviews.text: My Partner and I had an excellent experience working with Ben. Ben took the time to understand what we needed in a property and helped us to explore the different options that would meet those needs.  This process made us feel very secure in our final decision. Ben's excellent communication skills and limitless patience were key assets as he guided us through the home buying process. As first time buyers this was invaluable.  Ben knows the market well and does his research before we would view a property together. This allowed us to gain a lot of knowledge about each area we investigated and, in the end, helped to guide our choices. We highly recommend Ben and would not hesitate to work with him again.

reviews.name: Arman S.
reviews.text:
Ben helped us buy a home and I really enjoyed working with him on a personal and professional level. From start to finish, Ben has always been very helpful and made sure we had all the information we need. He guided us through the entire process, offering his insight and advice along the way, being thorough and never rushing through anything. He was always one step ahead and ensured we were aware of what the next steps are. Any questions, Ben would help us find the answers as soon as possible. The whole experience was made simple thanks to Ben's preparation and communication at every step.

You can tell Ben is really passionate about his work, loves what he does, and has your best interests at heart. Thank you Ben for your help! We really appreciate it!

reviews.name: Gabrielle McEwen
reviews.text: As first home buyers, my partner and I have nothing but great things to say about Ben. From our first meeting, right through to our completion date, and weeks after, Ben was thorough, knowledgeable, and professional. He took the time to get to know us, and really got a feel for what we would need in a space. He was patient and thorough in explaining every detail to us along every step of the way. He was quick to respond, any day of the week. We feel he went above and beyond his responsibilities; he checked in with us often to make sure everything else was getting arranged for the purchase and move, and he did a thorough walk through of the suite upon completion, notifying us of any flaws and how to follow up with the developer, etc. You are in great hands when you work with Ben!

reviews.name: Megan Ritchie
reviews.text: Ben made me feel confident throughout the entire process of buying my first home. It was my first time buying and Ben took the time to explain every part of the process and share his extensive knowledge of the market. He shared all of this information in an understandable and informative way that helped me guide my decision making. I always felt like he had my best interests in mind and truly took the time to understand what I was looking for. He was never pushy and always gave me time and space to come to my decisions. He was extremely professional and very detail-oriented. He went above and beyond in the services that he provided. I wish Ben could give me step by step instructions and advice on every area of my life!

reviews.name: Cecillia Lescano
reviews.text: Ben Kay really delivers an exceptional home purchase experience when it comes to knowing the market, doing his homework on properties and looking out for the best interest of his clients. I found him to be tremendously helpful with getting answers to my questions—no matter how small—and most importantly, having a deep understanding of what I was looking for and honing in on the right properties. From first meet to completion, expect a differentiated end-to-end experience. Can’t recommend Ben enough.

reviews.name: Jordanna Kapeluto
reviews.text: Ben was patient and listened to exactly what we were hoping for in a home. When we found the “right one” he guided us through the process and made the experience stress free. We love our new home but if we are ever looking again we would call Ben without hesitation!

reviews.name: Robert Koby
reviews.text: My experience in dealing with Ben for the sale of a condo was excellent on all levels.  He was professional and always promp in his communications. When I initially reached out through his web site he got back to me quickly, and at a meeting provided me with the all the information I needed to make a decision about listing and pricing the condo. I felt no pressure to list. When the condo was listed he was thoughtful and courteous when dealing with my daughter and her family who were living there.  The condo sold within a week due in good part to Ben's realistic pricing and thorough preparation. He has been a pleasure to work with and I will have no problem recommending his services or engaging him again should the need arise.

reviews.name: Anca Mateescu
reviews.text: Thank you Ben for the fact you made the processes of sealing my condo and buying my little house, so easy. Your attention to details and professionalism  exceeded my expectations and made me to feel relaxed while this happened. Amazing work !!!

reviews.name: Fergus To
reviews.text: What a fantastic experience.  Thank you Ben for everything.  He got us exactly what we wanted including a competitive house in Vancouver on our first attempt at an offer.  It was a stress free process from start to finish.

reviews.name: Cherry Xu
reviews.text: Ben is one of the hardest working, kindest and professional realtors I know. I am most impressed by his diligence on really understanding his clients and their needs, and delivering specifically to them. He knows the market like the back of his hand - and has a reputation for this skill. For these and many other reasons, Ben has earned my highest recommendation. I have not yet purchased a home, but when I do Ben will be the first person I call!

reviews.name: Nancy Frappier
reviews.text:
We can't say enough good things about Ben, he was fantastic to work with.  As first time home buyers our friends and family warned us about how much work it could be but Ben made it so easy for us.  He was incredibly professional and never made us feel pressured into making a decision however he would always give us his honest opinion when we asked for it.

From the first meeting to the final signing of papers he kept us in the loop and always made us feel that no request was too big.  In addition to this Ben's connections in the industry made the process even easier as he was able to provide some great recommendations for other professionals needed during the process.

We would feel confident in recommending Ben to anyone we know as we can be sure he would extend this same level of caring & professionalism to anyone lucky enough to work with him.

reviews.name: Paul Friesen
reviews.text: I have worked with Ben on several real estate deals. I am very impressed with his attention to detail, professionalism, and thoroughness. He works for his buyers to the fullest of his extent and always goes above and beyond the minimum expectations. As a professional home inspector in the industry it’s always a pleasure to help him and his buyers. He does  what it takes to do the job right the first time. Keep up the good work Ben!

reviews.name: Kami Sohal
reviews.text:
Where do I even start?  Buying and selling a home are equally nerve wrecking.   I woke up one day and decided I wanted to sell my condo.  I had no idea what to do or where to begin.  I contacted Ben and he brought over this fabulous book that he had made himself which answered every single question I had.  He made the selling process so easy for me that all I had to do was make sure I wasn't home.  He staged my place, he ensured it was left they way I had left it, and was an absolute delight to work with.  He answered my questions right away and if he didn't have the answer, he made sure he got me one as soon as he could.
He helped buy my second home and was with me every step of the way.  There were a few delays but he made sure that he contacted everyone and that he was always ahead of the game.  I have now moved into my home and it would not have been possible without him.  Ben is professional, organized, and knowledgeable.  He made me feel like this was an easy process while he did all the behind the scenes work.  If I was to every buy and sell again, he would be the only person I call.

reviews.name: A Leung
reviews.text:
It has been an absolute pleasure having Ben as my realtor. As a first time home-buyer there was much for me to learn; Ben's experience and knowledge was invaluable, and he delivered all answers with patience and precision. His calm demeanor and professionalism ensured that I put my best foot forward and ultimately ascertain my goal of home ownership.

The process was surprisingly smooth, and I appreciated how taken-care of I felt with his thoroughness. Jumping forward, I can safely say I have made the right choice for me, in terms of the area and space; a big part of this is due to Ben's process.

reviews.name: Michaela Lee
reviews.text: Ben definitely went above and beyond. Ben's excellence is solid and consistent. As a first time home buyer, I really couldn’t be happier that I found Ben. In a sellers market with less inventory, it is too difficult for a buyer to get the right home at the right price. Ben knows about real estate very well and what to look for in a house. He took care of the entire process – finding the right home, getting the right inspectors, helping me understand about the real estate process, etc. He responds very quickly and is very reliable. He is friendly, calm, and understands the needs of the client really well. With Ben, I never felt any kind of pressure to buy home. Even after I got the keys, Ben has been in touch and assured for help for any guidance or information. I would definitely work with him for any future real estate needs!!

reviews.name: Rajit Mittal
reviews.text: I cannot say enough about Ben, both as a real estate agent and a person. The Vancouver condo market is daunting, even for a reasonably sophisticated person. Ben's calm demeanor and organization were critical in my over two and a half month search for the perfect property. His knowledge of the market is unsurpassed, as evidenced by other agents actively listening and asking questions when Ben would describe development in the area surrounding any given property. Ben's market analysis is spot on and his knowledge of buildings is encyclopaedic. Most importantly, however, it's his patience and desire to understand his clients that is most appealing. He's a great agent and a great person. I don't think there's more you can ask for.

reviews.name: Srdjan Popadic
reviews.text: We were extremely pleased with Ben's service and expertise for the recent sale of our property. From the initial meeting, everything was made clear and great advice was given in relation to all aspect of the sale such as pricing, when to put it on the market, staging and more. Ben was thoroughly efficient and proactive in helping things run smoothly behind the scenes for us. When you work with Ben you are working with a dedicated professional who will make sure you are going through the selling process with ease and care. I would recommend Ben without hesitation.

reviews.name: Alice Wei
reviews.text: It has been an absolute pleasure working with Ben as our realtor. Our search for a new home seemed daunting in this challenging Vancouver market, but Ben was incredibly supportive along every step of the way. Ben's excellent market expertise, calm demeanor and cheerful attitude helped us through the thick and thin of multiple competitive offers and ultimately resulted in helping us find our perfect home. Though he may look young, Ben is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about his job and putting his clients first. We cannot thank him enough and would highly recommend Ben as an agent to others searching for a new home!

reviews.name: Nat O
reviews.text:
Ben truly went above and beyond when we had some issues with our previous owners. He did not back down and ensured we were satisfied.

Ben is very knowledgable of the real estate market. He is very thorough, reliable and connected with his clients. He is truly dedicated to his profession and you can tell he has a real passion in helping people find the right home.

He is all you could ask for in a real estate agent. Very hard to find nowadays!

reviews.name: Samara Hurley
reviews.text: When we relocated from the United States to Canada for work, we were overwhelmed.  Our company that moved us did not educate us on what needed to be done for immigration, schools and neighborhoods properly.  We found Ben Kay and he was more than an incredible agent.  Yes, he helped us find the perfect condo in Coal Harbour and was professional during the entire process.  But, we felt pampered with knowledge of the strange city were were about to call home.  I told Ben on the day we signed for our condo that once he is no longer our condo agent, I will make sure he becomes our good friend.   And, that he is.  I highly recommend Ben Kay for your real estate needs.

reviews.name: Ed DaSilva
reviews.text: Ben really took the time to get to know us personally, and to understand our wants and needs in finding our first home. His approach to educating us on the market and strategies for achieving our purchase was honest and refreshing. We put our trust in Ben and he went above and beyond on his end, so that we could just enjoy the process in finding the right place for us. We are really happy with the decision we made and would not have felt so confident in it without Ben's guidance. We would readily and have already actually referred Ben to others.

reviews.name: Meghan Grant
reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about Ben. He made this busy, stressful time so much easier. Ben handled our evolving requirements and budget over the past couple months with patience and care, and showed us so many properties until we found one we loved! He is organized, attentive, knowledgeable, trustworthy, professional, and just plain FUN. We enjoyed every minute working with Ben and will recommend him to anyone.

reviews.name: Shay Klempner
reviews.text: Ben Kay and his team were a real pleasure to deal with on my first home purchase. Having no prior experience with buying a condo I was a bit reluctant at first, but Ben assured me that everything will be just alright. And it was! And it still is! Thank you  Ben for making sure I got the condo of my dreams. I highly recommend his services to any one looking to acquire their next piece of real estate!

reviews.name: Marlene Buckler
reviews.text:
To All of Ben's Potential Clients:
I am thrilled to recommend Ben Kay of MacDonald's Realty as your realtor.
Thank you so much Ben for your professionalism, expansive knowledge of the market, diligence and hard work when representing us throughout the entire bidding 'war' when trying to buy an abode in Vancouver.  And hard work it is for all!
I have had the pleasure of dealing with Ben (long-distance) for the past 7- months.  During the entire process, and now yours,  I can guarantee he will be at your side guiding you every step of the way with his patience, his daily emails with his hand-picked listings to suit you, and never failing to answer a query day or night.  Ultimately, my Vancouver Island raised husband Mike,  and I,  acquired a beautiful condo for our retirement in a few years.
I think what really makes Ben stand out is his unbridled drive and enthusiasm along with his determination in making sure we had the right  condo, mortgage broker,  insurance provider, lawyer and rental agent to finish off the job without a hitch.  And just to mention, maybe most importantly,  he makes it obvious that he loves  what he does.  Thank you again Ben.  Best Regards,  Marlene and Mike, 03/14/16

reviews.name: Iha Farquhar Hayer
reviews.text: I bought my first condo this year.  I am not going to lie; at first buying my first home seemed a tiny bit overwhelming. However, once I connected with Ben and he became my agent, he helped me navigate the process with ease and confidence! I couldn’t have imagines a more professional, available, responsible realtor than Ben! I would recommend Ben Kay to anyone that is looking for a realtor guide with integrity, who is knowledgeable about the industry and products, and that will listen to and value your needs and find your absolute best fit because he prides himself on customer satisfaction. Period.

reviews.name: Julia Kozlov
reviews.text:
I've had the great pleasure of working with Ben for several years and hands down - I can't recommend anyone better to have as your realtor whether you are buying or selling in Metro Vancouver! His level of expertise, knowledge of the market and understanding of great investment properties is what makes him a great fit for any individual or family who is seeking to buy or sell a home!

Ben's careful attention to detail, care for his clients and the extra mile he goes to make sure you are happy is just a cherry on top!

reviews.name: Mitra Sar
reviews.text: It has been a pleasurable experience for me to work with Ben Kay! He is caring, resource full, knowledgeable and precise in every step of purchasing a property from showing, to inspecting and closing! It has been a surprise to see his detailed statistics and great overview of the condo market! He has been available to answer my questions in detail and with patience every time! M. Zebarjadi

reviews.name: Stephen Urysz
reviews.text: Ben was very attentive and easy to work with, well informed and always had answers to my questions at the ready. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him to my friends and family!

reviews.name: Danielle Jeal
reviews.text:
Over asking in ONE DAY!! Ben Kay's hard work, diligence and authentic
caring about his clients came through ten fold. He took wonderful care of us and made sure everyone was happy. We are truly grateful we chose to use Ben. We had been listed for close to 6 months with another broker and had not received any real offers. ONE DAY with Ben and we are SOLD!!

reviews.name: Sandy Klempner
reviews.text: "Ridiculously good at what he does" is the phrase that comes to mind when I think of Ben. My husband and I had the pleasure of working with Ben when we decided to downsize last year. Ben helped us sell our family home in Kerrisdale and buy a condominium in Coal Harbour (which we love!). We were particularly impressed by the amount of knowledge and experience he has of what is happening in the city, where the best areas are for our needs and the best types of apartments to look out for. We still miss his regular daily updates during our search! As a patient, knowledgeable, true professional, Ben earns our highest recommendation!

reviews.name: Jens Christiansen
reviews.text: Ben could have sold me the first property I liked, but instead he helped me avoid many unsuitable condos before I found one that I absolutely loved! His integrity was refreshing, and he was also patient, clever, and creative when it came to helping me bid on places. I would highly recommend Ben.

reviews.name: David Fairbairn
reviews.text: I've done several deals with Ben and he's top-notch. He is meticulous and crosses every "t". For condos he always goes through the building's history and raises any issues ahead of time so the buyer has full knowledge of what they are getting into. 10/10!

reviews.name: Heidi Kwok
reviews.text: Ben is awesome! He was very resourceful and patient. He was able to walk me through and guide me during each stage of my purchasing process from showing until closing. He did a lot of research and showed me different condos for me to compare. Without his persistence and hard work, I would not have gotten my favorite condo.

reviews.name: Julien Sanmartin
reviews.text: Ben has a unique ability in making his clients feel good! His calm and patient demeanour puts his clients at ease, while his evident experience, vast knowledge and thorough negotiation skills reassures that his clients are getting the highest and best result of whatever their real estate endeavours are. We were most impressed with his digital marketing strategy. It is obvious that Ben is passionate about his work, and it shows in the results that transpire. We recommend Ben Kay to anyone who is looking to buy or sell a Vancouver area condo. You cannot afford not calling him!

reviews.name: Markus Lee
reviews.text: My parents and I sold our downtown condo with Ben last year, he was fantastic to work with. His quick responsiveness, constant communication and incredible knowledge and tips made our experience in selling so wonderful. His marketing plan for us was completely custom tailored to our unique apartment at the time, and he was able to negotiate a record price! Definitely sharing his name with anyone who is looking for a great Vancouver realtor :)

reviews.name: Nele P
reviews.text: Ben is extremely knowledgeable, professional and focused on his customers! He made me feel comfortable and dealing with him was a very positive and pleasant experience. I can not recommend him enough and can only hope that others with learn from people like Ben!

reviews.name: Penny Kavanagh
reviews.text: "I have had the pleasure of coaching Ben Kay. Ben is a real professional realtor with extensive knowledge of the Vancouver condo market. He is savvy on the internet, giving his sellers optimum exposure. He is passionate about his clients and relentless in getting top dollar for sellers and best condo gems for his buyers. I would highly recommend Ben to anyone looking to sell or buy a condo in the hot Vancouver market."

reviews.name: Marianna Galstyan
reviews.text: Ben came highly recommended by a friend. Our first impression - he's so young! But a few minutes with him made us realize that he's exactly what we needed - knowledgable, connected, persistent, but never pushy, and wise beyond his age. After 7 months of looking for our perfect condo, we finally found the one that fit us the best. And through this process Ben was there to educate, to listen, and to guide. He took his time with us and never rushed - always provided detailed explanations to any question we had - from basic to the really complex. He is very meticulous in going through all the strata paperwork, which I can't say about many other realtors - Ben saved us a huge headache in potentially purchasing a condo in a building with a hidden structural problem. With Ben it's never about earning a commission - we knew that he had our best interest in mind at all times, even if it meant withdrawing our bid. Our experience with Ben was above and beyond what we expected, and he made our dream of owning our home a reality! Forever grateful!

reviews.name: Fan Wang
reviews.text: I highly recommend Ben. He is incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and diligent. He is not your average realtor. He made the whole process so easy and stress free. He screened out the properties that he thinks problematic and that set my mind at ease. I could not recommend him enough.

reviews.name: Osiria B
reviews.text: Ben's experience and deep vested knowledge of the Downtown Vancouver core has been absolutely instrumental in the buying process. If you're looking for a professional and knowledgeable downtown realtor, I would highly recommend Ben!

reviews.name: Eitan Pinsky
reviews.text: Ben is one of the most diligent and on-the-ball realtors I know. As a mortgage broker who has had dealings with hundreds of realtors in my career, Ben stands out as one of the shining stars in the industry. His attention to detail, smarts and honesty make him invaluable for your home selling and purchasing needs. I would give prospective clients two pieces of advice: check out his marketing material and meet Ben... doing those two will speak for themselves.

reviews.name: David Marasigan
reviews.text: I used him for buying my first condo and it was a great experience! He was able to get me all the information I needed quickly and provided follow ups and great advice.  Highly recommended!!

reviews.name: Philipp Abromeit
reviews.text: I really enjoyed working with Ben while looking for a condo. His diligence and knowledge helped greatly with the process. He was always straight to the point and easy to deal with.

reviews.name: Shali Tark
reviews.text: Ben is very patient, and fun to work with. He is always willing to go the extra mile and his love for the industry shows in how Ben communicates not just with his clients, but also his peers and other members of the industry. He always stays on top of the new developments and getting exclusive opportunities for his clients for pre sales as well. I feel 100% confidence in referring Ben to any of my clients looking for Vancouver Downtown condos. Shali Tark

title: Advent Real Estate Services Ltd.
address: 1168 Hamilton St #204, Vancouver, BC V6B 2S2, Canada

reviews.name: Wesley Berrenger
reviews.text: Advent takes exceptional care of my condo rental. They found a great tenant and ensure that everything is maintained cost effectively. The rent is collected and paid to me like clockwork. At one point I forgot I owned an investment property as Advent does an amazing job of managing it for me. Top quality services, they are 100% recommended!

reviews.name: Brendan Pan
reviews.text: Jason was very helpful throughout the viewing process. He knows the building well and the neighbourhood as well. Also offered to let us view similar suites and other amenities that is in the building. We hope our offer for the rental will go through.

reviews.name: Caitlyn NK
reviews.text:
This company was great until there was issues between the neighbors. The lack of response from the manager has led the issues to escalate. Normally I don't go out of my way to write bad reviews but I feel I should share my experience here, as I often look to reviews myself and I had read the reviews on Advent before renting from them and liked what I saw. Also before I go further, I will expect to get a reply saying "call the office" or denying that there are any issues, as has come with all the other negative reviews on here. I am renting a basement suite from them on a property that has another basement suite , a laneway and a four bedroom space upstairs.
The complaints my neighbors and I have had had been fair requests that were outlined in our agreement. There's been an unreasonable amount of noise all through the night from other tenants, garbage in our yard and the alley that has been left by them, not to mention a few weeks of dog poop left in our section of the yard when they have a full front yard to themselves. The sound and garbage issues have been happening for over 2 months.
These issues have been brought to advent's notice time and time again and it gets pushed off with comments such as "I've left a voicemail with the other tenants", even ignoring of texts and emails from more than one person. It's a shame because it has been fine otherwise. I would recommend them if you're sure you will have no problems of respecting parts of your contract from other neighbors or any sort of disrespect. Otherwise, it's upsetting and frustrating how they push the issue around, I'm assuming that they're expecting us to give up. I don't appreciate being woken up by other neighbors multiple nights and by their smoke alarms going off and taking my recycling out to find all sorts of garbage just dumped out there and blown around the yard. As mentioned, if the issues had been properly taken care of and there was some sort of enforcement of management with Advent, I don't think these would have escalated. This morning our power was out because Advent didn't care to discuss the change with BC Hydro when they took over the property and I missed an important meeting and as a result lost money.
Again I don't like to go out of my way to write such negative reviews, but I wanted to share this information as I feel such disrespect and lack of care from Advent. It could be our assigned property manager specifically, but in that case it reflects on the company.
Peace.

**RESPONSE TO OWNER'S REPLY BELOW**
Thank you for the thorough reply.
A few items to consider, I am aware that smoke alarms are for safety. The smoke alarms were going off at 4am, 3am, mine were replaced recently so I assume it was due to being wired to the ones upstairs.
Jason told me that one notice was sent, and he had told me that information after this review was posted that it was sent a few days ago.
The garbage has been blown around in the yard, there was a bag left in front of my front door, plastic all in the compost multiple times. I was not notified that a new bin was ordered and I'm glad to hear it. Although there could be a millions trash cans added it won't help the lack of sorting, the general mess and the garbage left around the lane and our yard by the other tenants.

"Efficiently" is one way to put your response time as the loud noises and garbage has been happening since beginning February 2021.
I have no reason to take time to write this review if it wasn't true. I am frustrated with the lack of care from Advent and this is why I'm sharing.

reviews.name: EJ R
reviews.text:
I've been meaning to send this review for a while now and finally getting around to it.

Honestly my process finding a rental placement agency was painful at first. The majority of companies I contacted, didn't call back or took days to get back to me? When they got back to me, the interactions didn't inspire confidence.

After calling 7 companies, I called Advent. Within a day, I spoke to a friendly secretary. She addressed my needs and after, connected me to Jason Wong. From the first call, I noticed he was knowledgeable and an effective listener. He plugged the right questions when needed, giving good advice. During our first face to face meeting, Jason was pro!Efficient with time management, he wasted no time. He handled taking photos, posting the listing promptly, handling tenant screenings, and  going on site for tenant viewings. After each viewing, Jason called to report how it went. After a few viewing we setup a meeting with two interested parties. After followup and approval we moved forward to with a 1 year lease.

Biggest thing for me is Jason  Understood my tight deadline to rent, due to leaving the country. He went the extra mile finding me and excellent tenants in the 11th hour! 👏

It been a year plus and I'm very happy with how everything turned out. It worked out so well I referred Jason to my business partners who had the same excellent experience.

reviews.name: Sally Van Holden
reviews.text: Quality tenants, rents paid on time and good customer service. Worth every penny and highly recommended.

reviews.name: Youss OuaisBon
reviews.text: Monika is great and helped us to get our new apartment.She is great and recommend her. Good job and thanks again, we are happy with the apartment.

reviews.name: Owen Alexander
reviews.text: I have been working with the Property Managers at advent for over a decade now, they manage my investment condos at the River District and the Olympic Village. They placed good tenants and they go out of their way to maintain a good relationship with them, they give me updates when any expensive repairs need to be done and give me peace of mind every step of the way. Any time I have had a problem it has been quickly resolved. The rate that they charge for full management is very competitive and they are worth it. Thank you Michelle and staff

reviews.name: Jagdeep T
reviews.text: The go to people for condo management. Highly rated in my opinion. My tenants have been first class and the service is most professional.

reviews.name: Manda Harris
reviews.text: Highly recommended for managing properties. They've been around for a long time and know the industry inside out. Tenancy experts! Staff with integrity!

reviews.name: Cal Loren
reviews.text:
I was shopping around for Property Management companies as I had a bad experience with a realtor that placed a terrible tenant in my property, so I figured it was time to use the services of licensed professionals instead.

I ended up getting a referral from a friend who’s been with Advent for a while. I was impressed by the knowledge and professionalism of my property manager and even more impressed by the efficiency in placing a tenant. There is a night and day difference in using Advent vs using a realtor that is a 1 man show with no support staff.

I recommend using Advent’s services with no hesitation. They give me peace of mind and also have a lot of experience with the residential tenancy act.

reviews.name: Jacob Wu
reviews.text: Michelle and her team have managed my rental properties for the last 14 years, and I can say with no question that they are the right people for the job. Michelle has an in-depth knowledge of the rental markets and the residential tenancy act which gives me a lot of peace of mind. It’s good to know my properties are in safe hands. Call them for all your rental needs, they will make your life easier.

reviews.name: Marvin Gee
reviews.text: If you’re buying an investment property there’s only one company to call to rent it for you, and that’s Advent. They’ve been around for a long time and have the best reputation. The tenants they place are great and the support staff in their office are helpful and friendly.

reviews.name: Arthur Gifford
reviews.text: A property management team that can be trusted to get the job done right! Professional management at the right price. Top of the list for managing tenancies!

reviews.name: Yasmin Turle
reviews.text: I rented my home from Advent years ago and they’ve been excellent landlords - they always take care of the repairs and seem to run an efficient ship. No complaints here. I would recommend their services to other tenants and landlords.

reviews.name: Jeannie Kong
reviews.text:
Been very happy with the service they provided me for over 3 years however the Covid-19 pandemic sure caused an hiccup but what a service recovery.

Thanks so much Jason for your patience with my long winded feedback and wow Liz, I so appreciate you calling me to listen further, discuss options and in less than 10 days, you rented out both suites! I am amazed how fast you both responded and restored my confidence in your company.   Thank you!  I will have another suite that will be available soon and will be reaching out to you Liz!

reviews.name: Todd Farina
reviews.text:
We have several properties managed by Advent, the team is very responsive to our requests, and the communication is great. They have many systems in place to insure that our properties are occupied by quality clients/tenants. We feel that we are well looked after and as we bring on more properties we will turn the keys over to Advent. Their fees are very reasonable and well worth the peace of mind.

Thank you Team Advent

reviews.name: Elaine Siu
reviews.text:
I have left a lot of google reviews in the past but none like this where I feel an obligation to share my experience with Advent as a warning to others. As a property owner who was shopping around for property management companies to hand off my property to, I found Advent to be very unprofessional and rude. They also tried to convince me to be willing to rent my place out for much less than what it is worth. From scrolling through other people’s reviews, I notice the owner responds to most negative comments with either telling people to ignore the defamation or that the reviewer does not exist in their system; hence, I am providing a very detailed review of my personal interactions with Advent.

I have a 1 bedroom + den (650 sqft) around Broadway/Commercial that I was looking to rent out and was considering handing it over to a property management company. I spoke with an Advent employee in Business Development at the end of Aug-2020 (I have records of who it was but I will not name her in this review). The conversation started out fine, until I asked how much she thinks my apartment can be rented out for. She said they usually do not provide this information without taking a look at the place first. I told her one of my deciding factors of whether I want to hand it off to a property management company was how much they might list it for because an assessor from the bank had given me a rental estimate. She asked how much it was assessed at and when I responded with $2100, she suddenly got very hostile and aggressive, saying I will not get more than $1700-800 for my apartment. She said she is quite annoyed because assessors should not be giving clients false information and false expectations because it makes her job harder and that the assessors do not know what they are doing and are not licensed like she is. She went on to say that for $2100, people can get a similar place in downtown so why would anyone want to rent around Broadway/Commercial when they can be in downtown (for someone that keeps mentioning they are licensed and is an expert in this field, she did not seem to realize not everyone wanted to live downtown). She went on to ask how they came up with such an absurd number and I said the assessor pulled rental ads from nearby similar properties and that the 1 bedroom in the rental building next to mines has it listed up to $2300. She got more agitated and ranted about how that is not the proper way to set a rental price. She continued to tell me $2100 was an unreasonable ask by saying the brand new low rise nearby (name The Victoria) has 1 bedrooms for $1800 and asked why would people pay more for something that is similar to mine but is brand new. She then went on to pull up the rental listings at The Victoria to try to prove her point …  I did as well and we saw that for $1800, it was a 450 sqft studio she was trying to compare mines to. At that point, I felt like I was talking to a novice with a poor attitude so I thanked her for her time and hung up. While shopping around for a property management company, I posted my apartment for the $2100 and had multiple applications for it. I ended up renting it out at $2100 within 2 weeks of this incident. Most other property management companies I spoke to said my place can rent for $2100-2300 and were very professional. I personally would have gone with Birds Nest Properties if I didn’t find a tenant by Oct. I highly recommend all owners to get an idea of what their rental property can go for before speaking to Advent because my feeling of them is that they are a volume business and their goal is to rent out your place as quickly as possible so they can start collecting the 8% monthly fee and that they do not care about getting the best rent they can for the owners. A $300 difference in rent is ~$300 more for the owners, but 8% of $300 is just $24 more for them.

reviews.name: Nick
reviews.text:
We received nothing but great service and professionalism.

We had some terrible tenants that were unresponsive, difficult, rude, etc. The property manager has handled and is still handling the situation with back charges for bylaw fines that were issued by strata due to the tenants lack of responsibility.

We feel the property manager went above and beyond to help us through this difficult process. We highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Paymon K
reviews.text: It’s a good thing for companies like Advent that are here to protect home owners from bad tenants, I would have been lost without the experience and expertise of my property manager. They’re the right people to use for management services for sure. I wish I’d used them from the get go instead of placing my own tenants - it would have saved me a lot of hassle. Definitely recommend using them.

reviews.name: Kay Woodward
reviews.text: Highly rated property managers! Licensed, experienced, responsive and professional.

reviews.name: christina knox
reviews.text: Monika was fantastic and went the extra mile for us.

reviews.name: Ricky Diamond Glass
reviews.text: One of the worst rent management company to deal with. You don’t get receipt for any charges they invoice. They are not responsive and very terrible service. I don’t recommend!

reviews.name: Pia Espiritu
reviews.text:
One of my friends rents here, and my company also works with Advent as cleaners for some of their listings.  Their agents in field and staff in office are always so pleasant and easy to communicate with!  We highly recommend them!

- Life Maid Easy

reviews.name: Cathy Ling
reviews.text: The service used to be good, but my most recent experience has been very poor. Lack of communication. Got pushed back and forth between multiple agents. Not attentive to property condition.

reviews.name: Denny Villeneuve
reviews.text: I rented an apartment with Advent over 3 years ago, I recently moved out and can say undoubtedly that I would rent from them again and would recommend their services to home owners too. They were accommodating for all of my service requests, when anything broke they fixed it quickly, when I lost my keys they helped me out with the Locksmith scheduling and more.  If I owned a property I wouldn’t hesitate to rent it with Advent because I know they pay close attention to detail and actually “manage“ their rentals as you’d expect a professional company to do. Thumbs up! Thank you so much guys.

reviews.name: Ed
reviews.text: Rentwithadvent website is useless. No response from any viewing application for ads that are still up. If the rental ads are no longer valid look to remove them or automatically reply to people that it's not available otherwise your wasting people's time and shows unprofessionalism.

reviews.name: Mohsen Hajiabadi
reviews.text:
I worked with Michelle and her team to rent my home and really can’t say enough good things about . they are knowledgeable, approachable, personable, endlessly patient.they answered every question and explained every form and every part of the process in order make agreement clearly and thoroughly. real estate market is challenging, but working with ADVENT made it as painless and straightforward as possible.
Especial thanks again to Michelle & Donald.
I highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Anna Pederson
reviews.text: I got value for money with the professionals at Advent, especially given today’s market. I’d be lost without their expertise. They placed excellent tenants in my rental property at a good rate.

reviews.name: Ben Webster
reviews.text: Emails took 3+ days to answer and when I called the office to understand what the communication issue was, I was told tenants are a dime a dozen and I did not matter. After applying for an apartment that we loved, in which I had a wonderful 45-minute positive conversation with the landlord, the agent told us the application was denied by the owner. After contacting the landlord to see what we could improve, the landlord informed us the agency had denied the application. From the start, I had a hunch the agency didn't like us due to my diligence and interest in the apartment but never did I think they would deny the application. I truly believe the application was great and the apartment was a great fit for the landlord and for us. Very disappointed in the unprofessionalism of the company and how they have dealt with this process. I expect a rental agency to streamline the process for the landlord and tenants and Advent only got in the way of that.

reviews.name: Josh Gubert
reviews.text: Very knowledgeable and determined to help find qualified renters with expertise in marketing and showcasing. With my busy work schedule advent had took the stress of finding renters and going through the background checks and showings. Special thanks to Liz and Jamie for all the help! I highly recommend Advent.

reviews.name: Dan Menzies
reviews.text: The Advent team is the best choice for your property management needs. Advent is the go to company if you want no headaches.

reviews.name: Sarah Samuel
reviews.text: Michelle Farina is one of the best brokers in the business! I'm so thankful that she's always a phone call away for anything related to rental management contracts and tenancies. Peace of mind guaranteed with her knowledge and expertise. I always refer my clients to Advent as I trust Michelle's team, with her foundation.

reviews.name: Joey Sidhu
reviews.text:
My partner and I contacted Advent about viewing an apartment. For the first one we confirmed the viewing but the property manager missed our email while they were away on holidays, understandable. So we rebooked for later in the day, and everything was great. The second apartment viewing was rescheduled due to snow, again understandable. However the property manager never contacted us to reschedule despite multiple emails from both myself and my partner. Finally the third apartment viewing was booked and confirmed, but the property manager never showed up. I waited for 45 minutes, called them, texted them, and emailed them but received no reply. I called the office to speak to a manager, was told that they would look into it and get back to us, but have yet to hear back from them 2 weeks later. I understand that tenants aren't their clients, especially in Vancouver's competitive rental climate where tenants are often dismissed, but failing to show up and not following up is very unprofessional. We have found better luck with more responsive property management companies and will be reluctant to trust Advent moving forward.

Edit: The property manager followed up apologizing for the misunderstandings, and mentioned new options for rentals available, but at this point my partner and I had found an apartment. I'm leaving this review up as is because while they had contacted me to rectify the situation, it was too late at that point and it does not address the previous experience with them.

reviews.name: Rose Marten
reviews.text: Professional condo management at its best. I recommend to all rental property owners with no hesitation.

reviews.name: Mike Li
reviews.text: Proactive and well educated property managers that are always there when I need them. The staff at Advent have been awesome, they know the industry well. Would recommend for sure!

reviews.name: William Zhou
reviews.text: The team at Advent place quality tenants at a reasonable rate. They excel at solving problems with tenancies and take the stress away from me and my husband whilst we’re out of country. I’ve been with them for years and have nothing but good things to say about them. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Rina Jeyakumar
reviews.text: Great service and results!

reviews.name: Wai Lee
reviews.text: Advent is a good company to rent with, I have been renting with them for years. The people in the service department are quick to reply and courteous when I contact them. If you are in the market for a rental I would contact Advent!

reviews.name: Mary Winslet
reviews.text: So happy I rented my property with Advent. My house is pretty much brand new and requires a lot of TLC with all of the nice furnishings and home automation system that's included with the rental, and my property manager does an amazing job of the on going maintenance etc. I didn't realize how much work houses really are until I rented mine furnished. There really is a lot going on with houses. I'd find it very hard to manage everything myself and I'm so thankful for my agent and the staff at Advent taking care of everything for me. They have all the right trades and all the right contacts for keeping my property in good condition, and most importantly keeping the tenants happy. Highly recommended if you want to rent your home.

reviews.name: Carol Chow
reviews.text: A true family run business. They make renting stress free, and leave no detail out. Property Management done the right way!

reviews.name: Richard Worthington
reviews.text: We went with Advent to manage our townhouse and everything worked out well, they managed the place for several years and we never had to worry about it. We had a few minor issues along the way which my property manager Jason Wong took care of quickly. I highly recommend them if you’re shopping around for rental agents. Talk to Jason!

reviews.name: Elissa Hondura
reviews.text: My realtor referred me Advent as we needed a rental agent to manage our place while we’re working away. They’ve proved to be a pretty good solution, the renting process has been painless and stress free. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Grant McPhail
reviews.text:
For the second time we used Advent to lease our condominium in Vancouver and again it was a very professional experience. The following was my post from last year and i see no reason to change any of it. I highly recommend them.
We recently contracted with Advent to manage our personal condo in Vancouver. As a real estate developer and investor i have worked with many property managers over the years and i have no hesitation in stating Advent is among the most professional and reliable i have experienced. I have full confidence in recommending them to anyone seeking quality property management services.

reviews.name: Leah
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of working with Jaime Bergman - who is very professional and kind. She answered all and any of our pressing questions/requests in a timely manner and we are very grateful that she helped us! Thanks Jaime!!

reviews.name: Tony Yuen
reviews.text: Excellent experience working with Brad Thompson at Advent. Very communicative, efficient, and a high level of professionalism managing the search for a new qualified tenant. Thank you Brad for all your help!

reviews.name: Marvin S
reviews.text: First time using Advent but I’m very glad I did. I had the joy of dealing with Linda Danielson. She was extremely professional and very personable, she informed me every step of the way as to what was happening. When I explained to her I needed my condo rented before the end of the month so I wouldn’t have to leave it empty and incur more expenses. She came through the day before for the 1st saving me thousands.

reviews.name: Bernie Hollett
reviews.text:
We have been using Advent Real Estate Services Ltd. for our properties for almost a decade. We wanted a top class management service for our investment properties who was competitive in cost, highly competent with experienced staff, offering flexibility in meeting owner’s needs and most importantly... HONEST.
The rental money comes on time every month with clean easy to read statements and every single time we’ve had a question about anything we have received a very prompt courteous and sensible response. Advent arranges minor repairs and will contact you immediately if any major issues arise. They are ahead of the game when new rules and regulations come from the city or province and make sure you are aware of these changes which impact your property management. The communication lines are always open from your individual property manager to the manager of the company. We would encourage anyone looking for a solid property management company to talk to Advent President Michelle Farina and her very professional team and to give Advent serious consideration for your Rental Property Management and Tenant Placement needs.

reviews.name: Tyler Lee
reviews.text: I signed up with advent for their property management services over 6 years ago. They’ve provided good service at a good price and are a phone call or email away when I need them. They take the stress out of renting, which is much needed whilst I’m working over seas.

reviews.name: M L
reviews.text: Working in the industry for 6 years, I have come across a number of members of the Advent Team, most recently Brad Thompson. With equally challenging jobs, his efficiency and attention to detail help us both address the concerns of our clients. Great job.

reviews.name: Trevor Boudreau
reviews.text: We have rented with Advent since 2012. The rental agents were great to work with and the staff have been equally great throughout our tenancy. They are always quick to respond to our questions and have responded to any issues or repairs quickly. I would recommend using Advent to anyone looking for a good rental experience in the Lower Mainland.

reviews.name: Randy Cobbett
reviews.text: I’ve always found the property managers to be very helpful and they take care of things quickly.   Good to deal with. Advent has managed my properties for about 7 years now and we have always been very happy with their services, including finding good tenants for us.  I highly recommend them to both landlords and tenants for the professional work they do.

reviews.name: JULIAN ZEBIBBO
reviews.text: As newcomers we were blessed when meeting Kevin Ho from Advent.  From the first contact, he was very kind, dedicated, prompt to hear our needs and easygoing personality.  Even when we do not have history as renters in Vancouver, we perceived a notorious difference by the way we were assisted by Kevin.  He helped us through the whole renting process explaining deeply every step and helping us to solve our needs in time. When arriving as newcomers, finding your first space could be incredibly stressful in Vancouver's rental market, but Kevin help us beyond our expectations resulting in our best rental experience.  We strongly recommend Kevin Ho’s rental consultant service to our friends.

reviews.name: Sarah Nighy
reviews.text: This was my first time dealing with Advent, and it was such a great experience! I was fortunate to deal with a property manager, Jaime Bergman, who couldn't have been nicer, more accommodating, more thorough, more considerate, and kind. The next time I am looking for a property to rent, I would hope that it is listed on Advent, as I know they take exceptional care of their clients.

reviews.name: Glorie Averbach
reviews.text:
Terrible experience and lousy customer service.

I found a listing that was of interest and reached out to the agent.

She replied to me with a list of questions as well as request for my preferred times for viewing the suite. I got back to her right away and provided 3 different times/day the week following that worked for meeting her at the building. I work from home, so my timing is quite flexible. It took her 2 days to reply back and when she got back to me, she wrote: "Thanks for getting back to me, are you available for a showing on Tuesday December 11th at 12:15pm? I realize this is outside of your preferred showing times but I must comply with the current tenant’s requests and their personal schedule too."
Okay, I understand this point but then why bother to ask me my preferred times if it didn't really matter?

As it turned out, the timing she proposed interfered with a client meeting and when I inquired if any of the other times I offered worked, she never bothered to reply back. Brutal.

A couple of weeks later, I noticed the unit was still available so again I reached out. The reply: "We have just received applications for tenancy on this unit. Should they not be approved I can contact you back to arrange a viewing. Please note that I will be away from the office from Dec 22-30, so showings after this week will recommence in the new year."
Whatever. I never heard from her again and have moved on.

I've owned many businesses in my career. If any of my employees treated a potential customer like this, I would seriously have to consider whether they should be employed with the company.

I would never recommend Advent to anyone. Lousy response time and lousy service.

Look elsewhere.

reviews.name: Leon Zheng Zhu
reviews.text:
We had very short time window for finding an apartment and moving out under a very stressful situation. Luckily we found an apartment managed by Mr. Kevin Ho with Advent. He provided us with responsive and efficient communications and overall top-of-the-class service. We were able to move in to the new home within one week after reaching out to Kevin. All his work and communication were well organized and delivered and we are very happy with the overall experience working with Kevin and his colleagues.

We've been renting in Vancouver at couple of different places now. Personally I've never met a company and their agents with such high level of professionalism and proficiency in the industry.

For anyone who read this comment, if you are a homeowner or renter in Vancouver, this is the company that you want to work with. If you are the management from Advent, give Mr. Kevin Ho a promotion, this is the man who's gonna make your company great.

reviews.name: Melanie Peng
reviews.text: Jaime was amazing with making the process very easy and assisting us whenever possible.

reviews.name: Rodney Hemsworth
reviews.text: Been renting from Advent for years now, they're great, they've always catered to my maintenance requests whenever there's been an issue with appliances etc in my apartment. The guys in customer care are pretty responsive.

reviews.name: Gary Mark
reviews.text: The guys at Advent are awesome, always take care of business for me. I don’t have to worry about my properties at all, they keep things ticking over nicely. No complaints, all positive, I always refer to them for anything rentals.

reviews.name: Johannes Bez
reviews.text:
We had a great experience working with Advent, and especially with Kevin Ho. Kevin is an incredible asset to Advent and, in my opinion, to Vancouver's real estate market as a whole.

We're small-time renters, but Kevin made this move feel special by virtue of his easygoing personality, keen insight, and sincere dedication to matching our needs. Finding the right space is incredibly stressful in Vancouver's rental market - Kevin not only helped ease that pressure with his personable approach, but went above and beyond to make sure we had an exceptional experience.

This was not just the best rental experience I've ever had, it's one of the most impressive consultative business engagements I've had the privilege to be involved in. My partner and I both strongly recommend Advent and Kevin in particular. Thank you, Kevin!

reviews.name: Cindy Gordon
reviews.text: My husband and I had a very nice 3 month stay at one of Advent's furnished properties. Our property manager Jenny McNellis was fantastic, she really did go above and beyond to make our temporary stay in Vancouver a comfortable one. We had a few issues here and there but Advent's customer care team ironed those out promptly. Highly recommended if you're looking for a furnished short term suite.

reviews.name: Nathalia da Silva Oliveira
reviews.text: My husband and I had a great experience renting with Advent. We found an apartment on their website and promptly called Neil. It was late but he picked up anyway, and he was super nice and friendly. We scheduled a viewing for the next day and applied for rental right after. The decision on the application was fast. Michelle and Neil explained everything to us, with great patience. The apartment was new, recently built, and some details had to be updated. They got everything done before we moved in. We are really happy with their services.

reviews.name: Ricky Dhillon
reviews.text: I have been working with Advent over the past 3 years and they have provided outstanding service in terms of communication, management and professionalism. I can't speak highly enough of the team in this office and their commitment to delivering a high level of service. Highly recommend the team at Advent!

reviews.name: Katie Colby
reviews.text:
We listed our apartment with Advent Real Estate ten years ago and have had a really positive experience. They have always communicated openly and in advance, our property has never been vacant and any problems the tenants have had have been dealt with quickly and at a reasonable cost to us. I'd like to thank Michelle and the team for their exceptional work.
Katie

reviews.name: Brandi Hayward
reviews.text: Everything from the owner down to the property managers and accounting team is unprofessional. They take $ from your account and won’t say why. They won’t provide bills for said stolen funds. And the owner will hang up if you call to try resolve these kind of issues. 0/5 stars. Do not rent with advent.

reviews.name: Briana Montenegro
reviews.text: Nice furnished accommodations. The place I rented was a minter, very well kept. Thx

reviews.name: Lorna Court
reviews.text: Two thumbs up!   I have been using Advent for the last 7 years to manage my rental condo and they've done a terrific job.  They are efficient, receptive, and patient.  Whenever I've had a question they've got back to me very quickly with the answer.   They've been utterly dependable, guided me with good advice, and have done an excellent job.   Choosing  Advent was one of my best decisions.  I heartily recommend them.

reviews.name: Ken Peters
reviews.text: Living overseas means that I needed a very reliable and responsive property management company to look after my rental properties. Advent has always been really supportive of my condo rental needs, and I highly recommend them. Top Notch Service!

reviews.name: Clarence Zowordski
reviews.text: Totally awesome man! You should rent with Advent if you’re apartment shopping. Top class people :))))

reviews.name: Charlotte Wilson
reviews.text: They answer the phone, reply to emails and communicate efficiently. Good service all round.

reviews.name: Sean Crowther
reviews.text:
Dealt with Michelle directly when she was starting up and was a pleasure dealing with all of the people at Advent over my 10+ years as a client
Hope to have another rental property in the future and work with Advent again

reviews.name: Leanne Poon
reviews.text: Quick and responsive, very good service! I've only worked with Donald and Brad but the whole team at Advent is reliable and great!

reviews.name: Roxanne Carriere
reviews.text: I have been using Advent for a number of years on our downtown unit. now and truly appreciate their help and service. I find the staff very responsive and well worth the competitive monthly fee, and like the proactive way they handle issues in the marketplace.

reviews.name: Ahmed Saber
reviews.text: This company is trying hard to make tenants disclose sensitive personal info prior to renting. If you are a tenant go for businesses that are fair & neutral. Meaning they shouldn’t be biased towards landlords and against tenants ! If there was a lower rating than 1 star i would’ve given it to them !

reviews.name: John Brown
reviews.text: I always refer my clients to Advent when they want to rent, as I know they’re one of the more reputable companies in town, and my clients have always been happy with them.

reviews.name: Joy McDerment
reviews.text: Advent has been managing my apartment for 2 1/2 years. They do an amazing job. They look after everything and I never have to worry about a thing.

reviews.name: Sarah Hamilton Dolan
reviews.text: As a renter in the Vancouver metro area, my family has moved three times prior to coming across our current rental through Advent's post on Craigslist. We have been so impressed with Advent's service, beginning with our early inquiries as prospective renters, which received well-run, timely responses. Jamie, our house manager, is responsive, detail-oriented, and someone who is an un-biased advocate for the renter and for the owner. Advent's professionalism is clearly laid out on their website--everything from the screening process to a tenant portal that easily manages customer service and maintenance requests (which they parse out to a team). Renting through Advent provides a sense of fair, transparent, and easy to work with management.

When I was moving out they worked around my schedule to handle key drops, showings and other details and were very transparent about what they needed from me.  I honestly can't think of anything that was lacking -  they were friendly, easy to work with and professional.

reviews.name: Pooja R
reviews.text:
The rental agent refused to accommodate timings that were not between the hours of 9 to 5pm, Mon to Fri. Those are the exact timings I work. Jaime, the agent needed to be contacted twice and doesn't respond to emails initially. I had to call the office and forward the call to her in order to talk to her. The office person I spoke to was helpful that's why I'm giving 2 stars here. I work in healthcare, I can hardly take lunch breaks. I think its preposterous to not accommodate potential rental customers with showing timings, especially who are genuinely Interested.

Update: commenting on the reply of this agency, this place I was interested in, is a brand new rental called Ridgewood place. There were NO PREVIOUS TENANTS. Please stop covering for the incompetence of your rental agents and review them to not have them
do this to someone else. Please donot fabricate responses that are not reviewed without proof.

Update: Business deleted their comment.

reviews.text: Fantastic rental agency and property managers.  Very reliable and helpful team.  Going with Advent to manage our properties was the best choice and have helped us above and beyond. Highly recommended.

reviews.text: As a tenant, using Advent was the perfect solution to the hazards of the Vancouver rental market, especially the uncertainly and risk of having to deal with a private landlord.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Advent to anyone.

reviews.text: I've rented with a few different companies in town and none of them come close to providing the level of service that Advent does, I highly recommend them if you're looking for a rental agency to manage your condo.

reviews.name: David Walker
reviews.text: My wife and I own a small rental property that we bought new.  We decided to handle renting the property ourselves so went about doing the necessary work to ensure we got a good tenant.  What a disaster, the renters were late on their rent payments 10 out of 12 months and it took 2  cleaning women 5 hours to clean the 500 sq. ft. apartment.  We found being landlords was way to stressful and so hired Advent to do the work for us.  Absolute best move we ever made.  They are very professional and do a great job of finding the right tenant.  We have used Advent for over ten years.

reviews.name: Payam Vaziri
reviews.text: I tried to schedule a viewing for two properties that were listed by Advent. One was in Dolce (Private Collection) and the other was in Olympic village. I didn't get a response back for the first inquiry so I contacted Liz again. She responded with a longggg application to be filled prior to the viewing. We're not talking about a few questions to filter people, it was a tenancy application. I called her to say we don't even know if we like the place so why are we sharing all of these sensitive information with you and she never returned the call. In fact on the voice message they very directly say that if you leave a voice message they won't call you back!! We ended up finding another apartment. I would never get these guys to list my property. The unit we wanted to look at was listed for almost 2 months and they even dropped the price but we couldn't even go see it. In our apartment search we came across many rental companies and they all went out of their way to accommodate a time that would work for us and actually tried to sell the place. Maybe these guys are too busy and don't have the time to show their apartments, I don't know, but whatever the reason it's pretty hard to rent out a place if you're not willing to show it.

reviews.name: Nicky Lavine
reviews.text: The guys at Advent are always there when I need them, they respond to my emails quickly and take care of any repairs in a timely manner. So happy I rented with them.

reviews.text:
We rented with Matt for one year and had a very positive experience.
He was our leasing agent and was very responsive and helpful in getting a few things fixed in our unit over the year. He was also very accommodating with scheduling our move-out inspection given that we had to move out of the city prior to it taking place.

- The team with Matt referred us to an excellent cleaner (Vilma) who was very reliable and did an excellent job.
- We received our deposit back (less cleaning, etc.) without any issues.

My husband found the unit himself online, so we don't have as much experience using Matt for the rental hunt itself, but in terms of securing the rental and working with them while living in the rental, his team was excellent. I enjoyed working with this Vancouver property manager and would recommend.

reviews.text:
I came to Matt because I knew he catered to the luxury niche, and I needed a way to quickly find high-quality tenants for my property. I feel very lucky to have come across Matt and his team, as I found they were the right people to come to!! The team worked swiftly and in earnest, presenting me with tenants of a truly high calibre!! They showcased my home with a virtual tour  (as a complimentary service!), and the rigour with which They screened their tenants, and how they shared relevant documentation with me and communicated closely with me throughout, quickly allowed me to put full faith in their protocol.

From the outset, I was impressed by the polished attention to detail and the flair with which the business is run by Matt. The team is so enthusiastic and hard-working, and I'm so grateful for how they have gone out of their way to help me, in so many ways. I'm very glad that the firm offers its services here in Richmond, and I'm proud to have Matt represent me as my Richmond property management company!!

reviews.text:

Chris

My account manager Matt was exceptional, and he was my point of contact for anything that arose for the property. I always felt that I was in good hands. He responded promptly to all inquiries, and communicated options which enabled me to proceed with good information and instruction. I enjoyed the experience and would highly recommend this service for others looking for Burnaby property management companies.

reviews.text: I've been using Matt Kuras for my Vancouver Property Management for about 2 years now and they have always been wonderful and professional. reviews.text: Looking after my investment properties was getting to be a big headache. Tenants always needing to be tended to and you have to walk on egg shells dealing with them or it will cost you. Now he handles all my affairs in regards to residential property manegement and I’m very happy with his service. I highly recommend him for Vancouver property management

title: Nu Stream Realty Inc
address: 4555 Kingsway #100, Burnaby, BC V5H 4T8, Canada

reviews.name: Brian Nichols
reviews.text: I wish i knew the showing agent's name, but we booked an "appointment" for one of Tracy's listings, drove half an hour to get there, and there was a huge line of people! He was doing first-come-first served and not enforcing 15 minute limits. We were told we had to wait at least half an hour, and there was nothing he could do. I asked around and it turns out he had other people booked into the same time slot, and he made zero effort to get us in. This is during COVID so it's illegal to have multiple parties in the home at once. Basically violating real estate board rules by treating it like a standard open house, and didn't care because he had a yard full of prospective buyers. We've been to 27 showings and never been treated so poorly.

reviews.text: Ken Cui helped me to sell my house. He is very knowledgeable, expert in the field. Ken made the process fast and easy. He sold above asking price. I am very happy.
