reviews.text: Please we are not selling our property anymore, stop sending us your junk mails. (Team Calvin)   We have called your office two times to take us off the list.  And we are still getting mails about an expired agreement 2 years ago.

reviews.name: Ralph Vincent
reviews.text: Nu Stream Realty is possibly the laziest group of con artists I have ever met. If you are attempting to scam me, do the respectful thing and at least try to make it interesting. Listing homes at 25% their realistic sale price and giving prospective buyers less then 12 seconds to view a home is not even coming close to the level it would take to defraud the average Vancouverite. I'm not sure what I expected from a group of people that look like they get their haircut and buy their shoes from the same air cadet supply store but, I am genuinely hurt by their low-energy attempt squeeze me for money. These people need help.

reviews.name: Ben Mui
reviews.text: Ricky Tse is extremely professional. Responsible and reliable. Deal with him is pleasant and feeling peace of mind.

reviews.name: Grant Beaumont
reviews.text:
I do not recommend buyers viewing these agent’s listings.  It can be a frustrating  waste of time for a prospective buyer.  Based on my review of two listed properties in Surrey, it is my opinion Nu Stream uses a system for selling real estate that is not making the market efficient and seems unethical.
They use a property’s list asking price as an invitation to make an offer, which is legal,  but the list asking price has no close relation to the actual selling price.   It reminds me of the travel agents practice of  listing  really cheap flights to entice you then adding on another  200% for taxes.
Theses agent will advise the seller to list the property unrealistically below fair market value to get many potential real estate buyers interested in the property despite the seller having no real intention of selling at that price.
These agents will also arrange open houses for short periods of time and limited hours  where customers are rushed through the property in 3 minutes with others lined up out front to make the home look popular in order to create a false sense of interest in the property.
These agents will present all offers to the seller as an indication of their market prowess, but the seller will never counter-offer or will counter-offer with a price many tens of thousands higher than the listed asking price.   This method wastes the buyer’s time and fosters distrust in the market. To me this is not making the market efficient, it is creating a pricing uncertainty about the market and has the potential to foster and fuel further  unethical practice among realtors who must compete.

Further to my comments,  I was informed it is the Real Estate Council of BC ‘s policy that, the seller has ultimate control of this market strategy and it is beyond the jurisdiction of real estate council scope to police its members in regards to this strategy.

Had a terrible experience with David Wu.  While remaining in communication with David throughout the day, we submitted an offer well before the deadline (2+ hours).  Before the deadline even hit, it was revealed that David didn't even tell his client about our offer, and that he only presented the one prior offer which came in significantly lower than mine.  Furthermore, it wasn't but a week later that the very same apartment in question was found on Craigslist for rent using the exact same photos from the sale listing.  Frankly I consider this poor, and unethical business practice, and outright shady.

Never again will I, or anyone that I know, do business with David, or any business he is associated with, and I would caution you before doing so yourself.

Amir Hamzehali isn't just a great realtor, he is a great person. As a first-time homebuyer, I cannot possibly overstate how lucky I was to have found someone with a great team so honest, so patient, and so friendly to guide me through the home buying process in this cutthroat Vancouvr real estate market.
We saw a lot of houses, I mean A LOT.  Not once did I feel pressured by Amir or anyone else on his real estate team. I asked A LOT of questions.  Not once did I feel judged. She truly, genuinely cares about making you happy and finding you the right home, and in my case, she did exactly that!
I recommend Amir Hamzehali with the highest possible confidence as your Eastate Vancouver Realtor.

reviews.name: Mahtab Ghahremani
reviews.text:
Selling and buying a home is the largest transaction of anybody's life, and it could be extremely stressful. When we finally decided to let go of our beautiful condominium and purchase an adorable single family home, Amir handled this process very professionally and smoothly!

At first, I wasn't sure how our small projects were going to be taken care of as I knew Amir lists the most expensive houses in North shore! However, in the process, Amir provided incomparable support throughout both transactions. He truly gave the same amount of attention to our purchase and sell, if not more than any of his luxury listings! He was in contact with us even when he was traveling out of the country.
We were totally stressed out about moving out of the condominium, and moving in our new home, but he coordinated the dates seamlessly.

I cannot thank Amir and his team enough for providing such excellent service, and enabling us to start a new chapter in our lives!

reviews.text: We couldn’t have been more satisfied with Amir Hamzehali and his team. While the process of home buying was much more difficult than we’d imagined, based on the levels of competitiveness, Amir gave us excellent guidance, unflagging availability, and deep knowledge about a really wide range of homes that we looked at. I hope we’re in our new home for a long time, but if we were to move, I wouldn’t hesitate to work with Amir Hamzehali again or give him anything but the highest recommendation.

reviews.text: Sophia is a fantastic real estate agent! She is extremely knowledgeable within the real estate market. For anyone looking to buy or sell a home, I would highly recommend working with Sophia. She truly wants the best for all her clients.

reviews.text: Sophia made the condo searching process very clear and easy! Her market knowledge is extensive and excellent and we found her to be an invaluable resource as questions came up and as we narrowed down places. When we made our final decision to buy, we felt confident, and that is in no small part due to Sophia's work with us. Working with Sophia was a pleasure -- she is calm, professional, responsive, and courteous. We absolutely recommend her if you are looking for a great realtor for your own home-buying process.

reviews.name: Elias Fernandez
reviews.text: We have worked with Sophia and Brian on purchasing and selling our homes in Burnaby over the last few years. They are professional, knowledgeable, and have outstanding customer service. They worked very efficiently and communicated effectively to ensure that we were informed on all aspects of the transactions. There were many tight timelines and negotiations which they were able to successfully manage for us. We would highly recommend the Sophia and Brian to anyone and we look forward to doing business with them again in the future. We truly appreciate everything you have done for us! You have excelled in every way!

reviews.name: Christopher Mills
reviews.text: Sophia just helped my parents sell their family home of 50+ years. She was gracious and professional, listened to their concerns and helped broker a very successful sale in an incredibly short period of time. It really couldn’t have gone smoother. She helped turn what could have potentially been a difficult event in their lives into a pleasant and painless experience. We are all impressed with Sophia and grateful to her and I would highly recommend her for all your real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Kirby Walker
reviews.text: We listed with Brian and Sophia and they were amazing. They were there every step of the way. They always answered every call, text or email no matter what time of day or night it was. Their professionalism, mentorship, knowledge, honesty, and hard work ethic are much respected and appreciated. They never pressured us into selling. They helped me to make the best decision for my family.

reviews.name: Fred Rusin
reviews.text: Sophia and Brian were awesome! Professional, efficient and knew exactly what we were looking for and found the perfect house for us!!! They knew we were in a time crunch because I was having a baby and worked tirelessly to find us the best place to grow our new family. <3

reviews.name: James Franz
reviews.text: Sophia Gee and Brian Vidas are without doubt an incredibly passionate, motivated and professional team of people, it was a pleasure to work with them during the sale of our home. They far exceeded our expectations in every possible way, from the way in which they marketed our home, exceptional communication throughout the entire process and their love and enthusiasm for what they do so well, make the selling experience, exciting and extremely pleasant. We highly recommend them and without question we can say this is by far the best realtors we have ever worked with! Thanks again guys!

reviews.name: Nicholas Morgan
reviews.text: Sophia Gee and Brian Vidas are very attentive and caring people. Brian and I meet in person for a long meeting to go over my requirements after our initial contact. They have been on top of things and answers all questions clearly. Sophia stands out in her field for the time and attention she is willing to spend on people who’s in need of help in the real estate market. After I purchased my home they still helped me when I needed help in a difficult situation. I would not hesitate to recommend them for anyone who’s looking for buy. Thanks again guys! You are true professionals.

reviews.name: Peter Vaughan
reviews.text: As a first-time homebuyer I cannot say enough good things about my experience with Sophia. We got connected through Google because of an apartment that I was interested in, and right off the bat, Sophia spent 20 min on the phone with me to answer any/all of my questions. From there, she was always quick to respond to texts/emails/calls, connected me with a mortgage broker who was also awesome, and when I fell in love with a place, she dropped everything to make sure I was in the best position to get it. Sophia’s knowledge and expertise in the process of placing an offer, responsiveness, and negotiation skills all far exceeded my expectations and made this process less daunting and more exciting. She’s a true partner to her clients.

reviews.name: Eric Manning
reviews.text: Sophia made the purchase of our first our home a fun and easy experience. We are so grateful to have found such a great realtor! She provided us thoughtful, honest advice throughout the entire process, and with her knowledge and expertise, we always felt comfortable in our decisions. She made sure we felt no pressure to rush into any offers and was always available to answer our (many) questions. She took the time to get to know us and what was important to us in finding a home, and her guidance was essential for navigating the competitive Burnaby market. She was able to set us up with great mortgage brokers, inspectors and lawyers, and remained involved throughout the entire process to make sure everything was seamless. We would absolutely recommend Sophia to anyone looking to buy a home!

reviews.name: Neil Taylor
reviews.text:
We had a great experience working with Sophia on the purchase of our first condo in Burnaby We found her to be an enthusiastic and skilled professional, with a genuine desire to help us find the perfect home. Sophia invested considerable time and effort in our search over several months, arranging regular viewings, providing useful information and insight on each property, and responding promptly to our many questions. In a highly competitive market, we really benefited from Sophia’s tactical advice and excellent communication during the offer/negotiation stage.
Overall it was an absolute pleasure to work with Sophia, and without a doubt she reduced the stress and uncertainty of this process for us. We would certainly recommend her to  other home buyers, and we look forward to working with her again in the future!

reviews.name: Joseph MacLeod
reviews.text: 5 stars!!! Sophia helped us find the most amaaaaazing townhome in Burnaby. We have had so much trouble with previous realtors who were trying to pressure us into townhomes we didn't actually want. She was  incredibly supportive, answered all our questions, picked up our calls at all hours, and eventually helped us find the perfect place for us. If you ever have a chance to work with her, she will truly go above and beyond to make sure you have a great experience during this tedious process. Home hunting is not fun but she really helped us make the best of it!!

reviews.name: Joshua Nolan
reviews.text: Working with Sophia means ensuring that you truly will have some one on your side, taking the time to educate and advocate for your needs. Sophia opened our eyes to the idea of building our own home - an option we assumed was out of reach. After months of searching listings, she proactively worked to find us the perfect lot. Her patience with us during the process blew me away. Her consistency and positivity kept us motivated and her honesty and communication was incredible. If you are looking for a realtor, Sophia is without a doubt, the realtor to call.

reviews.name: Keith Hunter
reviews.text: Sophia is hands down one of the best real estate professionals I've worked with. Her years of experience in the market are evident and have been great asset. A few of the qualities I appreciate most about her is how responsive and accurate she is. Sophia displayed a high level of professionalism and experience numerous times throughout our home buying endeavor. She gave us a sense of security and advised us toward our best interests. I would absolutely recommend Sophia above all other agents. She is part of an elite few who simply "get it".

reviews.name: Sam Jones
reviews.text: Sophia and Brian are outstanding. They asks great open ended questions to understand what your needs are, and they follows through with solid options in your range. Their perseverance and focus on the details made our search and buying decision a simple and very positive one. My wife, daughter, and I would highly recommend Sophia and Brian to anyone home shopping.

reviews.name: Christian Parsons
reviews.text: Sophia Gee is the best! My family and I had the pleasure of working with Sophia earlier this year to sell my mom’s condo. Sophia and her team made it so easy and offered so much peace of mind by handling everything for us. She went above and beyond to make sure everything went as smoothly as possible, and she got us several offers well above asking price! Cannot recommend her enough — we will definitely be working with Sophia again!

reviews.name: Christopher Baker
reviews.text:
From start to finish, our process with Sophia was everything we could have asked for.
From professional photos, to brochures, to online presence, our home was marketed exceptionally. Sophia and her team did an excellent job of getting our listing out to market in impeccable timing while bringing in serious and meaningful interest.
Sophia’s collected; calm nature helps to put what can be a stressful time at ease. she is also fast acting. The speed of which we were able to sell our home with an offer we were happy with proves her experience in the market.

reviews.name: Jake Edmunds
reviews.text: Sophia was incredibly helpful throughout the process of selling my home. She was very insightful as to how to prepare the house, stage the house, and make necessary repairs. She provided multiple options to us for contractors/engineers/electricians/cleaners, and communicated directly with them AND us, so that the entire sales process went smoothly. Sophia also guided us through the contract negotiation and signing process. She understands where to make concessions, and where/how to apply pressure in order to receive the best possible outcome. Very friendly and professional, willing to meet any time our schedules would accommodate; I cannot recommend Sophia enough!

reviews.name: Lundin Johnson
reviews.text: Sophia did a remarkable job selling my condo. It was so easy to work with her throughout the entire process. Not only that she is very knowledgeable and full of self-confidence, but I could also see her honesty and humility from our very first meeting and that’s what distinguished her from other realtors. In less than 3 weeks my unit was sold! Sophia and her team took care of all the details and guided me in the decision making. I enthusiastically recommend Sophia as your realtor. She is a great professional and a great person.

reviews.name: Anthony Cameron
reviews.text: Sophia and Brian are the reason why I have an amazing apartment today. I am a physician working in Vancouver. I have also been taking care of my elderly parents during the pandemic. Sophia and Brian never gave up on me even when I was overwhelmed and could not tend to my apartment search. They found the best  place for me, offered to give me a live tour, but due to my circumstances I could not go to Vancouver at the time. They then gave me a video tour and described the entire process of rental in Vancouver to me in detail. Not only did they explain it to me, they became my point person as I was waiting for employment verification, guarantor verification, etc. If it were not for them, I would never have gotten my apartment. They communicated with the leasing office for me and took care of all the complexities so I could focus on my family and my career. They have my highest recommendation and endorsement. They are a consummate professional and also very honest and very pleasant to work with. Thank you, Sophia Gee and Brian Vidas, for everything!

reviews.name: Julian Lawrence
reviews.text: Sophia is hands down the best realtor we have ever worked with. During our search, she used technology, market knowledge, and construction knowledge to make sure my wife and I made the most informed and best decision for our needs. Sophia was always available for any questions we had, and she always put our interests first (which is a rare trait in the real estate world). Based on her own educational background, experience, and experts she knows, Sophia made sure every detail of our transaction was explained and understood. We could not recommend her more highly! You will not find a more trustworthy agent.

reviews.name: Karen Marshall
reviews.text: Sophia Gee helped my wife and I with the purchase of our new home. Buying your first house is extremely stressful and you feel like everyone is speaking a foreign language half of the time, but thanks to Sophia, she was able to guide my wife and I into a great deal and allow us to make a great purchase. If it wasn't for Sophia and her amazing attention to detail and persistence I know we would not have our home right now. I would 100% recommend Sophia and her team to anyone looking to buy or sell. Thanks again for everything!!!

reviews.name: Jonathan Davies
reviews.text: Sophia Gee and Brian Vidas were a great resource helping us navigate our home purchase during the COVID pandemic. They were responsive, knowledgeable and above all a true professional. I have since recommended them to others in my network.

reviews.name: Amy Fisher
reviews.text: Working with Sophia was a great experience! She sold our condo quickly and made buying our new house a smooth process. She was very knowledgeable and had reliable connections to all the resources we needed, staging, lawyer, inspector, contractor...). Always there to answer our questions, we really felt that Sophia had our best interests at heart! I would recommend Sophia to anyone who is looking for a realtor.

reviews.name: James Reid
reviews.text: cleaning, and anything else that could make the process easier for me. I'm very confident that I got more for my townhouse with them than I would have with another realtor. I can't recommend them highly enough.

reviews.name: Lauren Brown
reviews.text: Sophia provides superior service. Having worked with Sophia in a buying and selling context, I would strongly recommend her. Straightforward and strategic. Sophia Gee is practical, pragmatic and well informed. She makes things easy. Her knowledge and experience pays off.

reviews.text: We really enjoyed working with Sophia, both professionally and personally. Our home was sold in a timely and efficient manner. Sophia was responsive to our questions and concerns and as last-minute issues popped up she always seemed to be one step ahead with solutions. She handled issues expediently and made the selling process simple for us. We highly recommend Sophia as your Real Estate Agent.

reviews.name: Jason Ince
reviews.text: Sophia has both sold and purchased a home for us in Vancouver, and in both cases we were very impressed with her professionalism, pulse on the market, and great advice in all aspects around the real estate transaction. Sophia always acted with integrity and never pressured us to buy or sell quickly, but provided sound advice around market trends. I highly recommend anyone to work with Sophia if they’re buying or selling a home in Vancouver, as it makes a huge difference working with an agent you can trust.

reviews.name: Nathan Brown
reviews.text: We were looking to buy a home and Sophia was extremely helpful in guiding us the whole way. She was patient and understanding with the entire process as this was our first rodeo. Very happy with how professional she is. We would recommend her in a heartbeat. Sophia’s persistence ensured we got everything we asked for in a timely manner.

reviews.name: Frank Jackson
reviews.text: I have worked on a professional level with Sophia and Brian for the past 5 years, and I have to say that I don't know of a more honest, hardworking group of people. Sophia and Brian are wonderful! I personally worked with them to sell my home, and I couldn't be more pleased with his attention to detail and to us as a client. The sale process was made much easier with them! Thanks again Sophia and Brian!

reviews.name: Peter Wilson
reviews.text: Sophia is the best realtor we could've asked for! She is very knowledgeable about the market and after hearing our preferences, knew exactly which area would be perfect for us! reviews.name: Joshua Simpson
reviews.text: Due to an unfortunate situation with my roommate I had to move and decided to buy my first home. Sophia was awesome about it. She provided a mortgage broker to start the process. Very understanding about my situation and guided me through the entire process. She had me in my new place in no time and answered any questions or concerns in a timely manner. I really appreciate all she's done and I love the new place.

reviews.name: David Fox
reviews.text: What a great team! Sophia helped us find our first house last year and we still keep in touch with her to this day! While looking for a home she was very efficient and truly respected our time by gathering all of the facts on the listings and asking the right questions BEFORE setting up a showing. The entire process was very thorough, and Sophia was very reliable and honest throughout. The best thing about working with Sophia is her follow up. She stays in touch with her clients and checks in on you even AFTER the sale. Sophia's team definitely delivers first class service with integrity, honesty and respect!

reviews.name: Thomas Dyer
reviews.text: We were referred to Sophia Gee by a friend. We have had the best experience with her. She is helpful and informative. Obviously buying a house is very stressful but we always came off the phone happy and at ease all thanks to her. Sophia you are amazing and would like to express how lucky we feel to have worked with you! Thank you for absolutely everything

reviews.name: Charles Cornish
reviews.text: As a first-time buyer, Sophia Gee was wonderful to work with. She was prompt with appointments, proactive with communication, and provided honest advice. She truly had our best interests in mind throughout the whole process. I'd absolutely use Sophia Gee again in the future and highly recommend her to others.

reviews.name: Ian Mackenzie
reviews.text: Since the start of our interest in the property Sophia has been very straight forward and easily reachable so that if there is ever any worries or concerns she is always fast to respond! She is polite and I have had no issues at all! Thank you Sophia!

reviews.name: Kevin Ellison
reviews.text: I worked with Sophia and she was incredible. She went out of her way to make sure that I was comfortable with the entire buying process, and it was clear to me from day one that she wanted me to find exactly what I was looking for. I can't say enough good things about her. I'll recommend her to anyone.

reviews.name: Henry Evans
reviews.text: I had a great experience working with Sophia. I was flying in to the area for a job interview and needed to scope out housing for a potential relocation. Sophia was very quick to respond, despite being at a multi day real estate conference. When she returned from the conference she was sick, but still made time to meet with me. Overall she was very prompt and professional in helping me identify listings and arranging for a viewing agent to show me the properties all on the same day. This was all done despite my very tight travel schedule and the fact that I was only looking for a rental. It was a pleasure working with her and I would recommend her to anyone else needing a great realtor in the area.

reviews.name: Stewart Dyer
reviews.text: Sophia is very knowledgeable about the real estate market and she was helpful in selling our condo. She is responsive and professional. Sophia is definitely someone you are looking for to buy and sell properties! :)

reviews.name: Donnalynn Lavoie
reviews.text:
Sophia has a wealth of knowledge; is very professional; always available; thoughtful and respectful ~ but most of all, she is responsive before and immediately after showings, so you are always in the know. Oh, and did I mention that she is also a lot of fun.
If you are looking for the Best Agent that really cares about you and your investment, Sophia is the full meal deal. Totally honest and invested in helping you every step of the paperwork way / no hiccups and a Happy Ending. Thank you very much Sophia and Brian. Five stars is not enough.

reviews.name: Caroline Dewhurst
reviews.text: We were first time home buyers with very little knowledge about what was involved in the process. Sophia and her team were knowledgeable, supportive, professional and truly a pleasure to work with. With Sophia we actually had a lot of fun looking for houses, as part of a process that has a reputation for being unpleasant! Sophia was truly wonderful - she goes above and beyond, she works around your schedule, and she cares about her clients. We love the house that she helped us find and we cannot thank her enough.

reviews.name: Jake Butler
reviews.text: Sophia is a natural. Her process is smooth and efficient. She’s very easy to work with and I highly recommend her.

reviews.name: Oliver Wilson
reviews.text: I have worked with Sophia Gee on several occasions. Her level of professionalism, dedication, and patience was remarkable. Sophia Gee has demonstrated that she is a trooper and willing to hang in there with me. Thank you, Sophia!

reviews.name: Karen Cooper
reviews.text: We just recently purchased a second home in Burnaby with Brian, who we used as our real estate agent. He tried to make the process of working as painless as possible for us. He was very thorough and meticulous when it came to the paperwork, which made the purchasing process easier for our bank.

reviews.name: Spencer Welch
reviews.text: I have never known a realtor to have such an amazing work ethic. Sophia Gee is extremely tuned in to her clients, genuinely focused on helping them with every aspect of buying and selling. I have bought and sold numerous properties but have never known a real estate agent as professional and personable as Sophia. I highly recommend her to anyone buying, selling or just needing some advice.

reviews.name: Wayne Gondalez
reviews.text: Sophia is amazing! Right before we were about to list our house, my wife and I were actually about to use another agent but then a friend recommended that we talk to Sophia. I am so glad that we did! From the second we met, we loved her energy and passion. She truly loves what she does and she is extremely knowledgeable.

reviews.name: Matt Avery
reviews.text: If I could leave more stars I would! Sophia has helped me so much! She stuck with me from over a year ago meeting her. reviews.name: Luke Duncan
reviews.text: Sophia Gee provided exceptional service through the process of the sale of my property; both friendly and professional. I would highly recommend using Sophia Gee as your Real Estate Agent. Thank you!

reviews.text: Sophia and her team are nothing short of fantastic! They helped me sell my condo and buy a new house. reviews.text: Sophia helped us with our new home. She was patient, kind, and most off all listened to what we needed. She was fair, honest, and always available and guided us in the right direction. We are so happy with our home thanks toSophia!

Thanks to Sophia for going the extra mile to keep me posted and help my mother to know what the process would be. Thank you very much again!

reviews.text: Thank you Sophia & Brian for the great job on the sale of our home. You were always there to answer our calls. Your marketing strategies were top notch. reviews.text: Sophia Gee made buying our new home easy. She handled everything and the process went smoothly. If you are looking for a home in the Burnaby area, call Sophia without any doubt.

reviews.text: Sophia is a rock-star realtor! Don't let her age or sweet smile fool you! She is one of the most experienced negotiators in the business. If you need to buy or sell a home she is your girl!

reviews.name: Brandon Davidson
reviews.text: Sophia and her team are fantastic! We sold and bought our second home with her.  Don't hesitate to call her if you are thinking of selling and or buying. I don't have time for a long review right now but will be back to update.

reviews.text: Sophia has helped us buy and sell our home twice.  In each case, she gave us prompt, friendly, reliable, and honest service.  She works so hard and made herself available at all times. And, she provided incredible strategic advice to us as a buyer - very experienced negotiator who respected our needs.  We were high maintenance clients - and she always welcomed our feedback.  Can't say enough good things about her.

title: Nancy Che Vancouver REALTOR®
address: RE/MAX Crest Realty, 1428 W 7th Ave, Vancouver, BC V6H 1C1, Canada

reviews.name: Oliver Xie
reviews.text:
As first time home buyers, me and my girlfriend would have been utterly lost in the process if we didn't have Nancy to answer our many questions. She is a kind and considerate realtor who takes the time to really ensure you understand every piece of minutia that goes into finding your new home. She is supremely organized and was extremely proactive in helping us navigate the cycle. Her connections provided us with many options for notaries, lawyers, and insurance agents - all of whom were good people who had our best interests in mind versus trying to make a quick buck.

Nancy can be relied upon to give candid and realistic advice. With the pandemic going on, she setup numerous web calls with us to guide us through the paperwork and procedure (even late at night!), and she was extremely patient with us. When it was permitted by health regulations, she was there in person as much as possible. She listens hard and goes above and beyond to ensure that us, and hopefully you also, are beyond satisfied.

In summary, Nancy is the prime example of a realtor that truly has your back throughout your home buying journey. Whether it be early on in the process, identifying your needs/wants and sending you listings that match what you are looking for, or on the day you close and take possession, Nancy is there to provide you with the professional advice and attention to detail that makes the buyer experience so much easier. She works hard for you, and fights for you. I would not for a second hesitate to recommend her.

reviews.name: Juanita Hadwin
reviews.text: For two stressed out estate executors who had no experience selling property, choosing Nancy as our agent proved she was exactly who we needed to calm our nervousness and guide us through the process, especially with the added concerns of the pandemic. Her patience and understanding allowed us to relax because we knew we could put our full trust in her expertise and advice, and she delivered over and above expectations. Nancy kept us updated on every aspect in a timely, professional manner and worked hard on our behalf. She made what at first seemed to be something totally overwhelming to us much much less complicated. The whole process from listing to closing felt smooth and seamless and she proved over and over that our trust was not misplaced. Nancy, you're a star! We are so grateful and can't thank you enough! We'll definitely be recommending you to anyone buying or selling property!

reviews.name: Alex Nicholson
reviews.text: Nancy was absolutely wonderful to work with and helped us to secure our first home! Being new to the market, my husband and I felt overwhelmed with the process but she made it easy and broke down everything from beginning to end! Nancy was very responsive and gave us great advice on the market conditions. This advice helped us land a fantastic property in a very competitive market! If you are looking for a real estate agent in the Vancouver area, I would HIGHLY recommend you reach out to Nancy!! You won't be disappointed!

reviews.name: Sabrina Speianu
reviews.text: Nancy helped us purchase our first home. She is an excellent realtor- extremely responsive, helpful, quick to arrange bookings, and we felt at ease with her helping us through the purchase process. I would say we might not have scored the home we purchased without her responsiveness. We were able to see and make an offer the day it was listed. We highly recommend Nancy!

reviews.name: Frank Ye
reviews.text: Nancy was an amazing realtor. During the pandemic, we planed to upsize our home, Nancy made the process seem easy and had very good communication and made us feel comfortable. She was super responsive and set up showings for us extremely quickly. We were able to sell our condo and find the current town home and are extremely happy with both the process and the results. We would highly recommend Nancy to anyone looking for a new place to live.

reviews.name: Edwin Khoo
reviews.text: It was a pleasure working with Nancy to purchase a new home here in Vancouver. I am relatively new to the city so I had a lot of questions. Nancy took the time to understand what I was looking for both in terms of a new home and my ideal neighbourhood. She was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and patient throughout the process. I really appreciated her proactive approach to understanding how I felt about each home she showed me in order to get a better understanding of what I was looking for. Additionally, during negotiations she worked extremely hard on my behalf and fought to get me a good deal. I always felt like I was heard and she was extremely responsive and kept me up-to-date throughout the whole process. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.text: Nancy is extremely helpful when searching for a property. I would strongly recommend using her expertise and assisting you at finding the right place. returns calls/messages quickly. very professional.

reviews.name: Jake Moodie
reviews.text:
I would recommend Nancy to anyone looking for an honest, trustworthy, and dedicated agent.

She was very supportive and professional from start to finish. This is always a difficult process to manage, but she provided all the details to make me feel comfortable with the decisions.

The information was always provided quickly and was able to get answers to all questions I had during the purchase process.

I would highly recommend Nancy to anyone who is looking for an agent!

reviews.name: Alex Bajc
reviews.text: Nancy was an amazing realtor. As first time home buyers, we were not really sure what we were doing or what to expect, but Nancy made the process seem easy and answered all of our questions and made us feel comfortable with everything. She was super responsive and set up showings for us extremely quickly. We were able to find our dream home within a month and are extremely happy with both the process and the results. We would highly recommend Nancy to anyone looking for a new place to live.

reviews.name: Natalie Larochelle
reviews.text:
Don't waste another minute searching for a realtor. CALL NANCY! Or read on to find out more about my experience with her.

I was in the process of purchasing a home from abroad and I could not have done it without Nancy. The combination of being out of the country and the current pandemic could have made this whole process so complicated and stressful - and it was, UNTIL I found Nancy! She is a fantastic realtor and a truly lovely human being.

We had a wonderful initial conversation where she really listened to what I was looking for and followed up by sending me the most perfectly-matched homes. She is extremely organized. She got right on it when I found one by getting in there and taking PERFECT videos of the property for me. She is so thorough. She took the initiative to also send me videos of another property that she came across that was an even better fit and much nicer and still within my price range - it's the home I ended up purchasing! She was so helpful throughout the entire process. She is very responsive, always on her phone and email. Another one of her many strengths is that she made certain I was comfortable and clear with everything and always made herself available to chat, answer questions or go over documents. She was so flexible and considerate of my busy schedule and did exactly what she said she would do with everything. She is incredibly focused and hardworking which made this process so smooth and my life much easier. Now you may be thinking, okay, she is lovely and considerate and communicative and very pleasant to work with, but can she negotiate price? The answer is 100% YES. When it came to this point, she really made sure I was not overpaying a penny which is what you want when you're making a purchase of any kind.

To sum it up, Nancy is hard-working yet patient, incredibly intelligent yet she has no arrogance or ego, and she is so considerate, respectful and pleasant yet she's a completely strong, powerhouse boss babe who doesn't waste anyone's time. This gives me the confidence to say that whether you are purchasing for personal or investment, or selling a property, Nancy Che is your gal. I will definitely be working with her again in the future.

reviews.name: Omer Rotem
reviews.text: Nancy is simply phenomenal. From the moment I sat down with her for the first time and throughout the entire process, she was always there to help me and patiently answer all the questions I've had. She made a stressful process feel like a breeze. She was also able to provide great contacts for inspectors, mortgage brokers and real estate lawyers. I just can't wait to move into the new place I just purchased with her help!

Once I found a home I loved, she did everything she could to get me a fair price and she did everything in her power to help me understand the buying process. When we had some hiccups she took charge and made sure I was happy and satisfied. Nancy made my first home buying experience a very positive one and eased my stress as much as she could.  When and if the time comes for me to sell and buy again I wouldn’t hesitate to contact Nancy to help.

title: Amir Miri Personal Real Estate Corporation - Royal Pacific Realty Corp.
address: 1200 W 73rd Ave #100, Vancouver, BC V6P 6G5, Canada

reviews.name: farshad nasimi
reviews.text:
I had multiple deals and worked with Amir and his great team to get them done. Amir is an excellent agent with a friendly attitude and professional behavior, always smile on the face but serious in the procedures.
Selling and buying a house/condo is a stressful job for everyone and especially time-sensitive in the Vancouver market. From my standpoint, having an agent beside you to genuinely contribute in your thought process, be responsive day and night, have a sense of urgency when it comes to closing the deal, being forthright, share his honest recommendations, and being a good listener are the attributes of an ideal realtor which I think Amir has all these qualities. Sometimes people's life-savings money is in the realtors' hands, and if they are not honest and trustworthy, then a significant financial loss will be inevitable. In this industry, we need more of him and his team to boost morale and trust.
He was busy but extremely communicative and easy to reach to answer any of our questions at all times. I highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Nikou Heidarian
reviews.text: Amir has an outstanding understanding of housing market in Northshore. His smart analysis and expertise to spot treasures at the right price were the key to our success in purchasing a valuable property in West vancouver. I absolutely recommend Amir and his team as they are trustworthy, honest and professionals. We will definitely work with them in our next purchase.

reviews.name: alexa baughen
reviews.text: Amir and his team went above and beyond our expectations in selling our home. They were professional, market savvy, creative and patient. We would highly recommend them to anyone and are so grateful for their hard work. Thanks guys!

reviews.text: We engaged Amir to sell our Property in North Vancouver and he did an excellent job. He came in with a plan and was very clear about what he wanted to do and how he was going to do it. It was a pleasure working with Amir. He went above and beyond our expectations and worked hard to find a perfect home for us.
He is very personable, sincere and above all professional.
Despite his young age he proved most resourceful and determined. I would strongly recommend him.
Thank you!

reviews.text: It's always exciting to recommend other successful professionals. After all our recommendations are a direct representations of us! We highly recommend working with Amir Miri. He is a hard working, honest and goes out of his way to cater to his clients.  Always a pleasure working with you Amir!

reviews.name: Vahideh Hasouri
reviews.text: Amir Miri is very efficient, professional, generous and reliable. He sold my house higher than what I expected in West Vancouver.

He is a very honest guy and can help anybody with buying/selling a home.  He has a lot of patience and I will do business with him again in the future and recommend him to all my friends and family

With Amir, I have seen first hand the integrity, dedication, and service quality that he puts into his work to ensure his clients are well served and protected. He’s a top performer, and for my team, it’s always a pleasure working with him!

reviews.text: I would strongly recommend Amir Miri who is an experienced professional in realstate .Amir can handel complicated deals with his leadership characteristics and market acumen.He can easily make trust in deals which will lead to a win-win situation for all parties.
