title: Dimitri Psihas P.R.E.C. - Heart of Vancouver and Stilhavn Real Estate Services
address: 36 E 5th Ave, Vancouver, BC V5T 1G8, Canada

reviews.name: Letitia Gill
reviews.text: Dimitri is incredible to work with, and helped my husband and I find our first home! He’s professional, hardworking, responsive, and has such a great understanding of the market— making sure we were equipped with realistic expectations along the way. His insights were so valuable (and spot on). We truly appreciated his approach, and could tell that he genuinely wanted to make sure we found a place that was right for us, while also helping us with our “big picture” goals. Dimitri made our first time home buying experience so comfortable— we always felt in great hands. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: bryce
reviews.text:
Dimitri recently helped me find a home to purchase in the city. He was highly recommended to me from two separate people and I see why.

Dimitri is professional with every aspect of his work. His efficiency and transparency was evident from the beginning, and he helped me navigate the entire process of purchasing a home in a very clear and straightforward manner. He is a great communicator and always made sure that I understood what I needed to do to purchase the property, while keeping me informed with progress as it happened. He consistently  provided me with prompt replies and took the time to answer any of the questions that I had. He made sure there were no surprises.

Dimitri is also a genuine person who operates with honesty and integrity and most important, carries a friendly and welcoming demeanor. I recommend him as a real estate agent for anyone who is looking.

reviews.name: Peter Chipkin
reviews.text:
Dimitri advised us on our staging, list price, acceptance strategy.
He got us multiple offers
He negotiated a staggering deal
He found us a new home
He sealed the deal with a great negotiation. We paid 100k less than we were prepared to spend.
All of this in 15 days since we listed.
Somehow we traded up and liberated some capital.
Great outcome.

When you go looking at open houses with Dimitri you will see how other realtors hold him in high regard. He is well known. He is well liked.

If you are a top negotiator, know the market inside out in terms of price and staging, know all the risks you might encounter - even then you would do well with Dimitri on your side.

Putting our trust in Dimitri really paid off.
Thank you

reviews.name: Brooke Allen
reviews.text: Dimitri is amazing! I can't say enough about what an awesome realtor Dimitri is! He has a vast amount of experience and knowledge and goes above and beyond finding you a home — he also found me a cleaner, painter, handy-person, and mover. Moreover, he is always available, answered all of my questions, and nothing was too trivial or silly. He genuinely wanted to find me my dream condo and he found me a place that is above and beyond what I could have hoped for. The whole experience was easy and quick and that was because of Dimitri. If I ever want to sell and buy again, I'm calling Dimitri :D

reviews.name: Joshua Hundert
reviews.text:
Dimitri is amazing at what he does. And what he does is navigate the Vancouver real estate market like a total ace. When we started talking about selling our apartment (in the middle of a pandemic no less!) we had a great chat with Dimitri and started sketching out a game plan. From the very beginning, Dimitri’s experience and knowledge of the market brought an ease and confidence to the process, and that was invaluable. In a time of relative uncertainty, he gave us the assurance we needed to stay poised and patient and that is certainly what made the difference.

Dimitri is a professional in every aspect.

Staging, photos, videos and marketing? He knows the little tweaks that had our place looking amazing.

Scheduling, logistics and communication? Dimitri was super fast to respond at all times and is a very clear communicator.

Managing expectations and emotions? He’s been in virtually every situation many times before and that experience creates so much ease and confidence.

When it came time to field offers and negotiate, Dimitri had the correct advice. He navigated everything in a way that had everyone feeling comfortable and happy.

And, of course, you can’t really talk about Dimitri without mentioning what a genuinely good person he is. He’s just nice to be around.

We would not hesitate to recommend Dimitri to anyone at anytime.

Thank you so much, again, Dimitri! You made a potentially stressful process so straightforward and logical. Cheers!

reviews.name: Tania Jamus
reviews.text:
My husband and I had the pleasure to work with Dimitri when we decided to purchase our first home in Canada. He was able to answer all our questions along the way and guide us through the intrinsic of the process. Always available to talk, he understood what we wanted from the start and made us feel safe when making the final decision.
He was very professional, friendly, trustworthy, open and honest throughout the entire process and we would highly recommend Dimitri to anyone who is in need of a realtor.

reviews.name: Wendi Lanthier
reviews.text:
Dimitri helped my husband and I purchase a condo in 2014.   He was so professional and informative with the whole process, and found us the perfect place in an amazing location.
He just helped us sell that same condo and worked so hard to get us the best  price.
Highly recommend him to anyone.

reviews.name: Amanda Abel
reviews.text: We are so glad we chose to have Dimitri to sell our home.  We planned on meeting with a few realtors to find the right one for us, but once we met with Dimitri, we knew our search was over.  He impressed us with his vast knowledge of the market, had detailed plans on how best to sell our home for top dollar (which he did), and made the process easy for us.  He was quick to respond to any questions we had and kept us calm during the process.  I’d highly recommend Dimitri for your real estate needs.

reviews.name: T. Kennedy
reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Dimitri both buying and selling. Dimitri is a remarkably efficient and professional realtor, and at the same time, he is a genuinely nice person. He takes the time not only to understand  and take care of a client’s real estate needs but also to understand the person and to make a personal connection, facilitating easy communication and successful business interactions at the same time.  He sincerely cares about his clients. He has a vast wealth of knowledge, and his advice is invaluable and spot on.  He is driven, positive in attitude, meticulous with detail, and readily available for communication. He is also simply pleasant to talk to. When he had my place on the market this past summer during the pandemic, he was impeccable about Covid protocols. I was moving out of town, and he not only referred me to a realtor in my new town, but he also stayed in touch to provide support.  One day, when the deal on place I had put an offer on looked like it was going to collapse over an inspection issue, out of the blue he called me and said, “I thought you could use some support about now.”  Thanks for that, Dimitri!  He’s a keeper.

reviews.name: Susie Chang
reviews.text: We have known Dimitri for over 7 years and we are so thankful for his hard work ethic and dedication to clients. 7 years ago he helped us find a downtown condo and subsequently sell a Burnaby condo. Most recently, he helped us to buy a detached home and sell our townhouse in the crazy Vancouver housing market - all within a span of 5 days. All 4 transactions went super smoothly, prices exceeding expectations, and I think it's largely due to his willingness to do his 'homework' upfront and being prepared. He knows his stuff (and luckily, we listened to him) and he always has our best interest in mind. He's always been very proactive - in fact, that is how he became our realtor, when we showed up at his open house and he reached out afterwards. We cannot recommend Dimitri enough to help with any personal real estate needs.

reviews.name: Arleen Thio Tyndall
reviews.text:
It was a pleasure to work with Dimitri who is very patient and understanding of our unique needs. He is very responsive with communication. We appreciate his direct no-nonsense practical advice and his attention to details.  Our ever-changing plans and ideas didn’t seem to phase him.
We would recommend Dimitri for selling and buying a home!

reviews.name: Bruno James
reviews.text: Me and my wife had a great experience on home buying with Dimitri. His answers to our many questions has always been quick and assertive. He made himself available at any day and anytime. He got the keys and accompanied us for a visit during holiday in a unit that eventually come to be our home. All of this in less then 24 hours. We definitely recommend him for his dedication and professionalism.

reviews.name: Cristian Slavik
reviews.text: Dimitri is super helpful and knowledgeable. We always received quick feedback to all our questions and requests. My wife and I had a trip scheduled for a few days after we visited the place we loved, which made us super concerned about putting in an offer. Dimitri managed to coordinate all the documents online with us to make it happen. He has great contacts with all the professionals you will need in this process which is very helpful. We are very happy!!!

reviews.name: Shelley Baigent
reviews.text:
My husband and I have had the pleasure of working with Dimitri on two occasions for our real estate needs. Most recently, in January 2020, for the purchase of our condo in WR.

Working with Dimitri is an amazing experience and we have nothing but praise for him.  The service he provides is exceptional, in fact, unsurpassed!  Dimitri is honest and caring and his dedication is unwavering.   He was always available to discuss our needs, his response time to our questions was extremely prompt, and we never had to ask for something more than once.  I would be remiss if I didn’t mention that he is always early for his appointments (a trait my husband and I both appreciate).

Dimitri’s knowledge and understanding of the market, coupled with his years of experience, means there are no surprises.  Providing detailed justification, he gives sound advice and, with both of our transactions, his strategy and pricing were bang on.

We tell everyone about Dimitri. He is the best, a true professional, a 10/10, and we highly recommend him for your real estate needs.

Shelley and Jim

reviews.name: Aaron Sandhar
reviews.text: We would highly recommend Dimitri to anyone looking for real state agent. He is very professional and responsive. He has exceptional knowledge of the industry and that was helpful throughout the buying process.

reviews.name: Joan Pearson
reviews.text:
I met Dimitri when I was interviewing 4 different realtors from 4 different companies in April of this year.
In a lockdown. In the midst of a pandemic.
There was no question of which professional of the 4 to choose: he was the most considerate and positive - outlining the need to go through the viewing process with every possible Covid-19 security measure.
He knew I was conflicted about selling my place: he understood from the beginning that this was not real estate to me - this was my home. And I thought of it as my sanctuary.
He also knew I wanted to get a fair market price - even during a pandemic.
In other words, Dimitri ‘got’ me.

He did everything in his power to make this transaction as simple and as stress free as possible.
I am just so grateful that I found him and that he has handled all aspects of this journey electronically, with as little contact as possible. Through it all he has never failed to show kindness and understanding.

He has offered his help through every possible stage of the sale and I know I could call on him anytime with questions or concerns.
He’s not only thoroughly professional but his kindness and willingness to help has been wonderful.
I can recommend Dimitri with no reservation. I was lucky to find him

reviews.name: MARK KORST
reviews.text:
We have purchased and sold our homes with Dimitri.  We have nothing but praise for his honest, sincere,
and professional dealings with everyone involved with our transactions. He went above and beyond to
consummate our deals on our behalf.  He was always available to discuss our needs, even when he was out
of the country on a holiday. We appreciated that he respected our time and was always on time for appointments.

We highly recommend Dimitri to assist you with your real estate needs.  A true professional.

reviews.name: kathy nicholson
reviews.text: From the very first moment we met Dimitri(and he was early, which my husband loved) he showed an excellent knowledge of the real estate market and gave us sound advice. We knew  we could count on and trust Dimitri in every way. All questions and concerns were answered promptly and with such a caring manner. He is such a dedicated, passionate and professional person who truly helps every client as best as he can. We both highly recommend Dimitri Psihas.

reviews.name: Govind Dandekar
reviews.text: Dimitri is a consummate professional.  He is honest, straightforward and a pleasure to work with.  He is also incredibly efficient, has deep knowledge of market trends, and always places his clients first.  We've used him on two different home purchases and have been very happy both times.  Recommend without hesitation!

reviews.name: J J
reviews.text:
Helped us get into the condo we wanted.  Very knowledgeable in the industry.  Handsome and kind. No complaints.
A+

reviews.name: John M
reviews.text: In early-2019 an addition to our family necessitated the sale of our downtown loft so that we could move to a bigger property. Having had a great experience with him on the purchase of the property in 2014, seeking his assistance with the sale was a no brainer. Despite declining market conditions, Dimitri assisted us in getting top dollar on the sale and his advice was invaluable as we worked through the sale process in a challenging market. Dimitri is extremely responsive and accessible at all times, however most importantly he knows the Vancouver market as well as anyone. I look forward to working with Dimitri again in the future.

reviews.name: Jim Kosolowski
reviews.text:
My wife and I met Dimitri about 3 years ago while attending an open house in Fairview.  It was a chance meeting, and we were clearly not interested in that unit, but Dimitri took the time to get a feel for what we were looking for and  provided significant insights into the market at the time even though he knew we were already working with another agent. He got us on his real estate market update mailing list too.

When it was time for us to sell, he was the go to agent, and as seen in all of his other reviews, he was always punctual, always did what he said he would do and always provided a comprehensive view of where the market was and where our product fit in. The result was a sale at the price he forecast within the time frame predicted to our complete satisfaction.  We will not hesitate to work with Dimitri in the future.

Jim and Shelley

reviews.name: Diane Edgeworth
reviews.text: Dimitri recently sold our condo at above our expectations. He was great to work, well-informed on the housing market, specifically the Mount Pleasant/Olympic Village area, as well as strong in negotiation tactics. We felt confident selling our home with Dimitri that we would get the highest value and end up satisfied while not feeling pressured on price or timing.  All of the photos and marketing materials, including social media posts that Dimitri took care of were high quality and represented our unit to it's best.  We definitely recommend working with Dimitri for buying or selling, and look forward to doing so again in the future.

reviews.name: Joe Tan
reviews.text:
Many great qualities for what I consider makes for a great real estate agent:
1) on the ball ! Response time has never been more than a few minutes! And even when he was on holidays outside the country, it wasn’t more than an hour at most!
2) knows the industry, knows the area, knows how to market! I can’t recommend anyone more highly motivated !
3) answered ALL my questions, went over all the options, explained strategies, but most importantly got results!!!
I’d give him six stars if I could!!
I will definitely return to him for my next purchase!

reviews.name: Curtis
reviews.text:
We used Dimitri for both our sale and purchase of a home, and he was great to work with.  After a very thorough initial meeting, we were quickly getting recommendations on properties that fit exactly as we had discussed.
We listed our condo and he was able to sell it in 2 days, without an open house, and above our price expectations (despite the fact that a similar unit in our building had been listed for well over a month).  Once we found our new home, he was also great with the negotiations and closing process and made the entire experience seamless.
Dimitri worked hard to make himself available when we needed him, and would definitely recommend him to anyone in the Vancouver area, and will be using him again in the future.

reviews.name: Heidi Pukalo
reviews.text: It was a pleasure dealing with Dimitri. He is a professional thru and thru.  His knowledge and drive to succeed helped keep me on track when it came to selling my home of 42 years. When I wavered he was there with advise,   encouragement and also sympathy. I would highly recommend Dimitri to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

reviews.name: Beauty In Vancity
reviews.text: Dimitri has handled multiple listings for me, both sale and purchase. His level of integrity, knowledge, and his ability to guide you through the real estate market to find what you need is unparalleled. I highly recommend his services.

reviews.name: Denise Kwo
reviews.text: Dimitri is a true professional. He is knowledgeable and attentive to details, and very responsive. He made the process of selling our condo easy and stress free from the moment we contacted him. He got us above our asking price and really knows the market well. I would definitely recommend his services.

reviews.name: Jody Wawryk
reviews.text: Dimitri marketed and sold our apartment in Mount Pleasant area recently. His attention to detail and knowledge of the market was very helpful. We appreciated his insight and genuine and friendly personality. We would definitely recommend him to others in the future.

reviews.name: Philip Tsao
reviews.text: Dimitri helped us find a great deal on a 2 bedroom and also helped us sell our place for way over asking.  He's got a very wide breadth of knowledge and experience and was able to answer our questions and give advice quickly.  Will definitely use Dimitri again in the future!

reviews.name: Herb Barbolet
reviews.text:
Here it is.

Dimitri was unrelenting in both his determination to sell our present condo and to find us the best new home within our budget.

He was ever attentive and patient with us for rapidly changing our criteria, as our  understanding developed about this very difficult market.

We wound up selling for our asking price and buying below the seller's. Quite a feat.

Thank you so much Dimitri

reviews.name: Nate McAvoy
reviews.text: Dimitri and I have shared many clients and it is always a real pleasure to work with such a professional.  He is always on top of their needs and his communication with them and myself is top notch!  I highly recommend Dimitri to anyone looking at buying or selling real estate in Vancouver; as I have no hesitation in sending my own clients to him.

reviews.name: thomas linkswiler
reviews.text: Dimitri was able to connect me with a fantastic Agent despite living over 1,500 miles away from his city. Even if you're not local, he likely knows someone that is more than capable than taking care of you!

reviews.name: L W
reviews.text: Dimitri is an amazing realtor and went above and beyond for us. His knowledge of the market is incredible and I truly believe that if wasn't for him we wouldn't have found our first home. He respected our budget and our wishes while showing us the best properties available. I can't thank him enough.

reviews.name: Courtney Wing
reviews.text: Working with Dimitri was a real treat. I couldn't have imagined and more professional experience when buying my apt in Olympic Village. Dimitri was extremely thorough with answering any question or concerns I ever had and provided me with more information than I asked for. He's extremely prompt with text/phone call replies, sort of like lightening speed actually. And not only did he facilitate in helping me find lawyers, house cleaners, and any other service I needed once I moved into my new place, but he continued to follow up with me many months later to make sure I had settled into my new home comfortably. I couldn't recommend Dimitri more as a top-notch Realtor who will go above and beyond for anyone looking to buy in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Mark Tiberio
reviews.text: Dimitri was fantastic. Great insight on the market. Ended up negotiating a deal until midnight with the seller. Cant thank him enough for his hard work. Would certainly recommend him to others.

reviews.name: Stephanie Twarog
reviews.text: I appreciated his professional manner, expertise and honesty while working with him during the sale of my property.  I would highly recommend Dimitri for your Real Estate needs!

reviews.name: Kat
reviews.text: Dimitri is a top notch realtor.  He's very professional, knowledgeable, and quick to respond to any inquiries. I would not hesitate to recommend him to friends and family wanting to either buy or sell a home.

reviews.name: Olaf Becker
reviews.text:
We used Dimitri for both the sale of our house and an investment condo.

Dimitri provided excellent promotional material, including 3D walk through, social media advertising, great photography and floorplans.

He is always quick to respond to inquiries and questions and usually responded immediatly.

Our house sold quickly to our satisfaction even though we were in a challenging market, our condo sold 20% over asking price with 15 offers !!

We fully recommend Dimitri and would use him again in the future.

reviews.name: Anastasia Fedorova
reviews.text: We are truly happy to work with Dimitri. He is the best realtor, we ever met. He is highly professional and extremely knowledgeable. I would highly recommend Dimitri to my friends and family.

reviews.name: Cookie Boyle
reviews.text: Dimitri exceeded my expectations. He took care of all aspects of our sale. Throughout what can be a stressful experience, he was professional, accessible, supportive and straightforward. He was a true pleasure to work with and we proudly recommend him to our friends and family.

reviews.name: Karinga Wells
reviews.text: I've bought and sold with him and it's been smooth sailing both times. He is detail oriented and concise. Dimitri also has a In depth knowledge of the market and works tirelessly on behalf of his clients.

reviews.name: Haylee C
reviews.text: Dimitri was very professional and attentive to the requirements we wanted in a house. He was very respectful and patient as we viewed over 40 homes before we purchased our home. Would definately recommend him to our family and friends!

reviews.name: Lily Cheung
reviews.text:
We happen to stubble upon Dimitri in one of his openhouses while we were out looking for a place when we had our second baby. Dimitri helped us move from a small condo to a town home to now a beautiful house in the last 5 years. He's also helped my mother-in-law found a great investment property in Olympic Village yielding really great rental income. You can ask him tonnes of questions everyday (some silly and some meaningful), he's always answering each and every one patiently. The process of completing a deal in the recent market can be VERY stressful (and that's an understatement), so it's really important to find someone you can trust who's always on your side and has your best interest in mind. From start to finish, Dimitri was on top of every small detail from photos, listing to completion. He would even stop you from making rash mistake of offering 'too much', or accepting an offer that's 'too low'. He will try his best to negotiate for the best price possible!

The most important thing is, he's transparent, knowledgeable and offers honest advise in terms of managing any situation, hiccups that can go wrong with completing a deal. We could not have asked for a better realtor to work with. At the end of the day, our family finally, after many moves found our perfect home, and was able to make some money along the way : )

reviews.name: Stephan Berthiaume
reviews.text:
Efficient, market-savvy and a definite asset. My wife and I are from QC and wanted to invest in a unit for our pre-retirement. We hooked up with Dimitri with our list of needs. Visited units that corresponded and completed a sale rapidly. Dimitri,s servces extended beyond the traditional offer.
We definitely recommend him and the Re/Max Westside team.

reviews.name: Greg
reviews.text:
Dimitri is a realtor that works in the best interest of his clients and will stand behind them. He does his research on the current market you are selling in and gives good advice on what is the best approch to the sale of your property, and is more than willing to help out in all aspects from sweeping the deck, to being the security guy at the door over seeing the stagers move in to make your condo ready  to sell.  He has a host of tradepeople at hand should you need assistance to do repairs or cleanup.
We used him for the purchase of our new place as well, and he was patient and understanding of what our needs were and looked for the appropriate showings for us to view.  Dimitri understood that it may take a while to find our "place" and was willing to wait it out with us with no pressure to buy quickly.
Dimitri is a realtor who has integrity and has a way that you do not feel as though you are being handled.  Would we use him again, Absolutely !
G. Mah

reviews.name: Kaya Rosenbloom
reviews.text:
Having purchased a 2-bedroom condo pre-construction at Block 100 in the Olympic Village, I was one day checking on the progress of the building when Dimitri approached me and struck up a conversation.  It turns out he was also living in the neighborhood and had also purchased a unit at Block 100.  After a nice chat, he requested my personal info and offered to keep me informed on market developments, which I obliged despite not having a need for his services and already knowing dozens of realtors.

Following our meeting, Dimitri immediately followed up and proceeded to do exactly as he said and keep me informed on market trends and developments.  I was impressed with his professionalism and deep understanding of the market.

When the time came for me to sell my 1-bedroom condo in the Olympic Village, I decided to take a flyer on him despite knowing other great realtors.  In this market, you need to partner with someone knowledgeable, professional, honest and accountable, and I could sense he was all those things.  It amazes me how many people settle with such mediocrity and then get taken advantage of by harder working realtors with a deeper understanding of valuations, superior negotiating skills, etc.  You can either pay a fee and get nothing in return (worse yet, cost you money), or you can partner with someone like Dimitri and have them make you money and close deals.

Dimitri ended up successfully selling my 865 square foot 1 bedroom for a new record high in the village at that time.  Following that, we purchased a 1-bedroom rental unit at Meccanica.  Everything played out exactly as he had predicted.  The unit I sold had less appreciable upside and prices plateaued following my sale over the coming year.  The rental unit we purchased had at least a dozen offers, and we only won due to our aggressive bid as was advised by Dimitri at the time.  Finally, he had boldly predicted that the purchased unit would topple $1K a square foot in the near future, and a year later comparable units are selling well over that amount.  All in all, his advice and hard work has put us in an excellent position and I'm grateful for his council and hard work as our agent.

I would wholeheartedly recommend Dimitri to anyone considering his services and will continue to use him as my realtor go forward.

title: Leilani Fong PREC* -Top Vancouver Real Estate Specialist
address: 701 W Georgia St #1500, Vancouver, BC V7Y 1C6, Canada

reviews.name: Kevin Chan
reviews.text: We spent years looking for our perfect home and Leilani patiently helped us through the whole time.  We were so happy to finally find something this year and can't wait to move into it.  Leilani provided great service and was very responsive and helpful throughout the entire process.

reviews.name: Sally Thompson
reviews.text: As a real estate photographer, I've worked with many agents over the years. There are some agents that just want a listing but don't do anything to help the sale. I've shot a couple of listings for Leilani recently, and I am very impressed with her knowledge and how she treats her clients. She knows the market, and she is always at the shoot, does her own staging, making sure the home is photo ready, which as a photographer is very much appreciated. She even sold one of her recent listings within the first week of listing it. Leilani is a genuine person, who truly has her clients best interests in mind. She is my first choice for a realtor.

reviews.name: Akshay Balakrishnan
reviews.text:
Leilani is everything I needed from a realtor, and more! She helped me buy a condo in 2016, and did a great job of finding places to view that were in my budget and desired neighborhoods. Halfway through, I realized what I really prioritized in a new place, and Leilani adjusted the viewing schedule to match my new priorities well.
Later, when I needed to find a tenant for the condo, she helped with that search as well. It was especially appreciated because I was unable to be in the same city around that time, and couldn't host viewings for the whole time I was looking. The tenant we eventually found and signed with was an amazing tenant, which was no surprise because Leilani did all the background checking and legwork perfectly.
More recently, I decided to sell the condo. Leilani walked me through the process, including advising me on the proper steps for dealing with the tenant at the time. We communicated regularly, but she never put undue pressure on me to lower my desired price, or to accept unreasonable offers. She even helped me find a handyman to take care of issues with my unit as part of the sale conditions.
Start to finish, Leilani has been an excellent realtor who I can truly trust. I would recommend her to any of my friends who are looking, and will ask for her when I'm back in the real estate market. Thank you, Leilani!

reviews.name: Kari Rodgers
reviews.text: We can’t speak high enough about Leilani, and recommend her for any home purchase or sale. From start to finish she was professional, hardworking, and committed. Leilani helped us sell our Coquitlam home in under one week, and achieved 14 offers. We were extremely pleased with her level of real estate expertise and her passion for what she does. She streamlined the process for us, and we were very grateful and happy we chose her. Thank you very much Leilani, we would love to work with you again in the future.

reviews.name: Sherri Rogers
reviews.text: Leilani was my realtor when I bought my condo in 2008, and then walked me through the process of selling it 12 years later. Leilani has excellent marketing skills! Her contacts for photography and cleaning made my apartment look stunning, and her social media promotion brought over 80 people to the open house. She had perfect timing when she suggested I list my place- I got 14 offers and it sold in less than a week. Leilani was so supportive as we went through the process, and her quick sales are a testament to her experience, confidence and knowledge. She really is the best at what she does!

reviews.name: Luis Fonseca
reviews.text: Leilani has been our favorite realtor for more than 10 years. She is goal oriented and always gets the job done. We highly recommend her whether you want to buy or sell a place.

reviews.name: Sandra Harsidi
reviews.text:
Working with Leilani was a great pleasure. Leilani sold our place after just a couple of weeks on the market with multiple offers.  Being able to sell the place during this pandemic time is amazing. To top if off, we sold the place for a price more than the selling price! Leilani was very knowledgeable, passionate of her work, very punctual and always gave us the right advice.
If you or anyone is looking for a real estate agent that is caring, very professional and would go above and beyond throughout the process,  I would say, contact Leilani!
Thanks Leilani!

reviews.name: Jenny Fung
reviews.text:
Leilani goes above and beyond for her clients. This is my third time using Leilani to purchase a home and I would not hesitate to use her again.

My husband and I started looking at homes when the market started to pick up. Unfortunately, all the homes we liked all had accepted offers already. Leilani reassured us that she would do everything in her power to find us a place and was confident of that. Because of this we were confident in her.

She made sure that we saw any new property right away and after a couple of weeks we found a place! After reading through the documents Leilani had some concerns and we decided to not move forward. She was upfront and gave us all the information and let us decide whether to move forward. She never pressured us to buy and always had our best interest at heart.

We did eventually find a place which we got a great price on! She fought for us till the end. Even when we finally got our keys and were disappointed with the cleanliness of the unit, Leilani took it upon herself to hire her own cleaners to ensure that it was cleaned properly.

Leilani is very knowledgeable about the market. She is also hardworking, caring and always has your back. I would highly suggest her to anyone that wants a realtor that is not just your salesperson but also your friend, advisor and trusted confidant.

reviews.name: emily jeong
reviews.text:
Still looking for a realtor? Don’t look any further and contact Leilani. She is hands down the best realtor that I have ever met and hired. Having a 7month old baby, it seemed impossible for us to painlessly sell our condo and buy a detached house in the Lower Mainland. Well, we did it within a month – all thanks to Leilani!
We interviewed several realtors before we decided to hire Leilani, and here is why we chose her:
She impressed us with her ability to actively listen and respect our priorities, her strong marketing and negotiation skills, and last but not least, her engaging personality and passion for real estate.
Long story short, she did not disappoint us. She voluntarily organized and staged our cluttered condo, managing to sell our place within a couple of weeks with multiple offers in a buyer’s market. In addition, she helped us pick a great place while pointing out important factors that we hadn’t thought about as parents; she offered to personally go to some open houses and shared her thoughts. She continuously negotiated on our behalf until she got the best offer.
Leilani is a realtor who personally inspired me. She made me believe that nothing is impossible with her great work ethic and passion. Just give her a call if you are thinking of buying or selling. She won’t disappoint you!

reviews.name: ray hernandez
reviews.text:
What an outstanding and amazing real estate agent!
Leilani was not only able to sell our place within two weeks but she also did it during this Covid Pandemic...now that’s awesome!
So many questions were answered as she made our decision less stressful. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking to sell their residence

reviews.name: adriana gutierrez
reviews.text: We are very happy to have met Leilani, we were selling our condo in PoCo last September with another realtor and we had it on the market for three months and nothing was happening, we were desperate and our prior realtor was only giving us false hopes without any effort from her side, when we met Leilani, we saw right away that there are levels to this. She immediately show us what we were doing wrong, and what we could improved, she staged fully our place. We could see that she is fully experienced in the market and marketing, We had an incredible amount of people coming over in the first open house, and in only two weeks she sold our condo! Words cannot express how grateful we’re with her!

reviews.name: Tanya Miller
reviews.text:
Leilani Fong is a rock star!
Short version: *Hire her immediately*
Long version: I would not be surprised if I have been one of her most annoying clients. I live in the Netherlands, I was difficult to get hold of, I was preoccupied and really not engaged as I should have been... I would have fired me. Instead, Leilani took care of everything from painting, repairs, furniture removal, to new keys and literally got me 15% more than I thought I could legitimately expect. In a downward turning market, she was able to create a buzz and a bidding war. I could not recommend her more highly!
Thank you, Leilani. Looking forward to seeing you in person and giving you a hug 🙂🤗

reviews.name: Helen Bowman
reviews.text:
My boyfriend and I were referred to Leilani by our mortgage broker to help us buy our first home. After speaking with several Realtors, we knew that Leilani would be the best fit for us, due to her extensive knowledge and experience, honesty, and client-focused attitude.

Leilani made the home-buying process as smooth and stress-free as it can possibly get! She supported us at every step along the way, viewing listings with us, answering our questions, offering practical advice, and providing valuable information on market conditions. She consistently went above and beyond to accommodate our evolving needs, and worked tirelessly to negotiate a good deal on our behalf. We are very happy with our purchase, and this was all thanks to Leilani’s efforts.

If you are looking for a professional, proactive Realtor who will work hard for you and take your interests to heart, look no further than Leilani. It’s been a genuine pleasure working with Leilani, and we would happily recommend her services to anyone looking to buy or sell in Greater Vancouver!

reviews.name: Mark Breslaw
reviews.text: Just SOLD by the incredible Leilani Fong! From the market assessment to setting the ideal listing price to beautifully staging, Leilani went above and beyond.  The outcome of her work was multiple offers and a sale above asking price within 7 days.  Leilani exceeded our expectations every step of the way! 5 star approach, 5 star results.

reviews.name: samantha k
reviews.text:

She has an extensive marketing plan which includes actively getting your property out there so that the first open house is a success. In our complex the average time it took to sell a condo was 100 days. Leilani sold ours in 7 days!

If you are looking to sell your home and you want a hardworking agent that will get you results then call Leilani. She is the best!

reviews.name: MNP
reviews.text: We recently had the pleasure of working with Leilani to sell our Vancouver condo. She made the entire process as seamless and easy for us as possible. Her attention to detail, marketing and staging of our property helped us complete our sale within 5 days of listing, with multiple offers, above listing! For comparison, other units had sat on the market for months. We would not hesitate to work with Leailani again or recommend her to anyone!

reviews.name: Josh Thiessen
reviews.text:
Leilani makes buying a place as painless as possible. She was professional, knowledgeable, efficient, and very responsive. She had valuable insight into the market and provide additional info on the different areas I was looking at.

I would recommend connecting with her even if you're only considering getting into the market. A great partner to help you with your property buying journey.

reviews.name: Shannon Bytelaar
reviews.text: Lelani helped my partner and I with our first housing purchase . The professional service Lelani provided was a wonderful experience that we both highly recommend. Hire Lelani if you want a realtor that is knowledgeable, honest, and client-focused. Thanks for all your help!

reviews.name: Sunlit Forest
reviews.text:
As a first time home buyer, it was all a little overwhelming as to where to begin the search, which neighbourhood, and finding something I wanted within my price range. Leilani was with me every step of the way and guided me through the process, showing me multiple properties and providing me with quality referrals for other services such as a mortgage broker and home inspector.

She provided valuable information on the market and information about the different areas I was considering. After just one set of viewings she was able to find me the home I was looking for!

I would highly recommend her to anyone who is buying or selling a home in the Greater Vancouver area.

reviews.name: Jennifer Kimbley
reviews.text: It's too bad there's only five stars because Leilani deserves some more. She was phenomenal from start to finish. Viewing homes with her felt like I was shopping with a friend who only had my best interests at heart. I'm also happy to report that I bought a beautiful home for much less than asking price. I recommend Leilani without hesitation - she's the best.

reviews.name: joe nova
reviews.text:
Leilani was professional with a upbeat personality.
This was my second home. I wasn't entirely sure what I wanted , she worked with me saw listings and eventually found the right fit.

reviews.name: Andrew Wormsbecker
reviews.text: Leilani made the purchasing of our new condo very easy. She was appreciative of our busy schedule and efficiently organized a number of places to see apart from open houses. reviews.text:
Purchasing your first home is always an exciting but scary experience.  Leilani was extremely knowledgeable and patient throughout the entire process.

reviews.name: Anthony Kimbley
reviews.text: I couldn’t have bought my new home without Leilani’s help. She went above and beyond all expectations and having been out of the market for a while, her advice and expertise were invaluable. Thanks Leilani!

reviews.name: Kelsey Grubb
reviews.text: Leilani helped my husband and I purchase our first home and we were so happy with the outcome! Leilani met with us prior to our search, got all the necessary information to start helping us search for the perfect place. She attended open houses with us, gave us invaluable advice about placing offers, negotiating offers, reading all the documents, etc. We put a lot of trust in her as first time buyers and it definitely paid off! reviews.name: Kieran Brown
reviews.text: I Have worked with Leilani for years now she is a great realtor with a excellent attitude. She goes above and beyond for her customers from start to finish. I have no hesitation to recommend her to my clients. Rest assured you are in good hands when you use Leilani to list your property.

reviews.name: Justine Banigan
reviews.text: We recently put our condo on the market as we were getting ready to move into our new home.  With the real estate market slowing down, we knew that we needed an experienced professional that understood the new dynamics of the environment that we are in.  Leilani is not one to sit around and wait for the buyers to come.  She did an incredible job of marketing our home and proactively reaching out to potential buyers.  We were thrilled with the result and would definitely recommend Leilani to anyone looking to sell a property in the Greater Vancouver Region.

reviews.name: Alex
reviews.text: We have used Leilani for 2 home purchases now. In a market like Vancouver that is so competitive it is so important to have a realtor that is both knowledgeable and trustworthy. Leilani is always looking out for your best interest rather than just trying to make a commission. She is there to help you through every step of the process, from finding the right place, to making sure the building is sound and that you are making a good investment. She works with the selling realtor to make sure that your offer is heard and not just one of many offers that gets overlooked. Leilani goes above and beyond to make the transaction go as smoothly as possible for you, answering any questions and offering her guidance. We would recommend Leilani to anyone looking to buy or sell in Greater Vancouver and will definitely be using her again in the future.

reviews.name: Sonya Bahia
reviews.text:
our place was on the market since June we had no interest what so ever. Our old realtor kept making us reduce our price. The staging was terrible the marketing wasn’t great I was at the end of my rope.

Then deciding with my ex we wanted an second opinion. I was referred to Leilani by a friend. She is honestly a godsend. She not only beautifully staged our home she sold it within a week of it being on the market. She is nothing but professional and amazing. She looks out for her clients best interest I would highly recommend her to anyone!!!!💕💕

reviews.name: Krista Rand
reviews.text: Leilani helped us buy our first condo. We had twins on the way so time was a factor. Our new home is more than we had hoped for and we are happy to say we moved in 3 weeks before our boys arrived. Just in time! We are looking forward to watching them grow up in such a beautiful home and community! Thank you Leilani for being so easy to communicate with and helping us find our perfect little sanctuary! I will be recommending you to anyone looking for a professional, knowledgeable and friendly real estate agent.

reviews.name: Elizabeth Smith
reviews.text: I've known Leilani for years and always knew my partner and I would use her when we were ready to buy. Leilani has made our first home buying experience not only positive but enlightening! We learned so much about the market and all the work that goes into searching for that perfect home. She found us listings that were within our means and meet our wish list. Leilani was extremely accommodating and got us the answers to our questions quickly so that we were able to make the best and most informed decisions. In the end, Leilani helped us find the perfect starter home where we will have room to grow. We are so grateful to Leilani for making us and our search for our first home together a priority and cannot wait to move into our new place!

reviews.name: Lonely Cloud Design
reviews.text: I had my home previously listed with another realtor who was unsuccessful in selling my home.  Leilani was referred to me through a friend who was in a similar situation.  What I really appreciated about Leilani was that she was honest and upfront with me from the start.  She gave me an update on the market, and sales stats in the area.  She also showed me her extensive marketing package which included both door knocking and cold calling which most realtors don't do! Given that we were in a slower market, Leilani staged our home, and put every effort into getting as many people through the first open house as possible.  She was able to get us 2 offers and sold it within 7 days!  I am beyond happy about the results.  Because of her, we were able to move into our new home just in time!  Thanks Leilani!

reviews.name: Sarah Baird
reviews.text:
We hired Leilani to assist with the sale of my father's condo.  We realized that the market was slower and knew that we needed a Realtor that was going to work to get the home out there.  Leilani staged our home over a weekend, made calls to our neighbourhood and did a full marketing plan all before the first open house.

We had 28 groups come through and a full price offer!  We sold our home in 7 days where the average time of sale was 60 days!

We have nothing but good things to say about Leilani.  Her professionalism, hard work, effort and results speak for itself.  We would highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell!

reviews.name: Janice Grant
reviews.text: We can highly recommend Leilani; she was friendly, patient, knowledgeable and always very responsive to any questions we had. She is professional, astute and helped us achieve our selling goals with practical advice and guidance.  Leilani helped us buy our starter apartment and years later guided us towards the home of our dreams for our family to grow. We will forever be grateful for her knowledge of the market and guidance towards finding what we want.

reviews.name: christian gerevas
reviews.text: Great Realtor. We cannot say enough good things about Leilani. We originally hired a discount Realtor and had to fire her after She promised the moon but failed to sell  our Condo, You really do get what you pay for! Leilani came in and did a superb job and sold our place at asking price, She is very Honest and Professional We highly recommend Her.

reviews.name: Peggy Leung
reviews.text:
My husband and I were originally from Vancouver. When we relocated to Australia two years ago, we knew we needed someone we trust to handle the sale of our apartment in Vancouver. Leilani has a clear and in-depth knowledge about the fast changing property market in Vancouver. This is especially important for us as non-residents because we were no longer in touch with the market. After our initial failed attempt to sell the apartment, Leilani gave us a clear explanation on what the market was doing and how much our apartment was really worth. She gave us actionable strategies that would make a difference to the marketability of our property, and took it on herself to stage the entire apartment over the course of a weekend - an impressive task all on its own! Even with our time zone difference, Leilani kept us up to date with all communications without delay. Within a week, we received 2 offers and the apartment was sold!

Overall, what we most appeciated about Leilani was her clear and objective perspective throughout the property sale process. She was responsive to all our questions, and made our lives easier by handling small tasks that we could not do ourselves because we were not "on the ground". I would highly recommend Leilani if you're looking for a realtor as a non-resident, or simply someone who wants to get a second opinion on your current sale strategy.

Peggy and Rick
Noosa, Australia

reviews.name: Romana Eaton
reviews.text: We recently sold two downtown condos through Leilani. The service, communication and attention Leilani provided was exceptional. She kept us informed, provided excellent guidance through her knowledge of the market and the location, and made the process seamless. We sold both condo as we had hoped and were given professional, knowledgeable and friendly service from beginning to end...We will no doubt be using Leilani again in the future.

reviews.name: frank ham
reviews.text:
I found Leilani Fong to be very helpful and knowledgeable, she really went above and beyond. I could really feel and see her going the extra mile as my Realtor.

My wife and I have both sold and bought property using Leilani as our realtor and we've always come away very satisfied, even when the market conditions at one time weren't that great, we felt that we got the best we could and we felt that a large part of it was due to Leilani's advice and know-how.

We would highly recommend her as a Realtor

reviews.name: Kathryn Hunter
reviews.text: Leilani helped me buy my first condo, I could not be happier.  She was very responsive to all the questions I had, professional and negotiated a great deal on my condo. I will use her again in the future and will happily recommend her to people I know.

reviews.name: J215
reviews.text: Was referred from a friend. I've bought and sold a property with Leilani and I can't be any happier. She is efficient with communication, honest and friendly. Have no doubt she will work for your best interest

reviews.name: Ripped Geek
reviews.text: Leilani was extremely helpful when I was looking to buy my home. I felt that she was there to answer all my questions and even go above and beyond to keep me well informed. It is nice to deal with a genuine good person who breaks all those stereotypes about realtors. I will certainly enlist her to help me in the the future.

reviews.name: Kiel Landrigan
reviews.text:
Great service with an eye for detail!  Leilani has helped me purchase my last two properties, giving me great insight on what to look for, and most importantly what to avoid.

Thanks!

reviews.name: Krista Braun
reviews.text: Lelani helped us purchase our first home at the beginning of this year.  Being that we were new to the process, she walked us through each step thoroughly.  Lelani was always there for us to answer any questions and come with us to open houses.  When we finally chose our home, Lelani’s connections helped us in the negotiations.  We were SO happy to have gotten the place we wanted despite there being another competitive offer on the table.  I feel we might not have been so lucky had we gone with a different realitor.  Lelani is personable, open and she truly listened to what we were looking for...cause in the end...that is exactly what we got!  I will recommend her to all my family and friends or anyone who is looking for their next dream home.

reviews.name: Connie Shuk Mei So
reviews.text: Thanks to Leilani we sold our place in 2 days. She was great!

reviews.name: Joshua Topnik
reviews.text:
Leilani is my FIRST call when looking for a realtor.  She has consistently added value, provided support (and reassurance) all the while ensuring that what I paid was the best possible price.

Leilani was instrumental in selling my row home and purchasing my apartment in Langley, BC. (September 2013)

Furthermore, she used her network of Realtors to connect my girlfriend with a Realtor in Chilliwack resulting in her buying her first home within months of starting her search! (April 2014)

Leilani's attention was focused on me again this last year, as I looked to purchase a detached home in Abbotsford.  She worked with her network to quickly identify the houses that not only fit my budget but my requests for resale and rental income.  After three short months of house hunting in a HOT market Leilani helped me close on my first detached home. (November 2017)

If you are looking for a realtor, do yourself a favor, stop looking and start working with Leilani.

reviews.name: Tara Morellato
reviews.text: Leilani helped us wade through the craziness of buying in the lower Mainland and made the process very clear! Highly recommended!

title: CountryWide Real Estate Group
address: 701 W Georgia St #1500, Vancouver, BC V7Y 1C6, Canada

reviews.name: Joel Barter
reviews.text: Zia is at the top of his game! As a first time home buyer it was an intimidating process but zia and his team made it a walk in the park. It pays to have the right people on your side and hes the guy you want. Thanks for all your hard work!

reviews.name: Linda LAU
reviews.text:
Kory's group has been amazing. He really does listen to your needs and without any pressure he finds you amazing listings. I definitely had specific requirements for my next home that a traditional Google search couldn't do. I think I would have driven other realators crazy with my demands. He really made things so simple. Please please reach out to him for your real estate needs.

Seriously everyone, he speaks to you like a person and really cares about you! Also, he works in different cities and not just Metro Vancouver!

From the bottom of my heart, thank you!

reviews.name: Jose Escobar
reviews.text: Kory and Team have provided me with great options for potential homes. The team is knowledgeable, respectful and professional. As I am a new client in the marketplace, Kory and team have treated me with patience and kindness while looking for a home. I will recommend his services to family, friends and colleagues.

reviews.name: Joel Karlsson
reviews.text: I want to take a minute and share our House Hunting Journey, Kory Prince contacted us as we began looking for a home...since we looked at a Listing online he had advertised...it  asked us for our Email, then continued to send us updates. About 9 months later I contacted him again to say we had engaged with another Realtor but if he wanted he could narrow our search, he obliged and we found the Perfect Home for our Family...he got us info on the listing. before REW.CA could by a couple days...that was a great turning point for us, we feel it gave us an advantage to get in front of this homeowner sooner than expected and Close the Deal. If you want someone who gets the listings out ahead of time and genuinely wants too help, reach out to Kory and his team...

reviews.name: Jose Catibog
reviews.text: Very comprehensive listings. Easy to read and browse through, on mobile. Service was good and the leads fell into the parameters that I specified.

reviews.name: Darryl Dan
reviews.text: Zia was a true professional, he sold our town home in the Gabriola complex with a full price offer within 24 hours on the market. Incredible marketing job, great pictures and drone footage. Would recommend Zia and his team to anyone and everyone who is looking for realtor services.

reviews.name: Cory Delainey
reviews.text: Very quick responses, extremely helpful and professional

reviews.name: Jen Bodmer
reviews.text: As first time buyers we struck gold in finding Kory.  His easy-going personable nature made the entire process a pleasure.  Highly informed about the Vancouver market, he was extremely easy to work with, responded clearly and thoroughly to all of our questions, and found us an ideal property with lightning speed.  A shrewd and savvy negotiator, he was a strong and able advocate for our best interests and his friendly relationship with his professional network facilitated a smooth and rapid completion of the deal. reviews.name: Cristina Petersen
reviews.text: Kory helped me buy my first home, which I really love and have been very comfortable and happy in for the past year and a half. From the very start of our communication, Kory was always easy to contact and quick to reply. He was really helpful in providing current listings through my email and was careful not to send ones that were out of my budget or which did not suit my wish list. He was very professional, punctual and not pushy about my decisions. Being a first time home buyer, I had a lot to learn and it can be quite nerve wracking at times, but he was always patient and clear about what was going on, explaining the process and keeping me informed. He even came with me to my home inspection after I had put the offer in. I would not hesitate to recommend Kory to other friends or family and if I ever plan on selling my place and buying a new home, I would be happy to have Kory represent me as my realtor.

reviews.name: Alexey Antonjuk
reviews.text: Good team to work with!

reviews.name: Brad Reeder
reviews.text: Kory was great. We had a few speed bumps along the way with the sale our or home but he assured us we could trust him to get the job done and he did! He was always available and happy to answer any questions we had. Great guy, great realtor!

reviews.name: Ali Saedi
reviews.text:
I listed my condo with Kory and it was sold in a week. I had given him a wish list with a specific deadline. Kory did not disappoint! Kory and his team are very professional and know the market very well by matching your needs and wants to maximize your return.
It doesn't matter if you're buying a home or selling a home, they will make sure you are well taken care of right from the start.

I recommend him to anyone I know that is looking to buy or sell. Great experience.

reviews.name: Andy Day
reviews.text: We definitely did our homework when it came to finding a realtor and we could not have asked for a more understanding, compassionate, and truly thoughtful agent than Kory Prince. He was attentive and above all able to keep the deal together when faced with immense challenges. He remained in contact and kept us in the loop during the entire process and even helped coordinate a house we were selling in London, England. He did this all with optimism and a work ethic that has to been seen to be understood. If you are thinking of buying or selling a home, you cannot do better than Kory. If you would like to call us to discuss potentially hiring Kory, we have given Kory permission to share our phone #, we would be happy to chat.

reviews.name: Julie Sauve
reviews.text:
We highly recommend Kory Prince and his Team.  Rob and I met Kory by accident from registering to use his SearchOnlineListings.ca website.  This site is the best place to search for comparable listings.
Kory was in touch the next day, and although we told him that we were selling privately, he was still very helpful.  When we decided that dealing with a listing agent was our best strategy; we interviewed 3 other local agencies.  Kory was an easy choice and we are very happy customers.  Kory was able to provide his professional opinion  and guidance while listening to our desires for a successful sale.  He understood the emotional connection we had to our home.  Other agents we interviewed were very direct, and it should be mentioned that Kory got us 60k over what the other agents said would likely be our best price.
Kory Prince is agent you can trust with your best interests at heart, he is extremely good at his job and we are happy to have met him.

reviews.name: Kristy L
reviews.text: My husband and I bought our first condo this past summer. Kory was our first choice for a realtor and we couldn’t have asked for more. Kory was excellent with the information he provided and was professional at all times, we felt confident that our purchase was in the best hands possible. Kory walked us though all of the necessary information and kept us updated on the progress. He answered all of our questions clearly and worked with us to ensure a smooth transaction. We are extremely happy in our new home and recommend Kory highly.

reviews.name: Zouhair Kawadry
reviews.text: KORY KORY KORY is your man!!! This man is a magician, he is officiant, reliable, honest and exactly what I needed out of a realtor when buying my family home!!  "The Prince Team" is the team that I’ll always be calling on for my property needs. I couldn’t get the deposit in time for my apartment so they went over and beyond and did the impossible and managed to delay the date by the few days, which is exactly I needed!! Great company, great staff, what a breath of fresh air!! Thank you again <3

reviews.name: Jay Jambor
reviews.text: Kory was a fantastic REALTOR. With the biggest investment of my life, I needed to find someone who truly understood what my goals were, and who could get me the best deal possible. Kory provided me with top notch service, and was always there to thoughtfully and thoroughly answer the questions I had about selling my condo. Kory always kept my goals in mind, and made the process easy. My overall experience with Kory was great, from start to finish. Next time I need a REALTOR, I know exactly who I'm going to call. Thanks Kory!

reviews.name: Rosana Chow
reviews.text: After checking “best realtor in Pitt Meadows/Port Coquitlam area”, Kory Prince’s name came up so we decided to hire him.  He is very enthusiastic and professional.   He arrived at my sister’s condo, did a visual inspection and then showed us comparable listings in the area.  He determined what he felt was a fair market price.  The condo was listed and the first day on the market, it was sold.

reviews.name: Jana Maclagan
reviews.text:
Thank you Kory,
Great experience, after a lacklustre time trying to use another realtor and unsuccessfully seeing and being outbid on condos - we hired Kory.  He was personable and businesslike - gave us realistic goals and helped us find my sister the condo that was perfect for her with her huge wish list.
Excellent service and we would happily recommend using him and his team!  Thank you!  Jana

reviews.name: Colleen Chambers
reviews.text: Dan Joudoin is amazing, I can’t speak highly enough of him. From first contact until resolution of the home hunting process Dan’s professionalism smoothed what, otherwise, would have been a very stressful experience. Nothing was too much to ask of him and his timely recommendations ensured our success in finding our home. I would definitely recommend Dan if you need a real estate agent that’s on your side.

reviews.name: Feona Lim
reviews.text: Kory is very dedicated to providing quality service.. I think Kory has a strong sense of the importance of finding a forever home for families perhaps because he also has a young budding family himself. We would highly recommend Kory to our friends and family to assist them in navigating the buying or selling of their home!

reviews.name: L D
reviews.text: Highly recommended. Kory is a personable and effective sales professional. His advice on the listing for our house was brilliant. As a result, in this slower Fall 2017 Lower Mainland market, we received an offer on our house in 9 days for an excellent price. Other houses in our neighbourhood are still on the market.

reviews.name: Solomon Yasin
reviews.text: Kory Prince and his team have an exceptional model that helps their clients with getting amazing results.  Highly recommended for your buying and selling needs.

reviews.name: Alanna Dyani
reviews.text: Listed our condo with Kory and it sold in a week. Kory's pricing strategy and his confidence in the market paid off extremely well for us. We ended up selling nearly 20% over asking. Very happy with the results of Kory and his team.

reviews.name: Rod Leland
reviews.text: Kory and his team are full-on all-stars. An extremely well-organized and crazy responsive team, run by a seasoned pro who's built an excellent system to keep an eye on the market. From the very first text at 9PM with a team member, to frantic Sunday night emails, we always felt important, listened to, valued, and taken care of.

reviews.name: Marilyn Taylor
reviews.text: I came to Vancouver from Toronto with the dream of owning my own retirement home. I made contact with Kory via the internet, and within 4 days of my arrival, Kory had a number of listings for my "mom" Ann and I to look at. The third one was "IT" and I must say..Kory had done his research and walked me through the process...e-z-p-z!! My 2 week stay netted me the dream home I had always wanted! Although it was "only a mobile" Kory treated it (and me!) as though it was a million dollar listing. Very professional, well versed on his listings, Kory truly IS my "Prince Charming"!!

reviews.name: sabrina
reviews.text: Extremely efficient and very responsive team of well trained professionals on your side. I am very impressed! Thank you Cindy!

reviews.name: Miss Fish
reviews.text:
Mr. Danny Joudoin represented us as a buyer's agent in our recent purchase. he is professional, calm, attentive and he acted quick to seal the deal for us. very happy and would recommend him to anyone who is looking to buy property. Big thanks to Dan and The Prince Team.
Serena

reviews.name: Alberto Marengo
reviews.text: Great working with Kory, always available to discuss and very clear in explaining the whole "buying a house" process. Also very helpful when I had questions. Very recommended!!!!

reviews.name: Jeremy Perez
reviews.text: It was a pleasure working with Krista on my condo purchase.  She was very professional and always did her homework for the properties i was interest in purchasing.  I would definitely use Krista's services again.

reviews.name: Laara WilliamSen
reviews.text: The Prince Team RE/MAX Results Realty is great about sending me the targeted listings I am looking for.  I appreciate the weekly notifications of these out of town properties and am sure I will locate the right one with the right price because of their kind and efficient service.  Sincerely, Laara WilliamSen

reviews.name: مسہود
reviews.text:
Very Active and positive
Upfront I received All informations I needed and Additional detailed informations that helped me to see what is going on in the market.
All the options and recommendations to increase the profit and success in sale were mentioned in first meeting.
Defiantly recommend  to Call Kory and his team.

reviews.name: Shawn Dhesi
reviews.text: Experienced realtor who knows what he is doing. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Svea Go
reviews.text: In February of 2013 it was our pleasure to have Kory as our realtor. We had previously and unsuccessfully worked with other realtors in our 2 year home search. However, it only took 2 viewings, 2 homes, 2 weeks and Kory Prince to land us our dream home. Kory's hard work and dedication saved us $200,000 on the purchase Price, enabling us to obtain a home for our family that otherwise we would have only dreamed of. We wouldn't hesitate to work with Kory again or recommend him to family and friends.

reviews.name: Kristy M Jones
reviews.text: Dan Joudoin from Remax was the very definition of professionalism and hard work when it came to helping me buy my first Vancouver condo. Right from the get-go he was warm and caring and went above and beyond through all steps of the process. He made me feel that he was truly invested and excited for me, providing information and guidance along the way and always available for any questions or concerns I had. When it came to the bidding and business parts he had the right amount of savviness and experience to get the job done right. I highly recommend Dan Joudoin for all your realtor needs. He truly is the package deal. Thanks Dan!

reviews.name: Kok Heung Kwong
reviews.text:
Kory is one of the best easy-going, friendly, hard-working persons I had ever met. Laid-back personality with a great haircut, too (*smile*)... Thx Kory...

Michael F. Kwong

reviews.name: Kaylie Pirrotta
reviews.text: Kory is a great personable realtor and the experience couldn't of been more enjoyable. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Nathan Owen
reviews.text:
Working with Kory was a pleasure.  He was very helpful and genuine in hearing our needs and applying his skills to best suite us as his clients.  He was able to devise a strategy for a fast sale, well above list of our home and get us a condo in the same area within our budget with our tight deadline.  We had worked with other agents in the past for our first purchase and to get ideas on the sale, but kory was very keen to listen and advise on what we told him we wanted and needed.

He was not just "all bussiness" which for us was very refreshing from the normal schtick that agents put up, and provided a very comfortable and open atmosphere for our relationship throughout the process.  It was very easy to relate with him and feel comfortable knowing he had our best interests in mind and never forced a decision on anything that we were not comfortable with.

I reccomend him to anyone I know that is looking to buy or sell.  Great experience. 10 out of 10!

reviews.name: marc cusson
reviews.text:
Three years ago with Korys help we found a fixer uper In Coquitlam (Como Lake Ave). The City rezoned the property for high rise. Our highest offer will triple my purchase price. Plus six month free rent on closing. Because I was looking for a fixer in bad shape a lot of deals fell through but Kory stuck with me to the end. I would recommend him to everyone. His knowledge and insite led to the finale sale. So now I am looking for a new project to fix up and I am going with Kory again.
Good Luck: Marc

reviews.name: Phil Wiens
reviews.text: Kory and his team are awesome to work with! I highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Lakhwinder Thind
reviews.text: Very kind, fair, and does good business. Kory has lots of experience, I highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Donna C
reviews.text: We were very pleased with Kori's energy, service, and expertise in selling our home in PoCo recently.

reviews.name: Michael Grimkowski
reviews.text: Kory did everything to make the deal seamless and simple.  He went above to show the places and even helped to drive the price and sold the house in record time!

reviews.name: F Rodney Lynch
reviews.text: Excellent team.  Great online listings with daily updates.

reviews.name: Mary Thomson
reviews.text: In less than 24hrs of being required to "sign up" to view a listing, I had multiple text messages and emails trying to solicit me. I received two phone calls and the second time the client care person hung up on me in the middle of me explaining my frustration. Rude and unprofessional. Do NOT contact me again!

reviews.name: Monique Rasmussen
reviews.text: Could not have been more pleased with the service we received! Danny J and team are extremely knowledgeable and attentive!

reviews.name: Shawn Shenfield
reviews.text: Gave us excellent advice that was confirmed by 3rd parties.

reviews.name: Michelle Leviste
reviews.text:
I'm so happy we got Denise Mai as our realtor when we purchased our first home. She really took time to understand what we were looking for. It took us some time to find the perfect home for our family, but Denise was very patient throughout the whole process.

She also connected us with other service providers we needed like our home inspector. It was a huge blessing because we got to work with people she personally trusted and dealt with. It definitely saved us the time of vetting suppliers.

The best thing about working with Denise is that she will always look out for your best interests. She helped us negotiate the best price for our home, which was beyond our expectations.

If you're looking for a home, I would definitely recommend Denise Mai and her team as your realtor.

reviews.name: Carla Matias
reviews.text: Denise is excellent at what she does. She’s professional and personable. Working with her makes finding a home in Vancouver (an often stressful experience) very enjoyable. We have benefited from Denise’s expertise in the market and have been able to purchase a home in a very tough market! We have recommended her to so many others as she is truly the best. Denise is so positive that it’s infectious and she gets the job done every time!

reviews.name: Tom Bech
reviews.text:
Denise did an excellent job helping us find a new home.  Her expertise actually helped us to expand our search area and we were able to find way more home than we had thought we could afford.  She was very responsive when we had questions about anything and she was so helpful through every step of our home purchase.

Thanks so much Denise!

reviews.name: Jack Dance
reviews.text:
Denise Mai and team have been great to work with throughout our entire purchasing process. We bought a new condo that was being built, and for 2 and a half years until completion of building and of the sale Denise Mai and team were there to help us through every step of the way and with any questions we had.

Thanks again Denise Mai and team for all your professional help!

reviews.name: Katie Sanford
reviews.text: I recently worked with Denise on buying my first property and she was an absolute delight to work with. She gave me very sound advice about what to consider when investing in a property and was quite efficient with scheduling viewings. Moreover when it came to negotiations on the property I chose to make an offer on, she was able to negotiate a price lower than I had imagined was possible to offer! Overall I am very happy with my purchase and will be working with her again if I decide to move in the future.

reviews.name: Lily Z
reviews.text:
Denise is the BEST!!   She is not only very hardworking and professional, she is also very creative with her solutions. I experienced her high level of integrity and commitment. She pulled through with the impossible and I love her philosophy "If there is a will, there is away." She went above and beyond & I felt that I can trust her and her ability to get things done. I am very happy.

I also felt like she really cares about me as a person and she has a big heart, always willing to help. Thank you so much Denise.

reviews.name: Jean Christophe Maniacara
reviews.text:
I had the pleasure to work with Denise Mai Team regarding a condo that was going up for sale. I want to say that I was extremely impressed with the level of professionalism anywhere from communication to a planning standpoint. I would totally recommend using Denise and her team for any real estate purchase and or questions regarding potential home renovations and flips. She has a lot of resources at hand to help tackle any real estate project.

Totally worth a call.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.name: Herb Lee
reviews.text:
Denise Is an absolute professional, her and her team is truly amazing and I've worked with Denise for over 8 years and have bought and sold over 20 properties with her!

I'm an investor and buy and sell lots of property, Denise is the ONLY realtor I trust and refer all my friends and family too. She's knowledgeable and well versed in the real estate industry and her professionalism shines through each and every time we do a purchase/sale.

If you're looking for a great agent to help you sell or buy Denise is the one for you! Her marketing videos are exceptional and she goes above and beyond for the advertising and marketing of each of my homes she has sold- truly amazing!!

Denise thank you again for all your hard work, I look forward to continuing to work with you and your team on many more real estate deals in the future! I'll be sending you some more referrals shortly! =)

reviews.name: Anish Pabari
reviews.text: Denise Mai is knowledgeable , charismatic and has some incredible markets tools. Always a pleasure.

reviews.name: Margaret Gradowski
reviews.text: Denise Mai Team is up to date with correct prices on the market as well as decoration trends to make your property to be more attractive and stand up among similar listings ;

reviews.name: ann ngo
reviews.text: Great experience with Denise and her assistant Priscilla! They were always available and quick to respond when I needed them to. I was a first time home buyer and didn’t know what to except during this process but they both made it much less stressful. I’m super grateful I had them during this period of time and everything went great! Thank you girls for helping me with my first home purchase!

reviews.name: Lisa Chan
reviews.text: Denise and her partner Joe has exceeded my every expectation! I am a seasoned investor who was lucky enough to have Denise's team help me sell a few properties and each time they delivered professional and responsive service. It's rare to find a real estate agents that care as much as Denise and Joe as they go above and beyond every time! I'm so grateful to be working with the best in the industry!!!

reviews.name: Tina Pham
reviews.text:
I’ve known Denise Mai for over 20 years now and I’ve seen Denise flourish and grow in her real estate business for the last 10 years.
