I’ve sent her so tons of referrals which includes many of my friends, family and colleagues.  Denise is my go-to realtor.

Denise is honest, reliable, hardworking and knowledgeable; a true professional. I highly recommend Denise Mai for any real estate needs!

reviews.name: Puay Lang Sciortino
reviews.text: Denise has provided me with a very professional service together with her team.  Her advice throughout the sale of my property has been flawless and has guaranteed me with a fair price for my property in the least possible time.  I would strongly recommend her and her team to anyone wishing to sell or buy property.

reviews.name: Jesse Johnston
reviews.text:
My wife and I hired Denise to sell our condo and to help us purchase our new place. Denise was extremely helpful in presenting us with a variety of strategies to help sell in a difficult area. She was always more than willing to jump on a call and answer any questions we may have had.

We would definitely recommend Denise and would be more than happy to work with her again. Thank you Denise!

reviews.name: Nish@Alliance S
reviews.text: Denise is a very hard working person. She always goes the extra mile for clients and always does much more than is required. I'd highly recommend anyone looking to buy or sell consider to contact Denise for a 1st or 2nd opinion. You wont be disappointed.

reviews.name: niusha sabour
reviews.text: I had such a wonderful experience with Deniz. She was patient and answered every single one of my questions and paid attention to every little detail. Thanks to her I found my dream home. The process was so stress free and she was a great friend. Would recommend to everyone.

reviews.name: Inspect Canada
reviews.text: Denise is a pleasure to work with.

reviews.name: Zalak Jariwala Ali
reviews.text:
Words can’t do justice to describe you but I have done my best 💝

DENISE is such an incredible human. I had the privilege to meet her and know her. One thing that I was really impressed about her was her determination to succeed and at the same time that care and love for other in her heart. Knowing what business she is in it was hard to believe that at her core she cared about her clients more than the profits. I am sure to cross paths with her again in future and look forward to our partnership as a clients but more as friend who I can trust. Amazing soul and full of life. Go girl ❤️

reviews.name: Jessica MK Son
reviews.text: I wasn't familiar with realty market and so Denise helped me a lot. she walked me through step by step how buying process works. I was looking for a decent and fairly new condo for myself. Thankfully I found a very satisfying suite in Burnaby and it was the one for me! Thanks to Denise and her team for all the support. I can't believe I have a property of my own that is absolutely amazing.

reviews.name: selena rosario
reviews.text:
Denise Mai came highly recommended. And Wow- Denise is an amazing & wonderful realtor & person-she really cares about you as a person! Denise truly made my experience as a seller & buyer smooth & stress free. She is so knowledgeable & her experience really shined through!

She sold our house in 5 days & the price we got was more than what we expected! She went through her marketing strategy very thoroughly with us & it sure worked!

When we became the buyers, Denise really took the time to really understand what we were looking for in our next home. She was patient & very detailed with her work-Now we have found our dream home all thanks to Denise!! Me and my entire family are really thankful to Denise for everything she has done!

This whole entire experience couldn't have been done without the hard work & effort from Denise, we have recommended Denise to all our friends, family, & colleagues! And everyone we have recommended Denise too, had a really great experience as well! She is our #1 realtor, we trust her completely, & she is our go to person any time it comes to any of our real estate needs!

We are now considering buying an investment property and will definitely be using Denise again!

reviews.name: Kristin Noiles
reviews.text:
Denise is absolutely amazing! She is always professional and goes above and beyond.

I would highly recommend her if you are looking to buy or sell in Vancouver!

She helped us find our beautiful Vancouver condo 4 years ago when we were new to the city. She really took the time to understand what we were looking for and helped us navigate the busy Vancouver market.

This year we went back to Denise to help sell our condo. She marketed our home so well and was such a pleasure to work with. The photographer she chose was incredible and helped make our condo look the best it could. I was still living in the condo during this time and she really worked around my schedule. Our home ended up selling in a week for over asking price! We are absolutely thrilled. It was all thanks to Denise and her hard work!

Thank you for everything!

reviews.name: Salvatore Sbrega
reviews.text: Denise helped me buy my first principle residence in Vancouver. She is a pleasure to work with and great at finding value and negotiating a fair price.

reviews.name: k c
reviews.text: I hired Denise to sell our house on the west side of Vancouver and she did an amazingly thorough job! She got us multiple offers, above and beyond our price point!! We are SO happy we went with her! Her honest and trustworthy approach made us feel at ease and we won’t hesitate to recommend Denise to all our friends and family who’s thinking about selling! We would give you a 10 star review if it was possible!

reviews.name: Minerva Mercado
reviews.text:
Denise is Professional, Ethical, Elegant, Committed, Honest, Respectful and an Understanding business woman.
Such a personality is very hard to find in a business environment regardless of the industry or the country you are trading in.
Along all my years as an international business person I only came across with few people having so many business skills and the strength to get things done on time, under any circumstances.
Denise, sold 2 of my condos during the worst Real Estate market in 2018.
As a business person I’m extremely hard to please, before hiring Denise I interviewed 7 realtors and I’m very happy to see that she “worked with me and for me” to complete the sales of my two properties on timely manner.
My suggestion is that you hire her and follow her business advices with trust and confidence.
Minerva Market
NAFTA business agent

reviews.name: Johanna Bonogofsky
reviews.text:
Denise is beyond amazing. She helped us find our first condo 5 years ago, and just recently worked with us again to sell it and purchase our new bigger home. The most incredible thing is our condo sold for way over asking and with 22 offers! Denise works magic!
She's brilliant, thoughtful, and truly cares - plus she's real sweet and enjoyable to be around which is a total bonus.
We always recommend her a million times over.

reviews.name: Tubby888
reviews.text: Working with Denise was an absolute pleasure. I cannot express in words how wonderful she was to us. We were first-time homeowners and she helped guide us on what to expect. She made the process of purchasing our first home nothing short of perfect. She treated us like family and made our experience so fantastic. She completely takes you under her wing and walks your through every step. She is amazing with communication and never leaves you wondering what’s going on. We were so very fortunate to have her as our agent. Best Real Estate Agent! – she's always just a text away.

reviews.name: Arthur Crowson
reviews.text: Denise is an incredible realtor. She helped me break into the Vancouver real estate market (no easy feat!) when I was in my twenties and later helped me sell the same property. She was fantastic both times. I appreciated her no-pressure approach but also her willingness to put in the work to get a deal done. I can’t recommend her enough.

reviews.name: DANNY LAM
reviews.text: Denise, what a great realtor! Thank you for getting me into the Vancouver market. Very trustworthy with a lot of experience. She made things easy for me because I was coming form California and didn't know the market too well, but Denise made it a smooth transition for me and provided the best service as well as finding me the perfect condo!  Thank you Denise!

reviews.name: Francis C
reviews.text: Denise is the BEST! Realtor I know. We tried to sell our condo once with a different Realtor and the Realtor said that our condo would be very hard to sell as there were too many things inside it. The Realtor said she would only attempt to sell our condo once we rent a storage locker and put our things there. So we didn't even attempt to sell and gave up. Later on Denise gave us a call and asked if we would be interested to sell, we gave her a heads up in our situation and Denise said it wouldn't be a problem. Denise gave us tips on how to present our house without renting a storage locker. THREE DAYS!!! after our condo was on the market it sold for the price we wanted, all of us were so shocked and happy. After we sold our condo Denise promised us that she would help find us our dream home for a price we were comfortable with. Even though our budget was lower for a house that suited our needs, Denise never lost hope and encouraged us that we would find our dream home. She knew current market values and many things about Vancouver Reality. She didn't just tell us the information but took the time to teach us. I now know what a Vancouver special house is. Once we found our dream home Denise worked tirelessly to get it down to a price we wanted. We got the house at a price we were comfortable with and I know it was because of the effort and hard work of Denise, I am confident in saying that no other Realtor would've worked this hard for us. Denise was kind, caring, and, patient towards us. She was never pushy and always listened to our requests. I know that I found a life long Realtor in Denise Mai and would recommend her to anybody, confidently. Thank you so much Denise for everything you have done for us!

reviews.name: Wendy Wong
reviews.text: Denise is a work of magic! She has helped us buy and sell countless properties with high levels of dedication and commitment teamed up with a strong work ethic. We put our trust in her and cannot thank her enough for all her hard work!

reviews.name: David
reviews.text:
Great realtor! She has your best interest at heart and will do what she can for you as if she was buying/selling her own property.

Very cheerful person, easy to deal with and has great communication. Will undoubtedly be a customer again once I'm in the market to buy/sell.

reviews.name: Minnerdz Ng
reviews.text: I started out with having a different realtor to sell my house. I had my home off and on the market for about 1.5 years before I got fed up and decided to search for a different realtor who could get the job done. That's when I found Denise Mai. She was so easy to talk to and understood my frustrations. I felt like Denise was really there to help me and not just there to make money. By this point I was very skeptical that my house could be sold for the price I wanted. But Denise took her time in explaining to me about the market fluctuations and all of the necessities to help me to feel confident again. Low and behold, 3 weeks after listing with her, my home was sold! I can't thank her enough. She made this, normally stressful process, into an exciting experience for me. She also helped me find my current dream home! Thank you Denise!

reviews.name: Tamara M
reviews.text: I have known Denise for many years but had never needed her services as a Realtor. However, I always see how hard she is working for her clients and the success she has achieved over the years. I always admire her work ethic and the passion she brings to her work. From the moment I suggested to her that I was considering selling my home and buying a new one, Denise has been right by my side.  Denise is an amazing Realtor! She goes above and beyond all expectations, providing excellent advice and support though each step. She has an innate sense of what is needed in each moment and goes out of her way to make things happen. In less than 2 weeks I have sold my home for a value I had only dreamed of and bought a new home I can't wait to move into! This was only possible because of Denise!

reviews.name: Andra Low
reviews.text: When you need something done, and done right, you can count on Denise Mai. My experience with Denise was fantastic.  If you are interested in purchasing a home in Vancouver (Burnaby and/or Surrey), Denise is your go-to person.  She is well-organized, thorough and makes sure all of your questions are answered. Thanks D!

reviews.name: Robert Slett
reviews.text:
Denise is very patient and will spend the time with you to figure out exactly what you want.
Her personal skills are top notch and works very hard for you when selling or buying a house. She won't stop until you're completely satisfied.
A true pleasure to work with!

reviews.name: N. L.
reviews.text: Called us when we have rented our house to say said she had very good offer for the  house. But  in real it wasn't true,  when I asked  to show it never  called back. Very good and honest approach for top realtor....

reviews.name: Cong Liu
reviews.text: Working with Denise has been great! She caters to your needs and schedule! Wonderful and pleasant to deal with, even thou I was stubborn as a mule and made some decisions that made selling my property a pain for her despite ignoring her suggestions, after month of it not selling under my decisions, she was able to fix my mistake and still made things work in the worst of seasons for real-estate. Definitely a 5 start and will work with her as to buy again!!

reviews.name: Tsz Ho Wong
reviews.text: Thanks to Denise, my house was sold in two weeks. She was very professional and diligent with our listing. Would definitely use her again in the future!!

reviews.name: Shalyn Lapating
reviews.text:
Denise was actually recommended by my best friend Farah. She couldnt stop boasting about her exceptional experience with Denise.
I'm so glad that I took my best friends advice.
Denise was exceptional communicating with me and my husband especially since we are first time home buyers. Her responsiveness to my questions were so quick....she even responded to my late night texting. She is a talented negotiator and has a great understanding of local market real estate values.
She always made herself available, even on short notice. She took the time to get to know what we wanted, tells you honestly what she thinks when you asked.
I would highly recommend her services.
Denise also thank you for the time on looking after our little Tristan while I moved little stuff on our apartment :)
Shalyn, Sam and Little Tristan

reviews.name: Christopher Moores
reviews.text:
So I put my place up for rent online. A person named Varun Seth calls me to tell me he has potential buyers for it and sets up a meeting with me. Even sends me a confirmation email and then never shows. No phone call no email not even a text to say he won't be coming.
Little that he knows I've rearranged my day to make this meeting!
I even  called the listed number on denisemai website and left a message and no return..and I doubt I will ever hear from them. Don't call people and talk all this rubish if you aren't serious!!!

reviews.name: deena zhang
reviews.text: Best realtor ever. Denise is amazing, she sold my home in 1 week

reviews.name: Shelley Chen
reviews.text: I was a first time home buyer and I knew nothing about the BC house market and policies as I just moved to BC from SK in April 2015. Denise is a super friendly and patient agent who helped me go through all of the transaction procedures. My first visit to a new home was March 14th, 2015, and my final possession date was April 17th, 2015. Within one month, I made my biggest purchase decision, completed all of the legal transactions with bank, lawyer as well as the seller and finally moved into my dreamed home. Initially, my friend recommended Denise to me, when we first time contacted each other through an email, I was still living in Saskatoon. I didn't even know that I could make such a big decision that fast. Denise helped me analyze all of my requirements, we determined the location, price, transportation, community and etc. She sent me emails frequently to give me fresh ideas about new homes and market changes. Later, we met each other in Vancouver, she took me to view various places and introduced the city to me. I can always see sweet smile on her face. Without her assistance, I won't make my decision this fast and probably will miss my current home. I would say I made a correct decision and I love my new home so so so much. Going forward, I will definetly recommend Denise to each of my friend who is looking for a new home.

reviews.name: Jude Harrison
reviews.text: Inquired about one of her listing.  Gave me way too much attitude and put me on hold for quite awhile to take another call so I decided to look elewhere.

reviews.name: Larry Collin
reviews.text: Amazing Realtor and very professional 👍💪👔

title: Re/Max Andrew Hasman Realty
address: 3540 W 41st Ave Unit 110, Vancouver, BC V6N 3E6, Canada

reviews.name: Erin MacMillan
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill Hasman were recommended to us by a friend, and we are so happy that we followed this friend's advice! As first time home buyers, we really appreciated that Andrew took the time to walk us through the whole purchase process. He made sure that we understood and were comfortable with all aspects of the conditions. Whenever we had questions, Andrew was consistently quick to reply with very helpful answers and advice that was grounded in experience. Thanks to his excellent attention to detail, the purchase was completed smoothly. He also had excellent recommendations for services like lawyers, cleaners and painters who were all excellent and available at short notice. Both Andrew and Jill clearly cared that we found the right home for our young family. They went above and beyond to ensure that we were happy with the whole buying process from first look through to moving and settling in. We would definitely recommend Andrew and Jill for your real estate transactions!

reviews.name: Adrian Burke
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill Hasman provide exemplary real estate service in the Vancouver market. My wife and I have bought and sold multiple properties with Andrew and Jill. Whether 6-figure or 8-figure, the Hasman's are experts in the market. Condo or free-standing homes, Andrew and Jill provide the best advice on sales approach, staging, listing price, etc. - we've always been satisfied that we've gotten maximum value for the properties we have sold, and the best price for the properties we've bought. Andrew and Jill are very responsive and available, driving the process professionally and completely. We would absolutely engage with Andrew and Jill again, and recommend them without reservation.

reviews.name: Greg W
reviews.text: My wife and I first met Andrew and Jill at another open house we were viewing.  We thought so highly of their professionalism that we asked them to represent us in the purchase of our home and sale of our condo.  Furthermore, Andrew and Jill recently helped us in the recent purchase of our new vacation lakefront property.  They are extremely responsive and willing to do what it takes for you to get the deal you want in a timely manner.  We highly recommend Andrew and Jill for anyone seeking a realtor for their next purchase/sales.

reviews.name: Ann Bale
reviews.text:
Andrew and Jill were highly responsive and helpful from our first contact with them. I don't think we could have found better realtors anywhere. They were simply amazing! They listened carefully to want we needed and did their best to match properties to our particular specifications and budget. They knew the area extremely well and were aware of what to look for, and what to look out for. They pointed out any potential problems during viewings, and also commented on the advantages of certain properties.
My husband and I live in a different province (Alberta) and were purchasing a property with our young adult daughter - a home for her in Vancouver. The Hasmans arranged countless viewings with our daughter, and always followed up with us afterwards. We felt they were looking out for all of us, which we were especially appreciative of since my husband and I could not view the properties ourselves. They were bth proactive and fully involved in every step of the process.
When it came to making an offer, Andrew carefully walked us through the process and outlined what would happen afterwards.
Once our offer had been accepted, they put us in touch with a great lawyer, and checked in continually until closure. During this time they also checked in with our daughter to make sure she had insurance, internet, utilities etc sorted out. They also were able to recommend tradespeople, should we wish to make any later alterations to the property.
I cannot recommend the Hasmans highly enough. It was a pleasure and gift to work with them.

reviews.name: Natalia Garbuzova
reviews.text: It I met Andrew first time 20 years ago as a first time buyer and always in contact with him ever since. It is nice to come across someone you feel you can trust 100%. Andrew is the one stop shop agent a first home owner could dream of encountering for their first experience in the market. The daunting process was made considerably easy from initial communications to signing the dotted line. Andrew acted with immense professionalism and went beyond his scope to make sure the purchase was secured with diligence. I learned few years later that Andrew is top listing agent. Andrew and his wife and business partner Gill were outstanding in all facts of the job, old fashioned reliability coupled with a genuine caring attitude and solid advice. Andrew and Gill are those people. They are kind, courteous, and willing to help in any way they can to make your sale smooth and trouble free. I would highly recommend Andrew to all my family and friends and look forward to using his services again in the near future.is nice to come across someone you feel you can trust 100%.

reviews.name: MORRY GAERBER
reviews.text:
Andrew was amazing to deal with.  He educated me about the current market and i was comfortable with his suggested listing price.  communications were prompt.  He made me aware of all the safety precautions he  is taking during  this Covid-19
difficult time. Strict protocol.   My west side house had many qualified only viewings and multiple offers.  It sold in about 1 week over listing price!   I would highly recommend Andrew and his team to my friends and family.

reviews.name: Martin & Janet McKeown
reviews.text:
Andrew and Jill were excellent during the whole experience of selling our home and buying a new home. From the first time we met, when our home was nowhere near ready to be put on the market, Jill and Andrew walked us through a preparation process in a positive, professional and realistic manner.  They gave us encouragement about making our home ‘sale ready’.  We really appreciated a comprehensive list they have of skilled trades people available on short notice to help with a variety of tasks including a gardener, a handyman, a painter, a junk removal person, someone to provide second hand storage boxes and a stager.  Jill and Andrew were available on short notice for questions (and support).  We appreciated their honesty about the market, their intuition about pricing and the timing of our home showing. When it came to look at offers on our home, their wisdom, expertise and professionalism were golden.  When it came time to look for a downsized home, they were very helpful keeping us informed of available homes.  Andrew and Jill made themselves available to accompany us looking at homes we were most interested in.  They walked us through the rather intimidating purchase process and made it manageable. And overall, the paperwork and legal work was all very straightforward, thanks to Andrew’s guidance.
I would highly recommend Andrew and Jill to anyone including my closest of friends and family to help buy and/or sell any home.  Their honesty, professionalism, wisdom, availability and experience will impress you as they did us.

reviews.name: Bill Skrypnyk
reviews.text: We chose Andrew and Jill to sell our property based on their reputation in Vancouver real estate business. Very professional, yet warm, very experienced, yet patient, Andrew and Jill gave us their attention and time, and adjusted to  our circumstances and wishes. We weren’t their easiest clients — we had our own ideas about when to list and how much to ask — and yet they supported and accommodated us in our choices and offered sound advice and guiding information in the process. From the outset, even before listing, Andrew and Jill offered us valuable tips on how to prepare our place for sale and what to focus on. Personally, I feel the most gratitude to both of them for what they did not do — pressure. We never felt pressured to list sooner, ask less, settle. We always felt that the decisions we took were our own. We have sold our property now and look forward to working with Team Hasman to buy our next home. Big thank you to both Andrew and Jill! I definitely highly recommend them for your next real estate sale or purchase in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Siao Leong
reviews.text: I can't say enough about Andrew's professionalism and expertise.  He knows the market and will be able to provide you with the most accurate and timely information on your home and will provide solid advice.  Rest assured that he will always have your  best interests at heart, his advice is always based on the best outcome for you, not him!! I can't stress this enough, he is an absolute professional.  His response time to emails and texts is unbelievable - you will always hear back from him and he follows-up on every little detail.  He is an absolute professional!!  And his wife Jill is also amazing - she's got an incredible eye for details and has lots of solid advice - they are definitely a dynamic duo!!

reviews.name: Dnoorian
reviews.text: We have used Andrew and his team for over 20 years and highly recommend him to anyone who wants to get into the real estate industry whether if its for your own home or an investment. He is professional, experienced and knows what he is talking about when it comes to real estate. Highly recommend Andrew and his team!!!

reviews.name: Melanie Mohr
reviews.text: My parents listed their home during the slowest period in years and Andrew/Jill had it sold in days. Experienced, genuine and always dependable. They are a great pair to work with and I highly recommend this duo to anyone buying or selling their home.

reviews.name: Peter M
reviews.text: We were referred to Andrew by family friends and he was fantastic to work with. Being owners out of province, there were many challenges in selling our place in Vancouver, but he stepped up to the plate with ease. Andrew is a great listener, very connected in Vancouver's real estate market, and went above and beyond on numerous occasions to make the sale for us. I would not hesitate to recommend Andrew to anyone looking for a dedicated and experienced realtor.

reviews.name: G Hamill
reviews.text: It had been a few decades since we looked for a new home & the Hasman team were recommended by friends.  Hasman Realty exceeded our expectations from the first meeting, providing a substantial Buyer's Guide binder for us that brought us up to speed quickly.  Especially useful is the Resources section with everything from legal & insurance to trades recommendations.  The Hasmans responded promptly to our questions & requests & ensured the Seller's agent provided information only the Seller had access to.  My wife & I highly recommend Andrew & Jill Hasman!

reviews.name: Charles Hung
reviews.text: Both Andrew and Jill are very dynamic and energetic agents with great insight and advice on the Vancouver market.  They always follow the instruction of their client, but at the same time cautions his clients against making the same mistake of his previous clients.  They got a property sold so fast once it was staged that the people who staged the property could not believe how quickly it got sold.  I tell you that I am impressed how quickly the offers come in and that is saying something.  They do great work if the client takes their advice, but one should ask him to shop around for more staging quotes before agreeing to stage the property.  He knows some pretty expensive staging company.

reviews.name: dee noorian
reviews.text:
My family has known Andrew for a little over 20years and we are grateful to have such an honest, humble, and genuine realtor we can rely on. Thank you for all you do for our family!

From- Donna noorian

reviews.name: Julie Sedger
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill are TOTAL PROS. In an industry where you often don't have a clue who you're working with until you're in the thick of a deal, it's great to know these 2 have your back. Andrew is a veteran Vancouver realtor and it shows - he knows the westside and eastside like the back of his hand. He's ethical, works really hard for his clients, and is highly savvy in all areas of real estate. I trust him implicitly and this from someone who worked with 5 different realtors in Vancouver, as well as realtors in other Canadian cities, before I found Andrew, who came highly recommended by 3 individual friends who were thrilled with their outcomes. To say that Andrew goes above and beyond is a total understatement. He's not only taught me a lot about real estate, but has provided helpful counsel when I've been undertaking property deals in other cities (where he couldn't represent me). My favourite thing about Andrew is how evident it is that he loves his work - he lives and breathes real estate. Passion, experience, generosity, conscientious, well connected, calm under pressure, teamwork w/wife Jill, excellent communication (he listens!)...all hallmarks of a quality professional realtor. I'm so glad I found Andrew and Jill!

reviews.name: Kirsten Ernst
reviews.text: After 20 years of owning and living in my multi-family building in Vancouver, I made the very emotional decision to sell. I had talked with Andrew in the past a couple of times about selling and always felt he gave me accurate advice. I never felt pressured. His words were, "You'll know when you're ready." So, when I was ready, even though I interviewed other realtors who also had a lot of experience or who were younger, flashier, and had a better online "image" I decided to go with the very experienced and personable (easy to talk with) Andrew and Jill team. I am so glad I did as there were setbacks such as the change in the market, an offer that fell through, and an unexpected,  extensive and expensive removal of an oil tank which no other realtor could have guided me through as well as Andrew did. He kept me calm, focused, and motivated throughout the whole process. I ended up with multiple offers to choose from. I highly recommend Andrew and Jill as they are friendly and energetic, listen to the needs of their clients, are always available to answer your questions, give great recommendations, and get you to a place where you feel comfortable with the decisions you make.

reviews.name: Judy Remick
reviews.text:
We were very pleased with the service provided by Andrew Hasman.
He was honest, professional, and realistic about selling our home in a changing market. He gave us very good advice about when and at what price to list our  home.
As well, he understood our needs and was able to guide us to the purchase of our new home.
He was very quick to respond to our questions or concerns, and we were always able to reach him via email, text or phone.
Andrew was very easy to work with and we would highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Carolyn Roberts
reviews.text:
Carolyn Roberts for M. Dawson: "Andrew was recommended to my by a friend of my mother to help me sell her co-op condo. We were immediately set at ease upon meeting Andrew and Jill and continued to feel well cared for throughout the selling process. I always trusted that Andrew had my mother's best interest in mind by way of offering sound knowledge and advice. This is a very dedicated team."

M Dawson

reviews.name: Vicki Potter
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill have helped us buy and sell 4 properties in the last few years.  Their service is exceptional.  They provide excellent advice whether you are a seller or buyer, they keep you posted regularly, and they get results!  Plus, they are super nice people.  I highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Alex Cua
reviews.text: I have nothing but amazing things to say about my experience with Andrew. As a first time home buyer, I was overwhelmed with my house hunt but Andrew was nothing but kind, patient, understanding and above all, extremely knowledgeable and professional in all respects. I had no doubts that he always had my best interests at heart and was always available to answer each and every question I had promptly and efficiently without hesitation. He ensured my needs were met up until I made my final decision about which place to purchase, which lasted a few months. I couldn't be happier with Andrew and would not hesitate to recommend him to anybody that is looking to purchase a new home!

reviews.name: Stefan Dollinger
reviews.text: We've been working with Andrew and his small and effective team over the years on multiple occasions. You won't find a more knowledgeable, effective and lightning-fast realtor. That he's most pleasant to work with is an added bonus that is increasingly hard to find.

reviews.name: Lisa Kuligowski Chan
reviews.text:
Let me start off by saying that Andrew & Jill are fantastic.  We first met them when my family was trying to sell my grandparents house about ten years ago.  It had already been on the market with a different realtor for almost a year, with no luck.  When they took over, they made the appropriate suggestions and it worked! Within a short few months (maybe about 4 months max.) they had sold the house and everyone was happy.

Fast forward about 5 years, due to unforeseen health circumstances, it became time for our family to downsize.  It all happened so fast and Andrew and Jill were kind, compassionate, intuitive, professional, and oh so helpful with the sale of my mum's house.  They dedicated themselves 100% to making sure the house was sold.  They were not only focused on the sale of the house but also mindful of the circumstances we were selling them under.  After the sale of the house, they helped us in finding our perfect little family home now.

They took us to many different open houses, back to back to back, until we had no more places to see and had found the place for us! My mum wasn't certain about the place at first.  But with Jill's keen eye for home interiors and reconstruction and Andrew's sharp senses and suggestions, we've now lived comfortably in our home for over five years and couldn't be happier.  They referred contractors and more to help us with renovations and the place really feels like home now.

Both Andrew & Jill are reliable, relatable, and incredibly knowledgeable individuals with whom I would trust entirely to have help sell or buy a home.

reviews.name: Laura fieldhouse
reviews.text: For many years Laura and I have used the services of Andrew and Jill, and in doing so have found them to be  a valuable resource for our real estate needs, they offer a complete service with a genuine concern for their clients whether you are buying of selling through them, we have done both on many occasions and recommend them highly, if you are looking for fantastic realtors in the Vancouver areas look no further these two will assist you whatever your needs!

reviews.name: Andrew Hasman
reviews.text:
We were referred to Andrew and Jill Hasman by friends who had purchased a property through them a few years ago. When we were considering selling our house last year, we called them. This efficient and enthusiastic duo sold our house last June and helped us downsize to a new property, which we love.  Throughout both transactions, they guided us through the steps, which were often stressful. They were always there for us, had good knowledge of market trends, and were always professional. We would definitely recommend them.

Sue and Alex F

reviews.name: Christian Skaaning
reviews.text:
It was my first time buying a home so I was both inexperienced and vulnerable to the market. Fortunately, I had Andrew & Jill. Both of them were very knowledgeable and helpful with everything that came up. Whether it was advice on the neighborhood, market trends, coming in with an offer, or all the 'nitty gritty' aspects of closing I knew I was in good hands. It was such a reassurance to know without a doubt that Andrew & Jill had my best interests at heart and was always in my corner.

Whether you are an experienced person in the market or a first timer like I was- Andrew & Jill are people you can count on!

reviews.name: John Tulev
reviews.text:
Having purchased and sold several properties with Andrew over the last 20+ years, we cannot begin to express how valuable Andrew and his team have been.  His depth of knowledge of the real estate industry, coupled with an amazing support team, has made each of our real estate transactions flow smoothly from beginning to end.  We would HIGHLY recommend Andrew and his team for your all your real estate needs.

John & Stephanie Tulev

reviews.name: George Barr
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill are highly skilled in closing deals but more importantly, they have integrity and they care about people. After listening to our needs, Andrew sent us qualified listings within our search criteria, guided us to narrow that search, came out to see our prospective new home (at his suggestion after we told him that we wanted to make an offer), and most importantly, successfully negotiated our offer (amongst multiple offers) to close. Without getting into details, I will say that we wouldn't have been successful in this offer if it weren't for Andrew's experience, skill and contacts. Thanks Andrew and Jill for caring for us in the purchase of our first home! A+

reviews.name: Stephen Williams
reviews.text: We would highly recommend Andrew and Jill Hasman for your real estate needs.  They are highly professional, experienced, reliable agents who understand the Vancouver market perfectly.  They gave us the right advice in both a seller's market and a buyer's market .  Strong duo who know how to close the deal.

reviews.name: MrMackanno
reviews.text:
Andrew has helped me on both sides, selling and purchasing. He works hard and diligently making sure all aspects and details are covered thus ensuring the best results, and once again I had Andrew's expertise and keen sense of the market help me in the sale of my property in record time and for a price well above expectations. Andrew is the Agent you want on your side when the big decision (selling or buying) comes. His knowledge, experience and well thought input/recommendations are second to none.

I gladly give him 5 stars and recommend him.

Thank you again, Andrew!

Mario Castanon

reviews.name: Sophia soyoung lee suh
reviews.text:
Thanks a lot, Andrew and Jill. I liked your service;
easy contact, fast response, good information, updats,
and hard working. Now I understand why they are well known
company in town with successful reputation. It was a great
experience working with them. They are expert!!

reviews.name: Michael Mudri
reviews.text: 2nd time selling and purchasing with Andrew and will not hesitate to call again when it’s time. Very happy repeat customer.

reviews.name: Debbie Collin
reviews.text:
Andrew and Jill were the most helpful, professional, and attentive realtors. With their help we were able to list our apartment in only a few days, and we sold in under a week.
We are currently looking for a property in the city, and they have always promptly answered questions, concerns and queries about any property we have been interested in. Their extensive knowledge of the different areas around Vancouver has been invaluable in our search.
I would highly recommend using Andrew and Jill if you are interested in selling or buying property in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Christopher Eder
reviews.text: Thank you to Andrew and his team for their knowledge, professionalism and diligence. Just completed the sale of my condo with Andrew, a smooth and stress free process, I look forward to steering more business your way.

reviews.name: Mark Owen
reviews.text:
Finally settled into our new place, so now have the time to absorb all that has been going on the first half of 2017. Thanks SO MUCH to Andrew and Jill for guiding us through the real estate sales process, and making it possible for us to pursue our dreams. Expert advice, tempered with Jill's softer side, made this go so smoothly. They totally understood our house, and our plans.We should have called them 14 months ago when we first started to try and sell!!
Stress-free house selling? Call Andrew and Jill

reviews.name: Patsy Scaiff
reviews.text: Andrew provided excellent advise and assistance at selling my place. He was very professional and extremely helpful. He is by far the best realtor I have ever worked with. I highly recommend.

reviews.name: Amy Kassam
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill Hasman sold our home in a weekend.  They wrangled in over 70 groups and we sold well over our asking price.  Andrew and Jill are honest,  extremely efficient and simply great at what they do.

reviews.name: Diane Wiens
reviews.text: Andrew and Jill you are very hard working , knowledgeable experts in their field.  We always felt extremely comfortable and in the best of hands.  We knew you would never steer us wrong or let us make a bad decision.  We loved that we were always able to get ahold ow either Andrew or Jill, day or night for any questions or concerns and were always available and quick to respond.  Selling "My Parents" house was a big decision but they puts us at ease an assured any concerns we had.  We also admired the updates on any private showings and feedback from the open houses.  I would, without a  doubt recommend Andrew and Jill for their realtor.  Thankyou both so much  Diane and Jerry Wiens

reviews.name: Jim S
reviews.text: Andrew and his team helped were able to sell our home in under a week in what felt like a win win deal for both us and the buyer. Would highly recommend the Hasman’s for any of your real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Jean Willows
reviews.text: Andrew Hasman has always been timely and responsive in his dealings with us.  He has followed through on everything he has promised, which is rare in business these days!

reviews.name: Gee
reviews.text: Nice people!

reviews.name: Forrest Missar
reviews.text: Great Realtors!

reviews.name: Flip Friedman
reviews.text: ANDREW  IS  MISTER  WONDERFULL

title: John Tsai PREC* - Real Estate Specialist
address: 701 W Georgia St Suite 1500, Vancouver, BC V6B 1H4, Canada

reviews.name: H U
reviews.text:
John and the team helped us for purchasing our first property.  The team was very knowledgeable and responsive in their service.
They helped us in every step of the way, we’re really pleased and satisfied with their service.

reviews.name: Vikram Binning
reviews.text: Remy helped us buy our condo in Richmond. She is very professional, responsive, has good work ethics and sincere personality. Would highly recommend her.

reviews.name: Johnny Cantiveros
reviews.text:
Knowing the integrity of John's work via friends that have brought him on as a Real Estate agent, I look forward to purchasing my first location with him. I know he looks out for his client's best interests.

Where I respect him the most is he relentless attitude and an example of role modelling what is possible when we surround ourselves with the best people, stay disciplined with habits that keep us in high performance, and strive to improve and grow.

He's an inspiration to anyone that is looking to see what happens when we choose to be our best, despite whatever environment is telling us that its too tough or too hard.

Im excited to see and be a part of his growth. He's welcomed me into his community and its all about surrounding yourself with like minded people.

Its an honour and a pleasure!

reviews.name: Amy Du
reviews.text: John tsai team were super helpful and responsive! Asked about how to fix certain things at home or if they know anyone that does cleaning/moving etc.. which they were able to help us as well and not just helping with buying/selling of homes. This made it smoother to purchase the new home and transition in. They were professional where they came up with plans to help us sell our home within the price range and within the time frame we need. They did follow up after we have moved in which we really like and I believe they are not obligated to help us chase back a hold from the buyers but they did it for me so I dont need to do much work. Thank you John tsai team for helping us out! Especially want to thank Remy as she has been dealing with us the whole time and answering all our questions!

reviews.name: Rodrigo Miguelez Kuthy
reviews.text: I highly recommend John and his team. They are very organized and professional. Michael Chou worked closely with us and made the process easy and enjoyable. Can't stress enough the good quality work they do.

reviews.name: maude henri-bhargava
reviews.text: Not only did John & Bonnie make selling our condo & buying a new place feel easy, they made it enjoyable. Despite some tight timelines & lots of questions from us, the team handled our sale & purchase with complete integrity, patience & professionalism. I was repeatedly blown away by how they went above & beyond to meet (exceed) our needs, as well as those of our buyers. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend John Tsai & his talented team to anyone!

reviews.name: Yatin Wadhwani
reviews.text:
John & Alvin worked with me through our pursuit and made this extremely smooth and easy. There was good information flow on a timely basis and their team did great with meeting schedules and making time for our queries.

Would definitely recommend working with them for their smooth, carefree and detail oriented workflows and customer experiences.

reviews.name: Kevin L
reviews.text:
Highly recommend John Tsai and Michael Chou to handle your home sale and purchase. We were so impressed by their level of service: they set honest expectations, were incredibly knowledgeable and transparent, and worked tirelessly to net us the best deal.

When we first approached John's team to list our home, and told them our target price and time horizon, they actually advised us *not* to list right then. Michael explained the market factors that would cause us to fall short of our price target. This was unlike the other realtors we had interviewed.

John and Michael contacted us several months later when the neighborhood started to pick up. They put together a plan, and got the job done in less than two weeks.

They made the entire experience seamless and well organized, continuously updating us with the information we needed to make an informed decision.

5/5 - Client Service
5/5 - Industry Knowledge
5/5 - Work Ethic
5/5 - Results Delivery
5/5 - Integrity & Honesty

reviews.name: Jason Baker
reviews.text: John is an expert agent, trainer, speaker, entrepreneur and all around good dude. He is passionate about what he does and if you do not hire him, you are undoubtedly saying that you want an amateur to represent you, and you want to make less money on the sale of your property.

reviews.name: Malek Tawashy
reviews.text: Choosing the John Tsai team to manage the purchase of my first Vancouver property was absolutely a winning move. The team is so well educated on the dynamic Vancouver market and specifically the individual buildings and locations within it. The hard work and responsive of the team closed our deal in a very short time frame, helping secure the most value for our investment dollars. Looking forward to the next one!

reviews.name: Mike Chien
reviews.text:
You can trust the dynamic, dedicated JT team to help you make well-informed decisions towards buying or selling a home or investment property. With the team’s (Bonnie, Remy, JT) help, Anna and I sold and bought within a week of each other. Special thanks to Bonnie for B-NG a true champion of a realtor for going above and beyond to ensure our transactions were seamless. Overall, our experience with the team has been extremely positive.

Always professional, always engaged, always reliable and always ready.

We would highly recommend the team to anyone with real estate needs, young or old. We would deal with the team given the opportunity, no question.

reviews.name: Olivia Ho
reviews.text: John & Alvin along with the rest of the team were definitely the best real estate team to work with especially during 2020 with COVID-19. The way they managed their appointments, the quality of professional photography and communication with client was superb! Highly recommend using The John Tsai Group for all your real estate matters. Property was sold in 8 days and received feedback from each viewing that was shown to gauge buyers interest well. Alvin knew the neighbourhood really well and represented beyond expectations. Thank you team!

reviews.name: Simon Yam
reviews.text:
Dear John,
Just a short note of utmost importance.  Janet & I are extremely pleased with your consultation in directing the sale of our house. You and your team have been working hard paying attention to every details providing assistance every step of the process ever since.  It is a top notch service with premium class  professionalism. I only wish I had more properties to sell! We could not be more appreciative for you & your team's expertise and efficiencies.
Regards,
Simon & Janet.

reviews.name: Tom Naughton
reviews.text: Highly organized, great to deal with, communicative and responsiveness to our 1,000,000 questions.  Really went the extra mile from start to finish.  On top of the quality job they did both Bonnie & John are sweethearts.  Great experience.

reviews.name: TK Cho
reviews.text:
John Tsai and his team, especially Jeff Kang, helped our family to find the right home in the right neighborhood for the right price!! Call him right now~

For our family, as first-time homebuyers with very little knowledge about how to find the right place, he was always focused on answering our questions, giving us great advice, and finding “showing-homes” that MET OUR NEEDS.

From start to finish he was very responsive, detailed, and a constant professional. I was pleased to work with Jeff and the John Tsai Team. And I would definitely recommend him to anyone.

Thank you, Jeff; I really appreciate it.

reviews.name: Angela Kim
reviews.text: This is a very overdue review which I have been meaning to write. My husband and I have had an absolute amazing experience with our first home sale. Jeff our Realtor had taken such good care of everything and it was a seamless process as we weren't very knowledgeable in regards to selling a home. The John Tsai group handled all documentations promptly and there was even a congratulations group chat when the home was sold. Jeff took his time to review and go over every bit of detail and was always available to answer questions (and we had soo many questions). Jeff and the team are super humble, not pushy and very comfortable to speak to. My husband and I were very nervous when we were selling our home since it all happened when the pandemic started. But we were fortunate enough to have gotten a quick offer and the home was sold in a couple of weeks. During this unprecedented time, Jeff was always making sure at viewings everything was done right as we have a little on at home and making sure the viewers were complying with covid protocols. We felt safe to go back in the home and that's so important when viewing your home. If we ever to sell or purchase another property, we will definitely stick with the john tsai group! Thank you team, John and Jeff for such a great home sale experience and especially during a Pandemic!

reviews.name: Matthew Ho
reviews.text: John and his team are fantastic to work with. I've trusted John for both buying and selling real estate, and have been very happy with his level of service, professionalism and recommendations each and every time!

reviews.name: Brian Dusenbury
reviews.text: Thank you for all your help. This was an amazing experience.

reviews.name: Katie Tse
reviews.text: Very professional, caring, and efficient.  I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family!

reviews.name: Brianne Kingston
reviews.text: We highly recommend Bonnie and the John Tsai Group. They were so attentive to our needs and available to respond to our inquiries. We cannot thank them enough for helping us purchase our first property and we look forward to working with them again in the future.

reviews.name: Dean C
reviews.text: Our agent Jeff Kang provided excellent help with the purchase of our home, looking out for our best interests. He was always readily available , responded to all our questions with great information, clarity, and promptness, and was flexible with any changes and requests.

reviews.name: Rob Aleong
reviews.text: John Tsai and his team were very professional and helpful when we were buying a new home and selling our old one. We were given great advice about what to price our home at and ending up selling above asking price. They worked diligently even through the COVID-19 pandemic to find us a home and we couldn't be happier. Although we wont be moving any time soon, we definitely would be using the John Tsai team again for any real estate transactions we will have in the future.

reviews.name: Calvin Lau
reviews.text: John and his team was very professional and easy to deal with. There is no doubt that they are key Real-estate marketers in the Vancouver market.

reviews.name: L C
reviews.text:
John and his team have been absolutely amazing taking care of us from the entire selling and purchasing process, and even met our expected timeline!  His team's level of customer service is top notch and they treat you with the utmost respect, are very transparent and extremely fair in their fee structure. My wife and I couldn't have chosen a better team of individuals to represent us. Special thanks goes to Bonnie and especially Jeff!

Keep up the great work!

reviews.name: Yvonne Louie
reviews.text: John, thank you so much for helping me find my dream home! Even though along the way there was some hiccups but you got it resolved right away. Your professionalism & the care for your clients exceeded my expectations!!! Your exceptional service is greatly appreciated!

reviews.name: Raymond Wong
reviews.text: Thank you Anna Shen and John Tsai for helping us buy our first home. Anna is super friendly and knowledgeable. She helped us negotiate a fair price for our unit. Did not push us or rush us into making any decision. I would highly recommend Anna to all my friends, family and co-workers. Anna also guided us though all the steps as a first time home buyer. She also replys very quickly to all of our questions. Even after the sale she would check in and reccomend us to her sources for anything we need for our new home. Thank you Anna!!!

reviews.name: Raman Yazdani
reviews.text: We worked with Bonnie to purchase a property. She was really helpful in all steps of the way and helped us have a smooth and successful purchase. Would definitely recommend her and John Tsai group!

reviews.name: Donald Lee
reviews.text: John Tsai and his team went above and beyond to help us with both our recent purchase and sale! We couldn't have asked for a better team to work with, and the experience was great. They were accommodating and very helpful with any questions we had. We would happily recommend their services to anyone looking for a good buying or selling experience!

reviews.name: sungdong cho
reviews.text: We bought a townhouse through the Jeff Kang and he helped us make a very kind and wise decision. It was also good to see his teams cooperate with each other.

reviews.name: Brad Taylor
reviews.text: Great knowledge of the market and great search results - helping us find the perfect property. Excellent negotiating approach and skills brought us in under our budget. Managed all the details, communicated with us regularly and addressed all our concerns and questions, educating us along the way. Overall a great experience and can recommend this team without any hesitation.

reviews.name: Rennie Caspillo
reviews.text: John Tsai EXP Realty was and continues to be very helpful during and post-sale of my property. They have a wealth of knowledge, and the demeanor they bring is both refreshing and stress-free. I will definitely look forward to working with them for my future endeavors.

reviews.name: Edwina Forsyth
reviews.text:
John and his team are kind and gracious in their approach in my experience.  They are very responsive and great communicators.  I appreciate their data driven approach to real estate. I highly recommend John and his team to guide anyone through the daunting experience of selling and purchasing property.
Sincerely,
Edwina

reviews.name: Taban Yazdani
reviews.text: John and his team have helped our family with multiple real estate transactions over the last few years. Most recently he helped us sell an apartment at a great price in a flash with quick close as we wanted. Everyone on his team are professional, hard working and always make sure clients are satisfied. They are honest and trustworthy; If you need to buy or sell a property in lower mainland there is only one person and one team we recommend.

reviews.name: Dimitrios Kalogeropoulos
reviews.text:
I have known John now for several years. I can say without a doubt that The John Tsai real estate team is one of the finest examples of professionalism, integrity and exceptional customer service. John is one of the top real estate agents in Vancouver Canada and I would recommend John to anyone without hesitation. I have personally visited John’s office in Vancouver and I was blown away with the professional environment that he and his team have created for their clients. I am proud to call John a colleague and I have already recommended him to some of my clients relocating from Ottawa to Vancouver.

-The Agent DK Team, Ottawa Canada

reviews.name: Ferne L
reviews.text: I found John and his team to be courteous, professional, and knowledgeable.  They dealt with my concerns efficiently with sensitivity. They were also good at keeping me up to date with the market trends and the reactions and opinions whenever the condo was shown. It was a pleasure working with John, Michael and Renee.

reviews.name: Barry Byer
reviews.text:
Outstanding group. Great communication.
Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Dow Chang
reviews.text: Finding real estate agents with integrity, strong negotiation skills, and passion behind their work can be far and few. John Tsai and his team possess all those qualities! As an agent from Los Angeles, I wouldn't look anywhere else to refer my client, friends, and family when they need help with real estate in Vancouver, BC. I'm confident that anyone lucky enough to work with him and his team is in good hands.

reviews.name: Wojciech Walczak
reviews.text: It was great experiance working with John and his team. They are very professional and hard working with good knowledge of real estate market and excellent communication skills.  I would highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Cywa Huang
reviews.text: It was such a pleasure working with John and his team. A very hardworking and responsive bunch. Thank you for your help through a very tough market.

reviews.name: Annie Chang
reviews.text: What a highly professional, competent, efficient and energetic team. Communication with John's team was clear and effortless even given the fact that we were overseas. Big thumbs up for John and his team. I definitely recommend them if you are looking to buy or sell a home.

reviews.name: Jenny Chan
reviews.text: Professional, understand our needs, provide good advice. We highly recommend John Tsai Group.

reviews.name: Barry Low
reviews.text: Quite simply, John and his team are the best realty team in town!  Driven, professional, and excellent knowledge of the Vancouver marketplace.  As well, a team member was always there to answer our questions and address our concerns promptly - we really couldn't have asked for better service.  John and his team helped us find our Vancouver townhouse last year.

reviews.name: Rupert Ngan
reviews.text: Extremely professional and knowledgeable with the current market.  John’s team was able to find a home that met all of our needs.

reviews.name: Wendy Wen
reviews.text: John and his team are spectacular! I can honestly say that he and his team provide excellent customer service and support ! John also helps me to understand the market , provide suitable strategy and recommendations , he goes over and beyond to take care of every small detail with care and full communication . I enjoy working with John and his team ! Highly recommended anyone who need expert advise in real estate investment or transaction to contact John and his team :) you will find them not just excellent but spectacular

reviews.name: Batya Wan
reviews.text: We've worked with John and his team for the past 7 years on multiple real estate purchases.  They are professional, responsive, and exceed expectations.  We highly recommend the John Tsai Group for all your real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Michelle Lua
reviews.text: Constantly meets our expectations on being professional.  Trustworthy, hardworking team and a team that cares.

reviews.name: Anne Watson
reviews.text: John is an amazing realtor.  He and his team are professional, efficient, honest and provide great advice. I highly recommend him and his team!

reviews.name: Eizaburo Kibayashi
reviews.text: Amazing service and always kept me in-the-loop.  I would highly recommend John and his team if you're either buying or selling.

reviews.name: Aundre Lua
reviews.text: Great team and very professional. Ill give them 10 stars if i could

reviews.name: Koh Florence
reviews.text: We are totally impressed and pleased with the knowledge and service of this team!  Would recommend them to everyone.

reviews.name: James Liang
reviews.text: Amazing team. They helped us on a number of deals now. Always willing to go the extra mile for us.

reviews.name: Michael Ireland
reviews.text:
Experienced, professional and a hard worker!
John Tsai has helped me navigate the real estate jungle over the years, and has helped me profit through his insights and the opportunities he comes up with...He is a top gun!

reviews.name: Frederick Lai
reviews.text: You feel confident they are working with your best interest in mind.

reviews.name: C Leung
reviews.text: Understands the market, provides guidance, prompt and professional service.

reviews.name: Janice Chow
reviews.text: Great team work, efficient and professional.Well done!

reviews.name: Emmanuel Perico
reviews.text: Very supportive and patience in answering all your queries even if you keep on asking the same questions. I feel comfortable in dealing this kind of transactions even if the price is not big not like my previous realtor he depends on how much can I afford to buy.  Thank you very much Michael for your unending support to me.

reviews.name: Sharan Sumal
reviews.text: The team made me feel well supported and informed throughout the entire transaction.  This is my second time working with them and they were exceptional!

reviews.name: dong安妮
reviews.text:
(Translated by Google) MICHAEL CHOU is a very professional and responsible real estate agent. From meeting him on the phone a year ago until he was preparing to buy a house nearly six months ago, he would always answer questions. Especially during the past six months of buying a house, I was moved by his seriousness and sense of responsibility. Prepare enough information for many inspections. Because of his repeated visits to the seller's broker, we have the beautiful home that we like and are satisfied with today. You know, my loan brokers praised him for his professionalism and seriousness. After moving the house, I got his many return visits and preparations 🎁 My heart also sees that he treats customers with heart. After that, the broker who bought and sold the house recognized him and wished him quickly become a famous real estate broker. 💪 💪 💪

(Original)
MICHAEL CHOU是一个非常专业切认真负责的房屋经纪。从一年前电话认识他直到近半年前准备买房期间，他都会有问必答。特别是这近半年买房期间，他的认真和责任心让我感动。多次看房准备资料充分。因为有了他的多次回访卖方经纪才有了我们今天喜欢又满意的美家。要知道，我的贷款经纪都表扬他的专业和认真。搬屋后得到他的多次回访和准备🎁 心意也看出他是用心对待客户。之后买卖房子的经纪就认定他了，祝愿他快速成为著名房屋经纪人。💪 💪 💪

title: Lorne Goldman
address: 2105 W 38th Ave, Vancouver, BC V6M 1R8, Canada

reviews.name: Becky and Kenny
reviews.text: Lorne and his team provide exceptional service.  I value Lorne's professionalism, experience and sound advice.  In spite of having a team supporting him, Lorne provides hands-on, personal service. He is always present to help us navigate challenging circumstances.   We have listed and purchased with Lorne several times over the years. Our experience have always been positive and the results excellent.  Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Robert Tham
reviews.text:
I have been in the business for over 17 years and Lorne’s passion for our industry is unparalleled. He has the highest level of integrity and his commitment to his Client’s is exemplary. All of this is proven by his impressive track record and his strong relationships.

Integrity, Passion and Knowledge at its finest!

Robert Tham

reviews.name: Charles Wertman
reviews.text: Since my house is a tear down, I thought that there was nothing else for a real estate agent to do but put the listing on MLS - I was wrong. I am amazed at how hard Lorne worked and the amount of time Lorne put in to making the sale happen, beyond simply just listing it on MLS. I am incredibly grateful for him and his team's effort. Lorne and his team are also a blast to work with and a pleasure to speak to for whatever the issue.

reviews.name: Wayne Lee
reviews.text: Lorne and his staff did a fantastic job, it was quick, efficient and very professional. I was very satisfied.  Lorne walk us through the entire process and was able to close within 10 business days.

reviews.name: Cody Neal
reviews.text: Working with Lorne and Eleana was efficient and straightforward. They helped me find a home quickly and were prompt in delivering info to me. Knowledgeable and friendly.

reviews.name: Yennie Hui
reviews.text:
Mr Lorne Goldman and his Team has been nothing short of providing excellent professional services, very responsive and transparent. I totally appreciated the positive attitudes and the efforts everyone put into the sale of my house. Mr. Goldman provided key insight that was extremely helpful and he got the house sold in record time with multiple offers. I highly recommend him for any future real estate services anyone might need. I had a very pleasant experience. Thank you.
Yennie Hui

reviews.name: John Olesen
reviews.text: Lorne and his team did a great job getting my condo sold during these difficult times. He was realistic on the price and the situation. I would give them a bonus star to make it a 6 star rating.

reviews.name: Winston M
reviews.text:
This is the 2nd time I have used Lorne and he has delivered for me again.

His approach of listing at a "reasonable" price to attract attention, and then letting the prospects make bids is a little daunting at first.  It requires a leap of faith in Lorne.  I can say that faith is richly deserved and has worked out a 2nd time, resulting in a sale price $300k over the assessed value in a very short time-frame.

He has the contacts in the industry, a broad reach of prospective buyers, and a thorough and methodological approach to selling properties.  All this combined will ensure Lorne will get you the highest price possible for your property.

His team (Lyn, Nicki, and his support staff) are also excellent professionals.  They assisted me with all the small details and kept the process moving along smoothly making sure all the documents and procedures were completed - in spite of my hectic schedule.

I have no reservations recommending Lorne and his team and will definitely be using him in the future, and already engaging Lyn to look for our next house.

reviews.name: Jeannine Anstee
reviews.text: The lot/house sale for an older friend was incredibly successful. It began with a house appraisal already higher than the previous city valuation.. Lorne encouraged (and wrote) a higher asking price (by $50,000). He used his wizardry to get interest in the lot. In the end we had six offers at the deadline (one week after listing) and a perfect offer,  $150K over the asking price,  was achieved.  Remarkably successful transactionl.  I had dealt with Lorne before and appreciated his professionalism and knowledge and contacts.

reviews.name: Ann Knutson
reviews.text: Lorne has been an excellent realtor for us. I would highly recommend him to anyone selling property in the area. He has a vast knowledge of the market and knows the best way to proceed. He was very helpful and even though we were a long distance away, he was willing to respond quickly and discuss issues that arose.

reviews.name: Rita Roehrl
reviews.text: We were reluctant at first to sell our home during this crazy, corona virus year. Lorne was very patient and understanding. When we were ready, he explained very clearly how he would do the listing. Voila! In a short period we had multiple offers and it sold. We were now freed up to move into our new planned future. He is a great communicator and we would highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Prab Jaswal
reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about Lorne’s team! The whole team went above and beyond in selling my home! Couldn’t have asked for a better team! Great professional transition! And it gets better I got more then asking price!

reviews.name: nancy wiggs
reviews.text: Only great things to say about Lorne and his wonderful team.  I am acting as the executrix for a dear friend and had to sell her condo.  Lorne was careful that I understood the process at every step along the way.  His team was also very helpful to me.  The sales process when smoothly and the beneficiaries of my friend and I are happy with the results.  Thanks Lorne and your team.  I would happily work with them again.

reviews.name: Maureen Beston
reviews.text: Lorne is a very professional and experienced realtor, he has excellent insights and knowledge that he translates to his clients.  I was extremely satisfied with the results he was able to deliver and would highly recommend him if you are buying or selling a home.

reviews.name: Heather Jenkins
reviews.text: Lorne Goldman and his team were experienced and professional, offering sensible advice and guidance during the sale of our home.

reviews.name: Erica Runstrom
reviews.text: I bought my first house in Vancouver with Lorne's help a number of years ago and turned again to him when it was time to sell and downsize to a condo.  He works with amazing assistants who walked me through the process and almost made it fun.  Lorne provided a designer who came to my home and gave me great advice about how to best stage it and a photographer who captured it's charms on film.  I had one, highly attended open-house showing and sold the home less than two weeks later for slightly over the asking-price.  Lorne's vast knowledge and experience and his uncanny ability to determine the precise selling price made it happen.  I appreciated that Claire Godfrey, his buyer specialist, showed me a very carefully curated selection of apartments so I didn't waste time looking at dozens of properties.  She found the perfect place and I love my new home.  I very highly recommend Lorne and his team to anyone buying or selling a home; they're the best!

reviews.name: MORRY GAERBER
reviews.text: I have had numerous dealings with Lorne over the years starting when he was the listing agent on my furst purchase.  He followed up with me 6 months after i had moved in to see how i was enjoying my purchase.  My own agent never even followed up with me! Since then he found me a wonderful home in kerrisdale that i have enjoyed for the last 20 years, he sold another property i had invested interest in at far above listing price, he made a referral to a great agent when i purchased a whistler property. i have nothing but good things to say about Lorne Goldman and his team.

reviews.name: Phillip Long
reviews.text:
Lorne Goldman and his staff performed a miracle in selling our house for our full asking price, and arranged an amazing non-refundable deposit paid on the day of our acceptance of the sales agreement. In addition, Lorne arranged a very affordable 2-year vendor rental agreement which will allow us to live in our house after its sale.

We decided to switch to Lorne after an unsuccessful 12-months with a national real estate firm. The other realtor had only one open house for realtors and no private showings in 12-months. Whereas Lorne had 19 private showings and 2 open houses in the period time it took him to sell my house.

His professionalism is outstanding. We were not rushed and Lorne insisted that I have my lawyer check all of the sales agreements that he brought to me. In conclusion, I can strongly recommend Lorne Goldman as a realtor. In my assessment, Lorne deserves a 6-star rating.

reviews.name: Gerry Schulz
reviews.text: Lorne and his staff performed a crackerjack job in selling our house.  The Goldman Team were marvelous throughout the entire sales process. Their professionalism in presenting the property was of the highest caliber. Highly recommended and will surely use there services again.

reviews.name: Marion Michel
reviews.text:
Thank you Lorne and everyone on "team Goldman" for making my house sale as stressless as possible. I super appreciated having NO open houses and how friendly and caring you all were.

Normally the last part of the selling process is very tense and I'm very happy that I didn't feel that this time.-- because Lorne and his team really know how to make the real estate experience better.

Like the friend who highly recommended Lorne Goldman to me, I'm glad I listed with him and his exceptional team.

reviews.name: Gary Goodfellow
reviews.text: Lorne and his team were great,  Good communication.Everything went very smooth. No problems.

reviews.name: Elizabeth Testa
reviews.text: I worked with Lorne on a recent real estate transaction and he was a true professional throughout the entire process. He is very prompt in his communication and was a pleasure to work with. He is highly skilled and knows real estate inside and out! I hope we will continue this successful business relationship.

reviews.name: Oleg Myaskovsky
reviews.text:
I had a great experience with Lorne and his team from the initial meeting all the way to the Offer stage. With Lorne's guidance and the involvement from the entire team, we were able to sell the property in a short period of time and at expected price.
I would work with Lorne again on any future real estate transactions and would recommend his service to anyone.

Thank you Lorne and the team,
Oleg Myaskovsky

reviews.name: Elly Hulyd
reviews.text: Lorne and Claire and the whole Team were fantastic with both the sale of our home and the purchase of a new home. Top notch professionals I would  highly  recommend.

reviews.name: susan blake
reviews.text:
I have just sold a second home in Vancouver with the assistance of Lorne Goldman and Associates — and it was a brilliant repeat performance!

Lorne brings years of experience to the local real estate market, and this translates directly into a highly efficient, step-by-step process matching sellers with motivated buyers. He has also cultivated a group of trusted team members. I never hesitated handing the keys to the castle to any one of his team. Loren’s daily telephone check-ins kept me feeling confident, and apprised of all updates.

With this most recent sale, he managed a multiple-offers situation during Covid-19 securing well-over asking price within 8 days; this was substantially over what had been anticipated the previous summer — I can’t say enough about this very savvy & professional real estate team. Their efforts and expertise are most appreciated — I highly recommend Lorne Goldman.

reviews.name: David Boca
reviews.text: Lorne and Claire sold our property in three weeks.  They were professional, aggressive, and had excellent follow through.  These are qualities you rarely see these days.  We would recommend them highly without reservation.  Thanks for a graceful transition.

reviews.name: K
reviews.text: We hired Lorne Goldman to help us sell our house in the spring of 2019. Mr. Goldman and his team displayed outstanding work ethics and expertise.They kept us continually updated and informed throughout the whole process. Their professionalism was much appreciated and they sold our house in the fall. Thank-you Lorne, Eleana, Lacey, Anne and the rest of the team!

reviews.name: Mark Stuart
reviews.text: Lorne and his team did a fantastic job of developing the right offer with key market conditions information, preparing and presenting the property with its key benefits clearly highlighted and generating interest, offers and closing the deal in an outstandingly short time. Great experience. Highest recommendation possible.

reviews.name: Azadeh Ardakani
reviews.text: Lorne Goldman and his amazing team are the most professional, knowledgeable and caring team.  They care deeply about their clients.  If you are looking for a five star team to help you, your family or friends with your real estate needs then go for the Lorne Goldman team.

reviews.name: Alan Rothenbush
reviews.text:
We used Lorne for the sale of a house in Vancouver followed immediately by the purchase of a "replacement" house in the Valley.

Lorne was instrumental in getting the Vancouver house sold in a timely manner.  And he did so during a market depressed by all the new government rules, regulations, taxes and disincentives, and without just "giving it away".

And his assistance in the purchase of the "replacement" house  more than an hour's drive away, particularly his experience and sage advice, was most appreciated.

The communication with him (and his excellent office staff) was first rate; at no time did we feel "left in the dark" for even a moment.

Most telling to me was the effort he put in after the deals were done, which is to say, after he had already been paid, when a blanket "just read the contract" was a perfectly reasonable response.

This potentially frustrating and certainly complicated pair of transactions went as smoothly as one could ever hope.

reviews.name: Willow King
reviews.text:
I've had the pleasure of working with Lorne Goldman on a few projects recently, and look forward to doing more business with him for years to come.
