He is a leader in his field, with exceptional market knowledge and savvy that you won’t get from your average realtor. It seems like he’s always on the clock, yet he brings an energy and excitement to his work that really shows you he loves what he does. Lorne inspires everyone around him to work harder and smarter, and the results speak for themselves.

Lorne is the consummate real estate professional – you want this guy on your team!

reviews.name: Kate Ruby
reviews.text: I have know Lorne for over 30 years and he has done a great job selling a number of our family properties. I have no hesitation in recommending this realtor that I have so much trust in.

reviews.name: Linda Freeland
reviews.text:
We would like to take the opportunity to express our gratitude to you for the outstanding job done selling our condo.
You and your team 'go the extra mile'!  We appreciate you keeping us up-to-date and informed throughout the process, with emails and phone calls, even when we were out of the country.  As well as being an outstanding communicator, your expertise and professionalism shine through in showing and marketing the condo in digital and printed brochures as well as regular newspaper advertisements.
We feel very fortunate to have had you as our realtor.  Thank you.
Sincerely,
Robert and Linda Freeland

reviews.name: Jay Shapka
reviews.text: Lorne's team was able to move quickly and help make a deal happen. He had some creative marketing ideas that really made out place stand out from the crowd, and he was open and patient with our suggestions. It's clear after working successfully with Lorne to sell our home as we bought another that he really knows his way around the Vancouver real estate market!

reviews.name: Lesley Esford
reviews.text: We met Lorne's team when we bought a house they were showing several years ago. From that first very positive experience we contacted him again when we decided to make another move. We received excellent help from Lorne and we also worked closely with Claire Godfrey, a key member of his team. We always felt well supported as they always kept in touch with all parts of the complexities of selling and buying. Lorne has a great team that is very knowledgeable and professional and takes care of all the details.

reviews.name: Nicholas Meyer
reviews.text: I have used the services of Lorne regularly over the years and have been very impressed by the thoroughness of his work, his approach,  his professional analysis and market "savvy" have helped my clients attain top returns on their investments.  An excellent negotiator, he provides the very best of service.  I am very happy to reccommend the services of Lorne Goldman as a most professional realtor.

reviews.name: Agatha Jassem
reviews.text: Claire Godfrey, along with Lorne, was very helpful in finding my husband and I our first home in a crazy market! She was patient and took the time to explain home ownership as well as tenancy laws to first time buyers and landlords. She was flexible with her time, working around our busy schedules and was always available when we needed to make quick decisions. After the purchase, she stayed in contact with us throughout our preparation to move in, and helped us through additional hurdles like rent back periods. She also made excellent suggestions for inspectors, insurance & mortgage brokers, and even furniture stores! Buying a home ended up a lot easier than I thought and we will use Claire and Lorne again if we move, but for now are enjoying our beautiful new home.

reviews.name: Jason Ng
reviews.text: Lorne helped my family and I purchase our first home, and the service was phenomenal.  He was professional, knowledgeable, patient and a true expert  when it comes to real estate.  Having him walk us through the process and educate us on all the intricacies was a great experience.  I've very confidently referred Lorne to family, friends and colleagues, and they've all received the same amazing service.

reviews.name: Shirley Chan
reviews.text: The Lorne Goldman team at MacDonald Realty made a real effort to sell my small condo in an uncertain environment with new government regulations creating fresh challenges to first time buyers.  Thank you and well done!

reviews.name: Angus Macgillivray
reviews.text: I've known Lorne for over 5 years and he is an amazing realtor. His attention to detail and efficiency dealing with clients results in faster sales. Lorne has a great team working with him and knows how to get things done!

reviews.name: hugh hutner
reviews.text: I have  bought and sold properties with Lorne since I moved to Vancouver in 2002. I always appreciate his honest straightforward manner and his thorough knowledge. This includes the colleagues he works with. He gets the details right and his advice is always spot on. Buying and selling is stressful but doing business with Lorne is one thing you don't have to worry about. He really gets the job done right. Many  thanks to him and his staff.

reviews.name: Bruce McDonald
reviews.text: Lorne is an exceptional realtor who has great listening skills, empathy and business acumen. His track record with his volume of sales combined with quality of satisfied clients is astounding!  No one in Real Estate any better than Lorne!

reviews.name: Angie Kouvousis
reviews.text: My experience with Lorne Goldman and his office was excellent. I was shown a very high level of professionalism and warmth. His experience and knowledge was exactly what I was looking for. I would definitely  recommend him.

Thank you!

Just purchased my first home with Matt (and Maryam!) and from start to finish, it was a really enjoyable experience with these two. Communication was fantastic, Matt was able to thoroughly answer all my non-stop questions immediately, no matter how obvious some of them may have been!
All his renovation experience/wisdom was a huge bonus at each of our viewings and really helped me envision all sorts of potential, especially in the one I ended up with!
Truly felt like I was working with a extremely professional friend that had my back throughout the whole process and would recommend Matt to any friend, family or colleague looking for their next realtor!

reviews.text: With all the realtors in BC, Matt stands out by a mile. He sold our place and helped with a purchase of a house right after. Attention to detail and going over and beyond what was expected. I can't stand lazy realtors who charge the world and do nothing. Matthew is a very rare exception and is quite the opposite and refreshing, especially in such a competitive market. Will definitely use him again!

reviews.text: When me and my husband decided to get into this crazy market, we had lots of fears: "are we going to be able to find something with our budget?" "how are we going to win a bid?". Matt guided us with confidence and he was always there to answer our questions! His advices helped us making important decisions with confidence and get a place that was a good match for us!

reviews.text: Matt has a great, down to earth personality. His knowledge about housing construction and renovations for homes is valuable to anyone looking for a house to flip, renovate or tear down to start again. I was impressed with his background and overall knowledge about homes!

He made the entire process as easy and stress free as it can be. I would highly recommend working with Matt!

reviews.text: Matt is a true professional who is dedicated to his clientele. You can trust Matt to work tirelessly for positive outcomes. He has a pulse on the market and fully invested into his profession.

reviews.text: I recently referred a client to Matt and he provided excellent service and got the job done. It wasn't easy as their offer was submitted along with other bids. He helped my client purchase their dream home. Thanks Matt!

reviews.text: Matt Dolan is an expert in his field.  He takes the needed time to do thorough due diligence on every search for his clients as if they are not only a client, but a friend or family member. It's a personal experience that I truly appreciate.

reviews.name: Matt Wong
reviews.text: I'd fully recommend Matt to anyone looking to purchase a new home. As first time home buyers, my wife and I were very pleased with Matt's knowledge and patience while educating and guiding us through our first home purchase. He was quick reply to all our questions and helped to make our house hunting experience as fun and exciting as we'd hoped. We couldn't be happier in our new place and will definitely work with him again!!

reviews.name: Lindsay Wong
reviews.text: My husband and I were working with another realtor initially and then decided to make the switch and go with Matt and we were so happy that we did! He was so easy to work with and so great when it came to answering all of my questions (I ask a lot of questions). Best of all, he found us a wonderful home in an area that we wouldn’t have even considered if it weren’t for him. Thanks so much Matt!!!

reviews.name: Qainoor Khan
reviews.text: Matt is a fantastic realtor to work with. Regardless of whether you are buying or selling a home, he is diligent and attentive to your needs, and will get you great results whatever you are looking for. I would highly recommend his services!

reviews.name: Nuvola Capitanio
reviews.text: As a fellow agent, I highly recommend using Matt as a Realtor. His expertise and knowledge in Real Estate and his background in construction will help give you the advantage against other agents when looking to purchase a new home. I see the amount of hard work and dedication Matt has for his clients and anyone would be fortunate to have him on their side when buying or selling a home. His dedication to his clients is second to none.

reviews.name: Steve Commons
reviews.text:
Matt represented us when we sold our townhouse and purchased our new home. On the sale side, he took on a challenging assignment to sell our townhouse located in the Downtown Eastside in a real estate market that was experienced reducing prices, a falling number of buyers, and an increased number of listings. Matt was patient and committed to the project, hosting several open houses and strategizing with us along the way.  Matt listened to our feedback and was proactive with his marketing approach. His marketing materials, including brochure and custom video, were very well done. Matt was consistently available, on time and dedicated to the process, ultimately selling our place to the right buyer.

On the buy side, we had a specific list of requirements for Matt, and he helped us secure the right place that fit our needs. We toured several properties with Matt and he helped guide us through the process. We had purchased three other properties before and we work in the business, so we were familiar with the process, but Matt definitely added significantly value along the way. We love our new home!

We would recommend Matt to buyers and sellers who are looking for a committed partner who acts in their best interest and knows how to get a deal done.

reviews.name: Mike Cuenta
reviews.text: What an amazing realtor to work with! Excellent service, courteous and above all... knowledgeable in his craft. When you are looking for a home - that's the type of realtor you need. So many realtors out there pretending like they know what they are doing but in reality have absolutely no clue! You won't go wrong with Matt!

reviews.name: Erin Stockwell
reviews.text:
I was referred to Matt through friends and am so grateful to be connected to such an knowledgable, attentive real estate professional who really goes to bat for his clients.

Matt Dolan is definitely THE GUY you want in your corner – and as an investor relations professional, my recommendation to all of my clients.

reviews.name: Anthony Rasotto
reviews.text: Matt is a super knowledgeable, insightful and a straight shooter. It's refreshing to speak to a realtor who encouraged patience--Matt has the client's best interest in mind. Recommend 100%.

reviews.text: Matt is an extremely knowledgeable realtor. He has a passion for real estate and customer service. He has strong communication skills and always made himself available for me. I would definitely recommend using his services when thinking of your next real estate move.

reviews.name: Jakob Somerton
reviews.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Matt on a couple of occasions, with both selling and buying. Matt is a pleasure to deal with and work with. He was very professional, courteous, and understanding of our needs. He marketed our property extremely well, to the point that we asked ourselves "Why are we selling?"  We would definitely use Matt again for our next Real Estate transaction with no hesitation what so ever.

In short words: Matt makes you feel like you are family and will definitely go the extra mile to make sure his clients are satisfied. When Looking for a realtor comfort and trust is what you always are looking for, and since finding Matt, me and my fiance look no further.

reviews.text: Ive worked with Matt on several projects where his clients have required painting services. I look forward to working with Matt more over the coming years and working together to provide a full and rewarding service for our clients.

reviews.text: I started working with Matt in search of a new place just prior to COVID-19, he was beyond helpful in finding my fiancee and I the exact types of places we are interested in buying. reviews.name: julie pranzl
reviews.text: I highly recommend Matt Dolan for your realtor needs.   Matt is hard working and offers professional, friendly, honest service. It was such a quick and easy process, he was at my beck and call anytime day or evening to address any and all questions or concerns quickly and effectively.   It all went so smooth the stress of selling my home was non-existent.

reviews.text: My wife and I had a great experience working with Matt. This was our first purchase and we couldn't have been more happy with how it went. Matt was not only very patient but listened and got us what we wanted. He was very professional, I would recommend him to anyone.

reviews.text: I recommended Matt Dolan to both my mum and sister. He was highly knowledgeable about the housing market and provided insight on different options available.  He was also able to negotiate for under asking price !

His innate ability to understand your priorities and what you will give and take in your forever home  - even before (as in my case)  you know it yourself is amazing. He is totally honest, and very reliable so I have no hesitation recommending him to any prospective buyer or seller.  Take it from me, you wont be disappointed!

Thanks Matt!

reviews.text: I recently purchased a condo with Matt in Vancouver's West End. Matt was dedicated, he paid close attention to my criteria and was able to find me something within my budget. I highly recommend Matt and his abilities as a Vancouver realtor.

reviews.text: Reliable and hardworking. Very dedicated to his clients and business.

reviews.name: Rehman Esmail
reviews.text: Matt's work ethic, industry knowledge, and persistence are three qualities that stand out, however his passion to put his customers first and go above and beyond are attributes that separate himself than other Realtors in the local market.

reviews.text: From the age of 5, Matt Dolan has been an entrepreneur. For that reason and the reason of him being who he is today, which is a very dedicated, hard-working person, he gets five stars from me!

reviews.name: Katherine White
reviews.text: I recently  used Matthew Dolan to sell a condo. I can't say enough about how pleased I was with him and the entire transaction from beginning to end. He was very helpful in making suggestions to help make for a quick and easy sale and was always available for any questions I had concerning the process. Right before the open house (and we only needed the one!) he made a couple of little updates and tweaks himself so the place would really shine. He had a great marketing plan which included extensive use of social media and the use of professional photography and videography. All this translated to the place selling within days of being listed, at a very favourable price. Matthew Dolan offers a professional service that I would recommend 100% to anyone.

reviews.name: tanya faurot
reviews.text: I recently used Matt Dolan to sell our place and buy a new house. And I was completely impressed with how easy he made the Process! His little tips to help us increase the value of or house helped us get an offer for over $50,000 over asking price in just over a week of being on the market! Not only that, when we purchased a house, his superb negotiation skills were put to use when he was able to get us our new house over $40,000 UNDER asking, which is practically unheard of in this hot market. He and Rod Bahari at six zero four real estate have an excellent marketing campaign to help sell houses and I would not hesitate in recommending either of them if you are in the market to buy or sell. Thanks again Matt for finding us our new home!

reviews.name: Patricia Stoneking
reviews.text: Excellent customer satisfaction.  Matthew attends to every detail... helping with all details large or small.  A professional realtor with a friendly, hands on style... this is the guy to help you sell or buy your home.  Well recommended       ***** 5 stars all the way *****

reviews.text: Huge thank you to Mathew in selling our place! My wife and I sold our home for 125k over asking price! I couldn't recommend a better realtor than him,he's crushing it!Big thank you for all you've done for our family!

reviews.text: Matt has gone above and beyond to help me with any questions I have about buying a house, mortgages, home reno's, you name it!

reviews.text: Matt was with us every step of the way, catering to our every need. I'll highly recommend Matt to everyone I know. Thanks again Matt!

reviews.text: It was a tough market but Matt found me my dream home and helped me every step of the way. Not only did he find me the perfect home he set me up with the right people to ensure my first time home buying experience was seamless and easy.

reviews.text: Matthew was super professional and efficient in our recent condo sale. Plus, we got over asking, thanks to him!

title: Lee + Pete Vancouver Real Estate Group
address: 3195 Oak St, Vancouver, BC V6H 2L2, Canada

reviews.name: Erin O'Brien
reviews.text: Pete and his Team helped make our patio dreams come true! Pete is a very experienced realtor who provides sound advice and knows the Vancouver market inside and out.  Pete and his Team helped us buy our new place with an awesome expansive patio and sold our existing condo during challenging market conditions.  We were so impressed with Pete and the service he provided that we recommended him to our friends who are also in the process of looking for a new home & selling their current place. In addition to being highly knowledgeable, he is calm and collected which lowered our stress levels during the buy/sell negotiations.  After all the dust settled, Pete checked in with us and provided us with trusted references for trades. Thank you Pete!

reviews.name: Lindsay Gordon
reviews.text: Daylan helped my partner Jonathan and I purchase our first place in Vancouver over the summer. Being new home buyers, naturally we had a lot of questions and Daylan was always patient and calm, but had a sense of humour that we certainly appreciated on long tour days. Daylan was always punctual, replied quickly to our questions and provided us with the information we needed to make us feel informed and comfortable throughout the process. His carpentry background was also very helpful, particularly when it came to older Vancouver buildings (and the issues with rain screening and the potential need for renovations and the associated costs etc.). After only a few weeks and and a number of tours, we managed to find a lovely town-home and Daylan helped us negotiate a fantastic price, and we couldn't be happier. Thank you for making our first purchase such a great one, Daylan!

reviews.name: Peyvand Padidar
reviews.text: Pete and his team were amazing to work with. We’ve worked with Pete previously on our house purchase and sale of our townhouse this year. Even during a pandemic, him and his team put us at ease and got us an offer that we were really happy with! I would highly recommend Lee and Pete for all your real estate needs!

reviews.name: Gillian Harvey
reviews.text: Lee provided sound, professional and honest advice from our first conversation through to closing the deal. Lee and his team are an excellent group to work with and made the entire process run smoothly. Clear communication, very responsive and overall very enjoyable to work with. Rest assured, you’re in great hands!

reviews.name: JUSTIN BRUMELLE
reviews.text:
Helped us secure our dream home...
Would highly recommend Daylan and Pete to anyone looking to buy or sell real estate...

reviews.name: Christina Ludwicki
reviews.text: I first met Lee 5 years ago when I was shopping for a Condo. He quickly got what I was looking for, and was able to find the condo that fit all the criteria on my must-have list. He  negotiated a deal to allow me to purchase my place at a great price. Flash forward to 5 years later, when I want to sell my condo to upgrade to something bigger, his team quickly produced gorgeous marketing to highlight the key features of my condo. His team was great at showing our place and we got some fantastic offers within a short time of being on the market. Would highly recommend Lee and his team to anyone.

reviews.name: Neil Saxon
reviews.text: Pete is a very calm and easy person to get along with. He’s knowledgeable of the Vancouver real estate market and is quick to respond and take action. He finds a nice balance of when to give you space to make a decision and when to provide input. We’ve both bought and sold with Pete and would highly recommend him for any real estate transaction.

reviews.name: Joanna Korres
reviews.text: Our first home purchasing experience went quickly and smoothly as Dylan Butchart is a client focused, respectful and a well informed Realtor. After our first meeting with Daylan, he knew exactly what we were looking for when we had no clue. He took a stressful time for me and my fiance, made it exciting and positive as he made himself available to us whenever we needed him. His excellent market knowledge made the whole process of finding the right home for us painless.  We really appreciate his respect and consideration for us, how we were feeling and what we were thinking. He remained honest and upfront during the whole time which lead us to the most perfect new home. His calm and efficient approach made the whole buying process seem so easy. We really appreciate everything you did for us!

reviews.name: Tanya Shewfelt
reviews.text:
The first time I used Daylan’s services, he helped me purchase an investment property in Yaletown. I was impressed by his knowledge of Vancouver’s downtown condo market. He helped me narrow down my search and to decide on which building would yield me the best return on investment as well as providing much-needed strata information. It was so helpful.

But that’s not the thing that impressed me the most, it was the way he helped me when I faced a family emergency just days before the deal closed. The deal was at the tedious stage, where all of the details about lawyers and paperwork are at their thickest. And thankfully, Daylan was there to guide me through the process. He showed empathy and compassion and went out of his way to help with all aspects.Those are skills you can’t learn in a real-estate course, but are rooted in his personality.

So fast forward to February 2020 and it was no-brainer that I’d use Daylan again to sell my condo. He was prepared, and knew the market, I trusted his opinions, and felt comfortable with his selling strategy. And  just like how he predicted, I had two offers on the first open house. We had a conditional offer, everything in place, potential buyers were pre-approved, the deal looked like an easy one. However, no one saw the shakeup that was about to happen thanks to Covid-19. Once the world shut down, things in the deal became complicated as the banks were in an upheaval. It quickly turned from a seller’s market to a buyer’s market within days, even hours. Things were unpredictable and what complicated the matter is I was living in London, England at the time, in the midst of one of the world’s biggest coronavirus epicentres. But with Daylan, nothing phased this guy. He continued providing his professional support, including getting up at all hours of the night to communicate with me in the UK timezone. He told me to stay safe and not to worry as it was his job to take care of the deal. I can’t tell you what this support felt like, in the midst of one of the most harrowing things I’ve encountered. The deal was a difficult one, to say the least.Because the banks and the world were shutting down. The economy, the world, was a mess. But Daylan kept his cool. All things eventually finalized and I was really happy with the results. And he offered to help during my quarantine, when I moved back to Vancvouer in April. Those nice things like that, the way people in Vancouver go above and beyond, that’s why we have the best country in the world.

Daylan is an effective real estate agent but also, he’s a really emotionally solid person. This is a combination that makes him successful. I’d recommend Daylan in a heart beat.

reviews.name: Michal Bartlomowicz
reviews.text: We contacted Pete to help sell our townhouse earlier this year. In what was a challenging market for sellers, Pete and his team went above and beyond to make our home stand out. Everything from staging and photography to the weekly open houses and well designed pamphlets helped to show our home in the best light possible. As a result the home received a significant amount of attention on the market. Crucially, at the negotiating stage, Pete proved himself to have a great intuition in how to proceed with every offer and was an assuring presence throughout. Ultimately, comparing similar properties on the market, I believe that Pete helped to attain the maximum value possible for our home. Pete and his team are highly recommended and we would happily work with them again in the future.

reviews.name: David Burgess
reviews.text: Pete helped me sell our apartment in Coal Harbour whilst we were living in MALAYSIA. I found him very responsive and committed to achieve the sale. He helped us stage the property, find good accountants and lawyers and even someone to redecorate. Despite a tough market he found us a buyer and achieved a fast completion so that we could meet a self imposed deadline.  Great positive energy and can do attitude. Thanks Pete!

reviews.name: Allison Jewell
reviews.text: My husband and I bought our first home and we could not have been happier with the service provided Pete and his team. Pete was patient, informative, personable and a great negotiator, getting us an a great deal on an amazing townhouse. Not only did Pete spend weekends taking us on well organized home tours, but also assisted us with reviewing and understanding the depreciation reports, strata docs etc. prior to making our decision. The service did not end after our offer was accepted. Pete and his team supported us throughout the entire closing process, which can be daunting to new owners such as ourselves. We would recommend Lee + Pete Vancouver Real Estate Group to anyone.

reviews.name: Alesha L
reviews.text: Pete was recommended to us by a co-worker, and we are very happy that he was. We contacted him out of the blue and with short notice he was able to set us up with 25+ property viewings within a tight time frame. We were new to Vancouver and relied on Pete’s expertise about neighbourhoods, developers and building construction to make a smart buy. Thanks to Pete we were able to find and close on a great condo in a high quality building. There was a bit of a hiccup with possession as the previous owners handed over the keys without cleaning anything, however Pete was quick to remedy the issue and ensured the situation was made right. We were particularly impressed by his quick response times and availability via text, calls and emails. Pete provides high quality service and is a pleasure to work with. We highly recommend Pete and his team, and will be calling him when it's time for our next real estate sale endeavour.

reviews.name: Brandon Biln
reviews.text: We were referred to Pete by a friend and we were extremely happy with his service. Pete was professional, provided excellent communication, and made great efforts to fit showings and meetings into our busy schedules. We never felt rushed and Pete took the time to explain the process and details. Most importantly, Pete was calm and able to guide us through the stressful moments that come with purchasing a home. An amazing negotiator, Pete was able to help us find and purchase our home in only a number of weeks. Thanks Pete! We'll be sharing your name with friends and family and will be in touch when we are in the market again. Brandon and Jane.

reviews.name: Stephen Cundy
reviews.text: I have nothing but positive things to say about our experience working with Pete and his team. Pete is genuine, professional, knowledgeable, patient and has his clients best interests at the forefront of any sale or purchase. Pete comes into his own during the crunch time of buying or selling, and I'm grateful to have had him on our team.

reviews.name: Lina Cadili
reviews.text: I am extremely impressed by how hardworking, personable and caring Pete is. It took me a while to decide on buying a place but Pete was so patient with me; I never felt pushed to make a decision that I was not comfortable with. I felt his advice and opinions were very genuine, as if they were coming from a family member. He was very flexible, worked around my schedule, and was available at any hour of the day and responded to me instantly. I truly had a phenomenal experience with him and Oakwynn realty, and will definitely be referring all of my friends to Pete.

reviews.name: Liam Hancock
reviews.text: Lee and his team did a fantastic job on both sides of my house move. In a soft market, he negotiated a great price on my new home and then was able to sell my home quickly. The team is knowledgeable and comprehensive. They use a full suite of marketing and media to get your property in front of as many eyes as possible, and make it look as good as possible! Thanks for making this challenging time a great experience!

reviews.name: Ashley Watson
reviews.text: We worked with Madison to purchase our first Vancouver home. From the outset it was clear that she is very committed to her work and went above and beyond to deliver the best home-buying experience for us. She was incredibly knowledgeable and professional throughout the entire process. My husband and I would highly recommend Madison!

reviews.name: Andy Saran
reviews.text: The Lee + Pete team were amazing and did a fantastic job from the start of our hunt to the day we took possession.  Lee Bryant was always able to answer a lot of detailed questions especially with additional parking/storage (which we secured), the market, long term growth and his outlook on the downtown condo market.  His negotiation skills made us feel comfortable to the price we were willing to pay.  He actually advised us to hold off for a few months while the owner came down to a reasonable price which we were able to secure.  Thank you to the entire team for making our holidays a special one..

reviews.name: Clement Lam
reviews.text: Selling a condo is always stressful. Selling a condo 2000 miles away is even more stressful. Fortunately, we found Pete on the web. Pete in person was every bit as knowledgeable and helpful as the reviewers all said. He had a well-tested marketing plan and gave us expert advice on how to prepare the condo for sale. His team prepared wonderful marketing material and helped us in all aspects of the sale, from arranging cleaning to the final removal of furniture. He and his team managed to smooth out the negotiation process across two continents and three time zones. Everything, from the initial listing to the final closing of the sale was done in less than one month. The professionalism and efficiency of his team earned my highest respect. If you want to sell your property and minimize stress,  I would strongly recommend Pete's team.

reviews.name: Sarah Curtis
reviews.text: I worked with Lee and his team, never knew them before this current sale and was pleasantly surprised about how efficient they were with my recent sale. They gave me realistic goals,and sold the place so quick in a difficult market. They will be the only realtors I will recommend to my friends and family for Vancouver. Great team and so smart, honest and efficient.

reviews.name: Erica Helmer
reviews.text: We can't say enough good things about working with Pete and his team.  They were extremely professional and thoughtful with their service and managed to get our sale done under a tight timeframe in a challenging market. From great pictures and open houses, timely progress updates and responsive communication right to move out cleaning and handyman recommendations, Pete made the entire process manageable and enjoyable!

reviews.name: Ali Nazari
reviews.text: Pete is the most knowledgeable and experienced realtor I have ever worked with. He has impressive negation skills and knowledge of the market. He has surrounded himself with a great team of talented and motivated individuals who always have his clients’ interests in mind. My last experience with him was a purchase of a two-bedroom condo in downtown, which couldn’t have happened if it wasn’t for him. I highly recommend him and will surely be working with him in future.

reviews.name: Mallory Lee-Gilson
reviews.text: Daylan and Pete were wonderful! Very efficient, professional and attentive. I would recommend them to anyone!

reviews.name: Emily Gardner
reviews.text: My partner and I recently worked with Daylan to purchase our first apartment together. I cannot express how great Daylan was throughout the entire experience. Every single viewing we went to he was prepared and patient with us as we view apartment after apartment to find the perfect fit for us. The next time we want to buy an apartment we will definitely be speaking with Daylan again and I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a real estate agent!

reviews.name: Brad Byblow
reviews.text: We were very fortunate for our friend to recommend Pete to us.  We had such a positive and excellent experience that we are happy to also recommend Lee + Pete Real Estate Group!  Pete and Kristin were incredibly knowledgeable, caring, punctual and honest.  The communication and follow up was exactly as they promised and overall they were a great team to work with.

reviews.name: Nick Thompson
reviews.text: Lee and his team were great to deal with. In today’s market it is so important to have the very best on your side. These are the guys you want. They were always available to answer any of our questions, put a huge effort into every step of the process and got us a great deal.

reviews.name: Carla Hartzenberg
reviews.text: We recently sold our condo and purchased a house with Pete Shpak from Lee and Pete, both purchase and sale were seamless! Pete and his team ensured our condo was in tip top shape for all the marketing materials and open house. Our condo sold in one week for full ask! We then purchased a home that has exceeded our expectations! In looking for our new home, Pete guided us through open houses in different neighbourhoods we were interested in, which made us feel comfortable with our final choice. I would not hesitate to recommend Pete for both your sale and purchase.

reviews.name: Alexandra Shiman
reviews.text:
My husband and I were looking for our first home, but had a few specific ideas in mind for our "dream home". We sat down with Elliot and told him exactly what we wanted. He sent us a few different listings. One of the listings happened to be exactly what we wanted. We fell in love with it instantly.

Elliot immediately set up an appointment for us to view it and supported us when we were ready to make an offer (different than what was listed). In the end, thanks to Elliot's support, we found our dream home. It's been a few years and we're still in our dream home and couldn't be happier. Thanks Elliot!

reviews.name: Carol Moura
reviews.text: Pete helped us with the purchase of our condo 5 years ago. When our family started to grow and we needed a bigger space it was a no brainer to call him again this year. He helped us with the sale of the condo and with the purchase of our new home. His negotiations skills are amazing. He is patient, very knowledgeable of the market, well connected, great sense of humour and his team is awesome, helpful and super professional.

reviews.name: C C.
reviews.text: Pete and his team helped us with the sale of our condo. When it comes to real estate agents, the difference between a good one and an average one is that, the good one possesses the ability to help you resolve unexpected issues and hiccups during the process. This is the quality you would want in your realtor and Pete is your guy. Not only does he ensure consistent quality in the properties that he represent, he will also do everything in his power to make sure the transaction goes smoothly. You will be happy that you chose him as your realtor!

reviews.name: Bryce O'Reilly
reviews.text:
Amazing experience selling our condo through the Lee and Pete Real Estate team! Lee is an amazing agent who was helpful, informative, and never pressured any decision we had to make. He was patient with us, accomodating, and helped us get the best price possible! Kristen was also amazing and helpful in setting up all the showings and open houses. She was always prepared, always on time, and always made sure all parties were clearly communicated to.
Thanks for the amazing experience Lee and Pete!

reviews.name: Bryan Markovic
reviews.text: Id recommend these guys to anyone looking to buy or sell.  Pete has worked on a few deals on my behalf now.  Each time Pete and his team were  extremely patient and laid out all of the best options for me.  100% confidence with them, look forward to my next purchase.

reviews.name: Cracote Comet
reviews.text: We worked with Madison to buy our first condo and we feel so lucky to have found her, she is awesome! Always available to talk about our concerns or answer our questions, we couldn't have found a better agent. She's a great human too :) and we love the place we bought!!!

reviews.name: Evan Gjernes
reviews.text:
I bought my first home with Pete Shpak, a truly great experience!  He's not just another realtor who throws around a title of being "one of the top realtors in Vancouver", you can tell he earned that title.  He's extremely knowledgeable about the market and educated me at every step of the way on what to look out for that could cost me money down the road.  A few times he even encouraged me not to throw down an offer because he didn't feel like it was a good investment for me.  He's not out to just sell any home, he's out to build a trusted relationship and knows that will earn my business time and time again.

Thanks Pete!

reviews.name: Kim Humphreys
reviews.text: Madison Corday is a 5 star-plus real estate professional!  We have bought/sold numerous houses and Madison far exceeded all others!  She is highly professional and attentive.  She listens and her follow up goes well beyond expectations.  She's a great negotiator and a trusted advisor.  We highly +++ recommend Madison to anyone selling and buying a house!

reviews.name: Jamie Macdonald
reviews.text: We were repeat customers for Pete Shpak and, while the team has grown, the excellent service remains the same. Pete and the team are extremely knowledgeable about the market in Vancouver, well connected, and have the  attention to detail that allows clients to rest easy. Very happy with the service and look forward to working with them again.

reviews.name: Nicole Briann
reviews.text: If your looking for the best realtor in the city then you have come to the right place. Lee and his Team are far and above the competition. They are honest, hard working and in tune with the market. I have already referred Lee to many of my friends and family and will continue to do so in the future.

reviews.name: Laila Ragupathy
reviews.text: My fiance and I purchased our first property in Vancouver with the assistance of Pete and team. Pete's knowledge and expertise are second-to-none, and his commitment to meeting the needs of his clients is what impressed us the most. We are ever-grateful for Pete's guidance, skill and sense of humour, and we could not be happier with our new home.

reviews.name: Alanna Rogers
reviews.text: The team at Lee & Pete offer the best service when it comes to real estate. We've worked with them a few times now and they will always be our first choice for a realtor in Vancouver. We have always felt heard + understood by them, and the entire team goes above and beyond in making sure our needs are met (and exceeded) when it comes to buying + selling a home.

reviews.name: Eric Kennedy
reviews.text: The best service you will find! I would only suggest Pete's team hands down. Thanks for helping find a place easy and for a deal!

reviews.name: Gregg Smillie
reviews.text:
Pete and his team have helped, and continue to help,  myself, friends, and family with real estate purchases and sales.  He is low/no pressure, very knowledgeable, and is focused on helping you get the right home, whatever that means for you.

We are grateful for his guidance and skillful approach as well as his prompt communication.  Thank you for all of your help!

reviews.name: James Dickson
reviews.text: Lee and team were instrumental in the sale and purchase of my new home. Lee was able to structure my offer in A beneficial way that although it wasn’t the highest offer - the seller still accepted.  I look forward to working with them in the future and would highly recommend to friends and family.

reviews.name: Josh Neumann
reviews.text: I’ve worked with the team at Lee and Pete’s for the past year and they are all about their clients. I’ve never seen anyone get so excited to help someone find their dream home. I’ve recommended them to my family and friends on numerous occasions and everyone is all smiles. They also throw a great Christmas party!

reviews.name: Mike Accettura
reviews.text:
6 Stars!
Was an absolute blessing to have Madison and Lee recommended to me. As a first time home buyer I had no knowledge in what I was doing and only wish I had reached out earlier. Madison took care of everything i needed and everything i didn't know I needed! Referred her to friends and everyone has had the same top tier experience.

Cant wait to work with them again.

reviews.name: Cole Bryant
reviews.text: The entire team offered great service. They were extremely professional and got things done. The demonstrated that they know where the markets at which made me feel very comfortable to sell and buy with them.

reviews.name: Janet S
reviews.text: Lee’s negotiation skills, professionalism and knowledge in the market allowed us to relax, knowing he would get us the best outcome when purchasing our new home. Rest assured when working with the Oakwyn Team, their efficiency and skills will get you the best results. Can’t wait to work with them again soon! Thank you Lee, Madison and Kristin!

reviews.name: Nolan Rivers
reviews.text: Lee and Pete are your best choice real estate agents if you are looking to buy or sell real estate in the Vancouver area. Both have been top realtors in the region for a number of years, so their track record speaks for itself. Their depth of experience and diligent support team give you a leg up on the competition. Give yourself the best change and give then a call.

reviews.name: Andrew Persaud
reviews.text: I've have done deals with Bryant and Lasko in the past and I can honestly say that their work ethic is beyond reproach. They truly look out for their clients and on top of that they listen carefully and give great advice! I've dealt with Elliot Tan specifically and he will go over and above for his client. It's no wonder he does so well. He caters to his clients needs. Truly spectacular! He's got my business for sure! Well done!

reviews.name: Jonathan Conlin
reviews.text:
We have used Pete and his team for the purchase and sale of a Gastown condo, the purchase and sale of a Fairview townhouse and now the purchase of an Edgemont house.

In all instances, we received excellent service and Pete exceeded our expectations. His whole team is extremely professional and made each process smooth.

Pete is our first recommendation for a realtor in Vancouver - keep up the great work!

reviews.name: The House of Blond
reviews.text:
I love these guys! They worked so hard to find me the property I really wanted and didn’t let me give up!
Really fun team on top of being very professional.

reviews.name: Chris Tam
reviews.text:
Elliot Tan has provided superb professional services in the sale of a property. Like many of you reading this review, I first came across Elliot's name through browsing online reviews and conducting researches on real estate agents in the frantic Vancouver market.

To be honest, I was a little skeptical of the positive reviews I read about Elliot at first, as the real estate agency relationship is a little more complicated than say Yelp reviews on restaurants, and there is yet a comprehensive platform with peer/customer review of real estate services. However, Elliot's professional manner, attention to details, and personable demeanor quickly made my skepticism mute. Even after a deal has been reached, Elliot has consistently demonstrated attention and care, and offered to assist with the various little yet time-consuming items involved in a sale, such as tending to additional conditions demanded by the buyer, lining up lawyers/realtors, assisting with property search etc.

I have had positive experience working with Elliot and would recommend him without a doubt. In fact, I have already referred his services to a family member.

reviews.name: Liliana Romo
reviews.text: It was a pleasure to work with Pete! He made sure we were totally set up with the buying of our house and very supportive with the selling. Way to go Pete!!

reviews.name: Rehman Esmail
reviews.text: I had a great experience working with Lee. He helped me find the place I wanted in Vancouver, while at the same time dealing with a very difficult housing market. The best aspect when working with Lee was his understanding of what was important to me, while setting realistic expectations throughout the process. I would highly recommend him as a Realtor in the Vancouver market.

reviews.name: Lindsay Zepeski
reviews.text: Lee Bryant will tell it to you straight and get you the best price possible, buying or selling. Very professional and easy to work with! I have had great experiences buying and selling several times with Lee and his team. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Alex McFadyen
reviews.text:
As a Mortgage Broker I get the opportunity to work together with plenty of real estate partners and to stand above in this field is no small task.

Elliot has done this now for years and consistently been someone I trust to refer to friends, family and clients. His approach is calm, focused and precise.

I would be more than happy to recommend Elliot to any others looking to purchase or sell a home or investment property!

reviews.name: Van T.
reviews.text: Daylan and Pete did a phenomenal job of helping me purchasing my own place as a first-time homeowner. Pete is very knowledgeable about the market and easy-going. Daylan is very prompt, friendly and always ready to answer all questions or concerns. I never felt rushed or forced to do any transaction. I highly recommend both Daylan and Pete for future clients.

reviews.name: ingrid mayer
reviews.text: I had an awesome experience working with Daylan to buy a townhouse. He was endlessly helpful, prompt, knowleable and patient, going far beyond my expectations to find exactly the right property for me, and well within my budget!

reviews.name: umma palmer
reviews.text: We have bought and sold a number of properties with Lee, he is amazing! Quick, effective, and professional.. We are beyond pleased with every deal we’ve done.

reviews.name: Brad D
reviews.text: I have done a number of real estate deals with Lee, Madison and team. They are top-notch Realtors who really know the market, are easy to work with and can get things done right. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to buy or sell in or around Vancouver.

reviews.name: P. Gray
reviews.text: Lee and the rest of the team at Bryant and Lasko were with me while I purchased and sold my first home.  They're knowledge, care and confidence made the experience exceptionally smooth.  My needs were met with excellent communication which allowed me to relax during the purchasing and selling of my home.  I highly recommend their services.

reviews.name: Janeen Goligher
reviews.text: If you want the best price and great service to walk you through buying or selling a home Lee Bryant is your guy.  Lee helped me sell my condo and buy a house.  And a few years later he helped me sell the house to buy another condo and a lot to build my dream home.  Great pulse on the market I trust he'll help me again many more times.  Thank you Lee Bryant!

reviews.name: Adam St.Germain
reviews.text: I have both bought and sold with the Lee over the past couple of years and have had a great experience the team.  Not only did he show me several homes and answered all my questions but also helped me find a lawyer and mortgage broker in the buying process. When I sold my condo he got professional pictures taken and floorplans measured to enhance my listing.  My home sold in less than a week. I couldn't be happier.

reviews.name: Gary Tong
reviews.text: I worked with Daylan back in late 2017 when I was in the market to purchase my first home. Daylan was very diligent in gathering documents and setting up viewings for sale properties. He provided honest and professional advice that really eased my tensions as a first time home buyer. After completion of the sale, Daylan continued to be proactive in resolving a few logistical issues regarding my property with the selling agent. He was a pleasure a work with - highly recommended.

reviews.name: Amanda Brkich
reviews.text: We had an exceptionally seamless experience with Lee + Pete. With quick response, industry know-how and attention to detail, we would absolutely use the team again and have already recommended them to our family and friends. Thank you!

reviews.name: Lori K.
reviews.text:
I found Elliot on Yelp and based on his reviews, I decided to contact him. Since I was a first time buyer, I didn't know what to expect and was quite intimidated by the process of buying a home. He was very quick in responding to my first message and scheduled an appointment to meet with me to give me information on the current market, the process of buying, and how we were going to get what I was looking for. He took his time to teach me everything and I left the meeting excited about buying my first place! He even looked up listings with me during our meeting and scheduled a showing for the next day!

He set me up to receive listings once they came onto the market and what I was really impressed with was how proactive and communicative he is! Whenever he saw a listing that he thought I would like he would send me an email with some pointers of the particular listing and whenever I liked a listing, I would email him and he would respond with answers in a heartbeat! He always made me feel comfortable in contacting him with any and every question I had and he always had a super fast response time, doesn't matter what time of day it was!

All of the above is really great, but what I really appreciated was when it came time to move on a place that I really liked. The Vancouver real estate market is really crazy and because he prepare me for it, I was actually able to get the place I wanted, stress free! The minute I told him I liked this place, he started to work on putting a deal together for me. And because he moved really quick and prepared an offer for me, I managed to actually negotiate on the price (which never happens anymore) and get an accepted offer. He even told me that the condo received TWO other offers after they already accepted ours but because they were too slow, I got it! I even had subjects in there to do an inspection - which he also provided for me for free since I found him on Yelp!

The whole process was super smooth, start to finish and it was all because I had Elliot on my side! He even put me in touch with a great mortgage broker, inspector, insurance agent, and notary - and they were all great!

I'm super happy with my place and I would definitely recommend Elliot to anyone looking to buy!

BONUS: Elliot informed me that a similar unit to mine sold 2 weeks after I bought for $14,000 more than what I paid!!

reviews.name: Paul Gill
reviews.text: Had the pleasure of working with Pete on the sale of our home. Great experience beginning to end. Professional, insightful, and service-driven. Thank you.

reviews.name: Roxana Bellini Bressi
reviews.text: We recently bought our condo with Daylan from Lee and Pete. Daylan was great to work with always very accommodating. He made our first purchase experience a memorable one.

reviews.name: Kyle Libby
reviews.text: My wife and I just recently closed on our second property with Lee. It was a pre build that we actually bought almost three years ago. At the time we didn't think that we would be able to make the deal work ,but Lee was able to negotiate with developer and we were able to complete the sale. If it wasn't for Lee's hard work we would have not been able to stay living in the neighborhood(mount pleasant) with our growing family. Can't thank you enough Lee.

reviews.name: Kimberley Tom
reviews.text: Madison is very helpful and knowledgable about the units she's sent me. She is always available to help and answer any questions I have. Thank you Madison!

reviews.name: Amy Bonner
reviews.text: Lee helped me buy a pre-sale in 2014.  He was amazing and proactive in finding me options.  So happy he helped me make the best investment of my life.

reviews.name: Stan Mazursky
reviews.text: Lee and his team were great to work with, and the best realtors I have worked with in Vancouver. Would highly recommend.

reviews.name: Arena Sidhu
reviews.text: Very professional realtor.  Detail oriented. Takes the time to understand what you are looking for and provides you with an outcome that will make you happy!

reviews.name: Jenny
reviews.text:
I was very lucky to have Daylan be my realtor from Lee + Pete Vancouver Real Estate Group. Daylan reached out shortly after I first met him at an open house. Ever since then, I have been his client and we worked closely to find my first home.

It is very uncommon to be a first-time home buyer at such a young age, however Daylan has treated me with nothing but respect while providing his professional services. Despite me being a complete newbie to the all-things related to real estate, Daylan was quick with thorough answers at any given hour. He even took time out of his busy schedule to meet me at a nearby coffee shop on-time and was ready to patiently discuss the entire process when purchasing a home and answered any questions thrown at him.

Daylan has a solid work ethic and works well with other people. I am happy to recommend Daylan to anyone as their realtor as he is a career-driven, talented, and trustworthy individual.

reviews.name: Jeff Hodgson
reviews.text: We love our place.  Lee really took the time to find us the perfect condo for our lifestyle. We recommend him to everyone we know.

reviews.name: Monica Alcerreca
reviews.text: Madison was outstanding in helping my husband and I find our next place! She was very proactive, knowledgeable and always available. Thanks Madison!!!

reviews.name: mm am
reviews.text: I did a significant amount of research on who to choose as my realtor. Upon my research, I found Lee and Pete Vancouver Real Estate Group. They came and met me for coffee, answered all my questions, and made me feel comfortable. Needless to say,  they were absolutely phenomenal. I honestly cannot think of a single complaint. Daylan was my main contact and realtor throughout this process and let me tell you, when you think of the ideal realtor, Daylan should come to mind. He goes over and beyond expectations. A realtor should work for the client and Daylan does just that. He answers every phone call you make to him, regardless of the time of day and answers all of your texts in a matter of seconds. For example, every time I had questions about the unit’s bylaws, he would quickly go and research the information and not only answer them for me, but send me a screenshot of the main source. Daylan strive’s to make the client's life easier. He listened to my needs and requirements and he delivered every time. He is a very punctual individual and I mean down to the minute. He was never late and had the facts on every unit we viewed. Most times he knew more about a building than the actual seller’s realtor. Daylan made my family and I’s experience of purchasing an amazing one and there is no one else that I would ever recommend other than Lee and Pete Vancouver Real Estate Group.

reviews.name: Sharon Chee
reviews.text: Great experience. Madison is knowledgeable and reliable. She is a pleasure to work with and you can really see the passion she has with the business!

reviews.name: Marsel Botirov
reviews.text:
Working with Pete and Daylan was such a pleasure from the very beginning to the end. I sat down with Pete with a list of questions that he was able to answer without hesitation, he then placed me on a search and started a WhatsApp chat between him, Daylan & myself where I was able to ask as many questions as I pleased that was always promptly answered by either Pete or Daylan. Daylan was the primary agent I worked with while we were out viewing homes, and I was delighted by his professionalism and charismatic attitude. He would make a list of what he liked about the unit, what he disliked, and would explain why after each showing. He was always concerned about whether It would be easy for me to re-sell in future while receiving a good return on my investment. Once we had found a unit I liked, Pete negotiated the purchase price down, made sure that all the documents had no surprises and kept me involved every step of the way, as well as recommended a mortgage broker that secured me a good rate and a home inspector that was also a pleasure to work with. I wouldn't recommend any other Realtors other than the Pete and Daylan. They made my first experience purchasing a home memorable for me and my family.
Thank you guys!!!

reviews.name: Nancy Chin
reviews.text: I've purchased multiple property through Bryant and Lasko Real Estate Team and they have always been master negotiators, making sure I purchase the investment properties at the best price possible, even in Vancouver's hot market. The Realtors on this team have always been professional, great to deal with, and on top of every step and paperwork needed to complete my purchase smoothly.

reviews.name: natasha harris
reviews.text: Pete was amazing, he made our whole experience stress free and really took great care of us.

reviews.name: Geoff Horsey
reviews.text: Lee and his team of Madison and Kristin are amazing! From start to finish they are working on your side, from helping you get your place ready tosell to helping you find your new home. They work efficiently as one well oiled machine.  I have worked with many realtors in the past and the difference in how they handle the process is night and day. I will never use a different realtor again and I will reccomend them to everyone. Thank you everyone for making everything happen in such a timely manner!

reviews.text: Madison was very professional and accommodating, Goes out of her way to stay on top of things. She always one step ahead and prepared for our many questions.

reviews.name: Dennis Peckham
reviews.text: I started working with John this past year, and met him through a recommendation from my previous agent. John listened to what I was looking for in my new place, and what I was hoping to accomplish in selling my existing property. He worked extremely hard to accommodate my schedule, and worked with how demanding I can be in certain situations lol. He guided me through a difficult market and I am extremely happy with the results that John helped accomplish. I would not hesitate to use John in the future, and would recommend him to anyone looking for a professional and  attentive agent. Thank you John for all your hard work!

reviews.name: Jessy Kordyback
reviews.text: I would highly recommend using John Ly as your real estate representative. He was very knowledgeable and attentive for us while we bought our first home. He made us feel very at ease through the whole process. We can’t thank him enough for helping us find our forever home.

reviews.name: Elizabeth Joe
reviews.text: John Ly continually exceeded my expectations with each of our interactions as he remained consistently committed to having my interest at heart.  He was always attentive to my evolving criteria during the entire process.  In addition, he provided unwavering support during times I felt overwhelmed.  John's level of knowledge and preparedness is awe-inspiring as is his consistent level of prompt communication.  It is clear he never falls short from the highest standards he sets for himself.  It is also quite evident why he is an 11 Year Gold Master Medallion Award Winner and a member of the President's Club 2019 - Top 1% of REALTORS.  I am adamant the world needs to experience John Ly's talents and, importantly, experience how genuine he is when relating to his clients.  -EJ (2021)

reviews.name: Andrea & Jeff
reviews.text:
Thank you John!

We just purchased our first family home with John and we can’t say enough about the respectful and professional way he treated us.

It was a perfect balance of patience and urgency. He was calm and understanding while answering our questions and he gave us time to make decisions... but he was very responsive and quick to take action when we asked for more information or to view a property.

John was supportive and positive through the entire experience and now we’re excited to be moving into our dream home!

reviews.name: Ryan Mackey
reviews.text: John is the best! John has been our realtor for close to 10 years and has found us two homes. While he is professional, capable and very good at his job, it's his personality that makes John truly stand out. He has a pleasant personality, is easy to talk to, calm and conducts himself with the highest level of integrity - which for me is the most important quality a realtor should have. If you're thinking of working with John, don't hesitate and call him now. Thanks John!

reviews.name: Robin Yang
reviews.text: John has been our realtor for the last 11yrs. In that time he has helped us purchase our 1st apartment, then a townhome and now a house as well as help us sell our townhouse. He is patient, never pushy and has always had our best interests at heart. He has made what seemed impossible with our recent purchase of a house and sale of a townhome possible as well as help us win 2 bidding wars. Im proud to have him as my realtor and constantly refer many friends and family to him as well and he carries his professionalism to my referrals and has helped many of them navigate this crazy real estate game. Im not sure other realtors would have gotten the same results, but im just glad we have John. I highly recommend John and i will personally use him for life!

reviews.name: Allen Chand
reviews.text: John made the whole process nice and simple. Very professional, respectful, straight forward. There was a lot of moving parts and people in this deal and he took it on himself to deal with them all so I had no headaches.

reviews.name: John Beaty
reviews.text: We were happy to have worked with John Ly during the sale of our house. He was easy to work with, available when needed and quick to respond, knowledgeable, and generally made the sale process an easy and enjoyable one. We recommend him to anyone looking for a good realtor.

reviews.name: kelvin Ang
reviews.text: For a first time buyer, looking to a home is so overwhelming and stressful. John made it simple and manageable. He is patient, helpful, objective, and customer centric. John helped us with the background work, due diligence, and analysis. So glad we have him in our journey.

reviews.name: Stephanie Soebagio
reviews.text: My husband and I have been clients of John for the past 10 years and would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking for a realtor. John supported us with the purchase of our first home in Vancouver, when we sold there and purchased our current home, and finally with the recent sale of our condo as we leave the city. Through all of this, he has been honest, reliable, professional, responsive, and kind. I have referred him to friends and colleagues who have also been impressed with him. Should we ever move back to Vancouver, there is no doubt we will be coming to him.

reviews.name: Chelsea S
reviews.text: John was extremely helpful and a great resource in purchasing my first apartment! He knew all the right questions to ask and was super responsive in all communication. Would highly recommend!

reviews.name: Denise Quon
reviews.text: We are very happy with John Ly's real estate services. He helped us with the purchase of our last home a few years ago.  This time around he handled the sale of our condo and the purchase of another property. We appreciated his professional advice and guidance throughout the sale and purchase process. His approach is always very focused and non assuming, he knows how to listen. We have not hesitated to refer him to friends and recommend him for any real estate needs.

reviews.name: Jabir Nathu
reviews.text: John has helped my wife and I purchase our home.  From our very first meeting, we knew John was the realtor for us.  He took time to got to know us and what we were looking for.  He was our advocate in the entire buying process.  His sage advice helped us time the market, avoid properties we may have gone for, and make smart bids for the ones we liked.  The outcome of our time working with John was that we found the perfect home for our family and the transaction went through seamlessly.  I would not hesitate to call John again when we are looking to move and would highly recommend him to any of our friends and family.  He is a diamond in the rough and we are thrilled to have been able to connect with him.

reviews.name: Barbara L
reviews.text:
John’s help has been invaluable in the course of viewing and purchasing our new condo. He took care of details large and small, and made the whole process easy for us. Thank you, John.

-Douglas and Barbara Lambert

reviews.name: Larry Nguyen
reviews.text: John! You have been amazing with your communication and you’re always on the ball with updates with my condo.  I really appreciate that! Highly recommended! As professional as it gets!!!

reviews.name: Paul McCurry
reviews.text: John recently sold our house and he was great!  His advice was very valuable, which resulted in a quick process and a sale over asking price.  He also helped us with our subsequent purchase.  I will be using John the next time and would recommend him to anyone.

reviews.name: Carrie Andreola
reviews.text: I met John by chance wherein he impressed me with his unbiased opinion of the pros and cons of various properties.  I liked that he spoke the truth, which can be hard to find in real estate.  John has a gentle yet confident nature which puts you at ease.  For 10 months, John stuck with me through the ups and downs of house hunting.  Some days I was overly confident, and other days downright annoyed with the ever changing market.  John never wavered.  He patiently reassured me, “the right one will come along” and it did!  John did the research, read the documents, checked every last detail, and put our best offer forward.  Thank you John for your expertise and wisdom but especially for your wonderful kind honest and reassuring personality, you made it so easy.

reviews.name: Sonya B
reviews.text: We had John as our buying agent and was successful in our purchase within less than a month! John's communication helped with the process as it was transparent, honest, and proactive. It was also a smooth journey for us since John understands the local housing market extremely well and was able to support us throughout, offering valuable insight, feedback, and other alternatives. We also benefited from the many connections and contacts within the market John serves. We would work with John again in the future!

reviews.name: Mel Chan
reviews.text: John helped my family of five find the perfect home for our budget! He actually saved us from making a mistake in our initial house hunt. We were taking the wrong approach to buying a home; looking at 100 year old houses in a location close to school rather than looking at newly built houses just a little farther away. John is smart and attentive to our needs. I’m so glad we went with his thoughtful direction because now, we live in a gorgeous brand new house with mortgage helper units which will make us money in the long run. Second part to this is of course we asked John to help sell our old home. Again, he was tactful and knowledgeable in helping us decide on an accurate price point and the best staging team to achieve the maximum price for the sale. We sold our house in less than two weeks of it being on the market. That has got to be record speed in today’s market. If you need to buy or sell, John is your guy!!

reviews.text: it was a good experience having John Ly as my personal real estate service in the past year for which we successfully completed the sale of the property in May 2020. reviews.name: Mike Ball
reviews.text: Working with Adam Chahl as a first time home buyer was a fantastic experience. Entering and navigating the market seemed daunting until I began speaking with Adam. His advice and recommendations were invaluable and his communication throughout the process was exceptional. Adam went above and beyond to help secure the deal. I was referred to Adam by a friend and I'm thrilled they passed along his information. I will be doing the same with my friends and family! Thanks again, Adam!

reviews.name: Nima Sarhangpour
reviews.text: Adam is an exceptional real estate professional. He has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the Vancouver market, which contributes greatly to the buying process. He offers great advise and insight, and is very quick, efficient, and leverages technology appropriately to make the buying process smooth. Having worked with Adam for some time now, I continue to go back to him and recommend all family and friends to him all the time. If you are new, he will also do a great job in educating you and bringing you up to speed to make you feel very comfortable. Looking to buy or sell? Get in touch with Adam!

reviews.name: Jeff H
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of working with Adam during COVID-19. He was always on time, and always made us feel like his only clients (we weren't). He's great to have around to offer different perspectives, and his charm is certainly helpful for negotiations. Even more crucially, he's able to react to dynamic market conditions and recommend different approaches when buying/selling. From buying our new home to selling our existing one, he had us set in 2 weeks with all the closing and completion dates lined up perfectly, and didn't break a sweat. Thanks Adam!

reviews.text: Adam has helped us purchase our first home 7 years ago and now he has helped us sell our first home and purchase our detached forever home!! He has great marketing strategies, does his researches and represents the clients to ensure their best interest. We recommend him to all our friends and family!!  Thank you Adam!!😁

Adam and his team were very professional and excellent to work with. He always found time to chat with us regarding any concerns or questions we had. It was also refreshing to work with someone who’s detailed-orientated and is able to point out things that we may have overlooked.

We would definitely recommend Adam to anyone who’s on a hunt for a place!

reviews.name: Bryan Fisher
reviews.text: The team at Place Real Estate went above and beyond in helping me navigate the stressful time of buying my first property. Adam was able to point things out that I hadn’t thought of, and didn’t let me get caught up with emotions of which property I wanted. They took the time to understand what I was after and made great recommendations along the way. His contacts were also of great value to me in securing competitive financing. Will definitely recommend using the Place Real Estate team to my friends and colleagues!

reviews.name: Riley Rebitt
reviews.text: Finding real estate agents with integrity, strong negotiation skills, and professionalism can be very hard to come by. Adam and his team possess all of these qualities. I don't look anywhere else when referring clients, family, or friends to Vancouver when in need of an agent. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Don Fisher
reviews.text:
Adam put in the work to earn his commissions on many fronts resulting a quick and tidy sale.

I have no hesitation what so ever to recommend his services

reviews.name: Daryl Fowler
reviews.text: Adam is an incredibly knowledgeable and professional agent and goes above and beyond for his clients. Moving forward there is only one place I'll be going for my real estate needs, Adam Chahl and the Place Real Estate Team. Thank you Adam!

reviews.name: Colin Jones
reviews.text: I had a great experience working with Adam.  Adam is thorough, well-organized, and made the purchasing process easy and enjoyable.  Adam is a trustworthy professional that will give honest consultation and feedback.  I will be recommending him to my family and friends.

reviews.name: Meg Boulerice
reviews.text: Adam recently helped me sell an investment property that I purchased 3 years ago. I contacted him looking for market advice and he pulled together the info and helped me decide to sell! He made this completely painless for me - taking care of everything start to finish and responding to my inquiries very quickly! Friendly and professional - can’t wait to find my next home with the help of Adam and the PLACE Real Estate Team!

reviews.name: Jaclyn Fisher
reviews.text: Adam Chahl was the agent who helped with the purchase of my first home. Adam made this experience an easy one, providing me with the information needed to feel confident in making such a large purchase. He is knowledgeable about the industry and trends, and I wouldn’t hesitate to use him again in the future.

reviews.name: Nick Chahl
reviews.text: Great customer service. Always answers his phone unlike most of the agents I have dealt with and always professional. A real joy to work with.

reviews.name: Jim Chong
reviews.text: Adam and his team were patient and helpful throughout my process in purchasing a condo. He worked with me diligently on ensuring that the place I finally invested it was definitely the right place for me. I can't recommend him enough.

reviews.name: Andrew Blake
reviews.text: Sensational, friendly and knowledgeable team! These guys really know their stuff and support you through the entire process. Really enjoy the market updates too!

reviews.name: Rene Ahmad
reviews.text: True Professional... Market Expertise, Experienced Negotiator, First-Class Service. I can say that we had a great Experience : )

reviews.name: Karen Van wyk
reviews.text: Adam is an amazing realtor and true professional, as well as a great person who is wonderful to work with. I’ve bought 2 properties and sold one with him over the past 5 years, and it’s been a great experience. He gave me solid advice and assistance in setting up investment and cash flow properties in Vancouver.  He works hard, and is reliable, diligent, informative and extremely helpful. He goes the extra mile, and I would highly recommend him (and have done) to anyone!

reviews.name: Ryan Clark
reviews.text: Adam helped us find exactly what we were looking for. He was patient, thoughtful and thorough in ensuring we understood the current market in the specific area we were looking at!

reviews.name: aimal pamir
reviews.text: One of the most professional and hard working realtors in the business, as well as one of the most knowledgeable ones I have ever met.

reviews.name: Ishankuliev Ishankuliev
reviews.text:
With Adam’s help and advise I purchased an investment property 8 years ago!
Since then Adam kept in contact with market updates, advises and helped me to sell the same property this April.
Adam worked hard to get best value for my investment and the transactions were completed smoothly without my presence in Vancouver.
In the result of his marketing strategy the property was sold for over listed price in less than a week!

If you are looking for the best value for your property, then I strongly recommend to hire Adam with his exceptional services in marketing strategy and communication skills!

reviews.name: Kevin Carroll
reviews.text: Buying my new home with my partner was made so smooth and seemless thanks to Adam. His honesty and Integrity made what can be a stressful and difficult time, easy. Thank you Adam.

reviews.name: Matt Anderson
reviews.text: Adam is a great agent to work with. Friendly and professional, Adam knows what it takes to get the job done.

reviews.name: Kyle Schembri
reviews.text: This was our second sale with Adam. Adam is consistently responsive, reliable and a joy to work with. He was patient with us and very supportive as we navigated the market. We will definitely be recommending Place Real Estate Team to friends and family.

reviews.name: Pete Design
reviews.text: Adam successfully sold a small condo I owned had in the west end. It certainly wasn't the best or biggest commission that Adam has had however he treated it as though it was. Adam had a big picture for the sales journey however he was also detail focused.

reviews.name: Chris Smith
reviews.text: Great understanding of the Vancouver downtown and other markets, whether you're looking to live or to invest.  Exceptionally honest and great to deal with, Adam has become a friend through our various transactions over the last several years.

reviews.name: Paul Kandola
reviews.text: Done 3 transactions with Adam, one sell and 2 buys. Real estate portfolio rate of return have exceeded expectations. Thanks Adam!

title: Leo Wilk Real Estate
address: 1152 Mainland St #130, Vancouver, BC V6B 4X2, Canada

reviews.name: Sam Omidi
