reviews.text: Leo was just awesome!  Him and his team were proactive, diligent, and always making strategy changes to make sure we sold our condo. Have already referred him to my brother-in-law, so yes, definitely a recommendation!

reviews.name: Rick West
reviews.text: Over the last 8 months, Leo expertly assisted & guided me with the sale of 2 condos & the purchase of a new one.  We had great results & he also managed to meet all of my very firm deadlines.  I was consistently impressed by his knowledge, work ethic, commitment to excellence & integrity (& he is a really good guy!).  I would enthusiastically recommend him to anyone looking for an honest, experienced & skilled realtor.

reviews.name: Heather Wardle
reviews.text: Leo is fantastic! After researching quite a few real estate agents and interviewing three, we chose Leo and we are very happy that we did. He brings a lot of skilled people as part of his team and his marketing materials were first rate, including the photography, videography, website, and staging. He handled a very tough selling time (the start of the coronavirus lockdown) with care and skill. He was always in our corner and took time to explain things clearly. We highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Dave Rose
reviews.text:
I'm very happy I chose Leo to handle both the buying and selling of my home.  He's professional, competent, attentive and easy to talk to.  He patiently answers all of my questions, is knowledgeable and always responds quickly. I am certain that his positive attitude and demeanour assisted in building the relationship with the other parties, to my benefit.

In getting my home ready for sale, he had the contacts I needed for staging, photographs and even a video walk-through.  When viewing the photos and video, my place looked so great that I almost didn't want to sell anymore.  An accepted offer was received within the first week it was listed, for a price I was very happy with.

I will definitely be going with Leo again for my next buy or sell.

reviews.name: Gloria Loi
reviews.text:
Buying a house is a huge learning experience and can be a scary thing.

With the pressure of putting down offers, communication and response rate is key. Leo was superb! He answers within the day and always follow up thoroughly - with the city or the sellers or whoever he needs to contact if he doesn't know the answer.

Amazing realtor. 100% supportive and 0% pressure for us to buy unless we felt it was right. Leo also goes above and beyond what we ask him to help us with. Can't thank him enough! We recommended him to all our friends and family.

reviews.name: Shane R.
reviews.text: We were put in touch with Leo through a friend of ours who had dealt with him on his last few purchase/sales. Very happy to have made this connection, as Leo made our first-time condo buy as smooth and streamlined as possible. We didn't have any preconceived notions about what to expect from a Realtor, but whatever expectations we did have, Leo exceeded them. We'll certainly reach out to him for help in the future, and will recommend him to anyone looking for help with their Real Estate needs. Thanks Leo!

reviews.name: Heather Campbell
reviews.text: Leo was amazing to work with from start to finish! I did my research when looking for a realtor, and I absolutely made the right choice.  Leo helped me understand the market we were in, explained how my condo would be marketed to get the best exposure possible – and wow, did he and his team deliver!  I learned so much along the way too, which made the experience invaluable. My condo sold within two weeks at a price/square foot above what other condos in the area were selling at. It was such a pleasure working with Leo – he is knowledgeable, responsive, professional, down to earth, and made the experience of selling my home better than I could have ever imagined!  Thank you Leo!

reviews.name: Nicole LeClair
reviews.text: Leo is proactive, knowledgeable and goes the extra mile for his clients. He typically works in Vancouver based real estate but took my Fraser Valley home on as a selling agent. He quickly and gracefully adapted to all issues that arose from the inability to place a lock box on the property to dealing with both a broken door lock and a less than helpful strata team.  I would recommend Leo to both buy and sell your home. He's very well loved in the industry and knows how to play the game. He gets the job done and makes everything feel quite effortless on the seller's side :) Bravo!

reviews.name: Nilou Ghaffari
reviews.text: Leo is professional and passionate about real estate. Our family has been working with him for the past few years in buying and selling. He is extremely trustworthy and after working with him sell our first home, we didn't want to go to anybody else. He's always punctual, accommodating and honest! It's really great when you have someone you trust working with you on such big decisions. Highly recommend him and happy to say we are on our third project in confidence with him.

reviews.name: Teri Matthewson
reviews.text: Leo and his team make the selling experience enjoyable. The dedication and  attention, was expectational. Leo, himself is one of the most professional agents in Vancouver. His team, from his photographer, videographer, content writer and support team is what make his entire offering the best choice to sell your home. This I know first hand, he sold our condo in the west end in June 2019. Thank you, Leo! Call him to sell your property.

reviews.name: Sam McFarlane
reviews.text:
I stumbled across Leo when looking for a realtor to help sell my apartment in Mount Pleasant.  After meeting with him it was clear he had a very strong knowledge of the market and I appreciated his balance of  being both realistic and optimistic when discussing potential list prices.

I decided to go with him and have/had zero regrets of that decision.  Offers came in much faster than expected and I ended up getting a price that I am very happy with.  I could tell that Leo was on my side and always available throughout the entire process which is the most important thing for me when working with a realtor.

I would definitely recommend Leo to anyone considering taking a chance on him like I did.

reviews.name: Andy Yoo
reviews.text:
Leo helped my wife and I purchase our first home and we could not have asked for anyone better. Leo exceeded all of our expectations in terms of communication, honesty, availability, knowledge of the market, and negotiating a great price for our home.

When searching for a new realtor, I’ve arranged to meet with top-reviewed realtors in Vancouver (as a Buyer, why not go for the best!). After meeting Leo, I’ve cancelled all other appointments, and have zero regrets. Leo played a huge part in helping us purchase a home that we loved. Throughout the process, we never felt any pressure to buy and always felt he had our best interest at heart. He really did his best to negotiate the lowest price possible for our home. Understanding that we are first time buyers, Leo was also great at guiding us through the whole process. As a bonus, Leo also introduced us to a great mortgage broker who helped us secure an unbeatable rate.

When it comes time to sell our home one day, we will without a doubt hire Leo again. I would be more than happy to recommend Leo every time when someone is looking for an agent.

reviews.name: gillian morgan
reviews.text: Leo is a realtor who loves what he does and throws everything at it,   His enjoyment of said job reflects how he approaches selling your property.  He is knowledgeable, flexible and very easy to work with.  His easy going nature worked wonders for me in selling my place and easing the stress of selling.  I will recommend him to all that asks.

reviews.name: 360Pros
reviews.text: If you look up Leo Wilk in Webster's English Dictionary, you'll find a very simple and concise definition: "Rock Star." I mean if over 100, 5-star reviews here doesn't already tell you that, you'll understand after you spend just a few minutes working with Leo. His experience and expertise in the Vancouver Real Estate market is second to none, and you can trust him to be sharp when it comes to buying or selling your existing or future home.

reviews.name: Jared Haines
reviews.text: Leo helped me buy my first home, and he did an absolutely amazing job. He was tremendously helpful as he guided me through every step of the process. He truly went above and beyond.

reviews.name: Braeden Ralla
reviews.text: Leo is very passionate about real estate. If you follow his blog, you'll see this, as he is constantly sharing his real estate expertise. He is extremely dedicated to getting the very best for his clients. It's no surprise that he is always in the top 1%.

reviews.name: Justin Partridge
reviews.text: My partner and I cannot speak more highly about working with Leo. This was our first home and it was comforting to know that Leo was on our side. Whether you are purchasing your first home like us or have a few under your belt already, I'm confident you are in good hands.

reviews.name: Ryan Hartt
reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of working with a number of Leo's clients that he has graciously referred to me to help them find a home in Coquiltam or Port Moody or Maple Ridge after he has sold their place in Vancouver. They are always so excited because they just had a wonderful experience with Leo through the selling process and that makes my life easier. His level of knowledge and professionalism is the best in the industry. It is his personality and level of care that keeps people coming back to him time and time again. He really is the best!

reviews.name: Lennie Lu
reviews.text:
Leo helped me sell my assignment in Burnaby after I moved out of town. Assignments are not usually easy to sell, but he has done an outstanding job while I'm in Toronto with 3 hours time difference! He is a great communicator and always response promptly.
Working with Leo was a great experience, and I will not hesitate to recommend Leo to anyone who needs an experienced and trustworthy realtor!

reviews.name: Lauren Webb
reviews.text:
Leo is the best. Leo has helped us buy and sell 3 times now. I hired Leo to help buy my first home, he was super patient, kind and helpful. He is in the real estate game for all the right reasons. I never felt pressured to make a quick decision and he helped me navigate and understand the intense Vancouver market to find the right fit for me. After 4 years in that space, I hired Leo to sell my first condo, I couldn't be more impressed with his marketing, photography, and overall reach to get the best offers he could get for me. The unit sold in less than a week with 6 offers!

After we sold, we bought a townhouse, again Leo helped us out and was super patient. Because of the competitive market, we put in nearly 10 offers over 6 months, Leo never gave up, and made sure that we kept our emotions calm in order to make the right decision! I would recommend Leo to anyone that is looking for a quality Realtor.

reviews.name: Darcie Cuthbert
reviews.text: We’ve used Leo in the purchase and sale of 3 homes (both condos and detached) and we couldn’t be happier with his work. This last one definitely had its challenges, but Leo managed the entire process with speed and professionalism. His communication style makes things so easy. I have and will continue to recommend him to friends and family, as it’s been a pleasure working with him.

reviews.name: Richard L
reviews.text: Leo helped us to buy our first home and he is great to work with. He is always quick to respond, excellent at communicating what the process is and what the market is currently in. He is always professional and never stops working for you. I would not hesitate to recommend Leo to anyone. Thanks from Rich and Gen!

reviews.name: Christina Florencio
reviews.text: I have the pleasure of working with Leo at MLA Realty. Leo is patient, kind hearted, generous and always puts his client's best interest first. He's a seasoned realtor with years of experience in different markets and he's clearly passionate about what he does. Leo is always in tune with the market, leading with great real estate insights and information for buyers and sellers alike. I highly recommend Leo to anyone interested buying or selling anywhere in the Lower Mainland.

reviews.name: Melissa Howey
reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about working with Leo.  We recently sold our condo with him.  He took care of us every step of the way.  Answered all of our questions and made sure we were at ease.  With his hard work we ended up with multiple offers and sold for more than our asking price!  We will absolutely work with Leo again and highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Simon Beyer
reviews.text: Leo is truly an exceptional Real Estate Agent. He patiently and expertly helped us navigate the process,  spending time reviewing and walking us through a myriad of documentation, and pointing out and explaining important details. He is extremely responsive, is not pushy whatsoever, and we felt was always genuinely acting in our best interests. An added bonus is that the people in his network are similarly exceptional. He brought in another Agent with more experience in a particular area we were looking, connected us to a mortgage broker and a house inspector, and all of those people were absolutely top notch. We cannot recommend Leo strongly enough.

reviews.name: Daphne Cuthbert
reviews.text:
We used Leo to sell our condo and help us purchase a house in the crazy Vancouver market. The condo sale was extremely quick and efficient. He had an amazing set of photos and floor plans done up that made us want to stay! We had 3 offers before the first open house and were able to sign all the paperwork while we were travelling on the other side of the world!
Finding a house was quite the task, and Leo really helped us navigate through it. We went through what seemed like a million houses, with Leo offering great advice and suggestions along the way. We found our perfect house!

reviews.name: Hamid S
reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Leo on many projects over the last few years and it’s always a joy. His knowledge of the market is unparalleled and his passion and dedication shows on every occasion. Personally, knowing that the property will be ready and the client knows what to expect makes everything much easier for me. I am proud to say Leo has become one of my favourite clients.

reviews.name: Jayoung Lee
reviews.text: My husband and I both loved Leo. He is genuinely nice person and so pleasant to work with. He is professional, efficient, responsive and we had the best experience with the sale of our first home. We highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Derek Deacon
reviews.text: My wife and I cannot say enough about Leo's greatness.  We first contacted Leo a few years ago to help with our condo search.  He was extremely professional and responsive, and helped us find the most amazing condo.  We've kept in touch with Leo and when it came time to search for our first house, we couldn't think of anyone in the world we'd rather have assist us than Leo.  Sure enough, Leo brought the same extremely high standards to our house search, and in the end, helped us navigate a difficult market to find our dream house for less than our maximum budget.  We never hesitate to recommend Leo to our friends and family.  He's a true gem and an absolute pleasure to work with.

reviews.name: Kharlton Redekopp
reviews.text: Leo is an excellent realtor and an even better person! He made the sale of our old home seem almost effortless, and found us the perfect new home and got our offer accepted with little fuss or drama. My wife and I found him to be friendly, outgoing and extremely knowledgeable about the real estate market in the Lower Mainland. More importantly he is an honest and genuine person; he really cares about your needs when it comes to selling your home and makes every effort to make the process as painless as possible. His sales methods go beyond the traditional "put the sign up and have a million open houses".....he utilizes social media both locally and globally and presents your home through both traditional pictures and a sleek "virtual tour". The next time we need a realtor, Leo will be our guy! Anyone I know who is searching for a realtor, I will highly recommend Leo. Trust me, you will not be disappointed.

reviews.name: Vimmy Dhaliwal
reviews.text: I was referred to Leo by my cousin who had recently used Leo as a realtor and said that he’s great with first-time home owners.  As a first-time home owner, I had a lot of questions and concerns.  Leo was very knowledgeable and I loved his honesty during the entire process of finding the perfect condo. He knew what I wanted and didn’t waste my time by showing me places that didn’t fit my criteria.  He actually made the condo buying process fun!  He would keep me up to date and was always available to answer any questions I had.  Once I found my new home, Leo went above and beyond to make sure the purchase completed in a timely manner.  Time was a huge concern for me, as I needed completion of sale by a particular date.  He went out of his way to get any necessary documents from strata to my lenders, lawyers etc.  I would highly recommend Leo and I will defiantly use him in the future :)

reviews.name: Ruth Legg
reviews.text: Leo is trustworthy, smart and the real estate expert you want on your team. From listing sales strategy, to detailed contact negotiations, he excels across the board. We have both sold and bought property with Leo and he has been with us each step of the way, providing top notch advice and support. The proof is in the result too: we love our new home!

reviews.name: Sunny Hahm
reviews.text: There aren't too many other realtors like Leo Wilk out there. Intelligent, personable, and incredibly strong work ethic. He's always known to show up and provide 100% of his dedication and focus for his clients. Would highly recommend Leo for any of your real estate needs.

reviews.name: Lisa MacIntosh
reviews.text: I was recommended to Leo through the Interior Design industry. He is well known for his outgoing personality and eagerness to sell real-estate. Leo went out of his way to make sure I was aware of each step of selling. As a first time seller there was a learning and lingo curve, which Leo clearly interpreted. He was always available if I had questions and was a pleasure to work with. I would highly recommend Leo to any one looking to sell or purchase their home.

reviews.name: Michael Morgan
reviews.text: Incredibly professional, personable service that was second to none. I had listed my condo and was forced to take it off the market due to the numerous problems I experienced with the listing agent I had chosen. This experience left me feeling frustrated and more than a little distrustful of real estate agents. After having Leo referred to me and listing with him I saw the amazing difference that a top professional could make. From listing to closing and even after the deal had closed Leo ensured the my best interests were looked after. He looked after every tiny detail on the way to getting me well over my initial asking price. Simply put, I couldn't be happier with the process, I will be working with Leo in the future and I would recommend him to anyone in need of a realtor.

reviews.name: Dale Turetski
reviews.text: I cannot speak highly enough of Leo.  My wife and relocated from London, UK and he did everything he could to make the overseas transition as stress free as possible.  It seemed like he was available for us 24 hours a day and was incredibly responsive to our needs regarding what we were looking for.  I never felt for once that he was trying to steer us in a particular direction.  In this business your reputation is everything and I can say without a doubt he has my complete trust and would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone.  Thanks for everything Leo.

reviews.name: Michelle Jimenez
reviews.text: Leo was absolutely amazing in helping us purchase our first home.  He was on top of everything, extremely quick to answer questions, was available anytime we needed him, and actually made the home-buying process extremely enjoyable. Being a first time home buyer- I had hundreds of questions and needed constant updates along the way (I was pretty much a nervous wreck). However, with Leo's knowledge, professionalism and honesty I had all the confidence I needed.  I would highly recommend Leo to anyone looking to purchase a new home.

reviews.name: Arshia M
reviews.text: We interviewed a couple of realtors, and Leo's friendly, professional, and unbiased approach made him our favourite agent amongst so many others. He listed our townhouse, and did an impeccable job on the marketing, not to mention he sold it with multiple offers, in only 8 days and over asking price. Diligence, integrity, and efficiency were always present in every step of the way. In such a difficult market, he helped us to find our new home in our desired neighbourhood in no time. Leo proved to be a professional and a very caring agent whose unique, personal touches made the whole process of selling and buying a lot less stressful.

reviews.name: Ashley Mindorff
reviews.text: Working with Leo was such a pleasure!  He is enthusiastic, professional and loves what he does.  We were first time sellers and Leo made us feel totally confident and comfortable with the process.  I have nothing but positive things to say about working with Leo, I can't even think of something neutral to say!  He exceeded our expectations... so did the multiple offers we received ;)

reviews.name: Chelsea Carey
reviews.text: Leo is passionate and dedicated to his clients. His knowledge of the Vancouver market and his comprehensive marketing strategy put him above and beyond other realtors I have worked with in the past. I would highly recommend him to any one looking to list their home or buy a new home or investment!

reviews.name: Jay Gulbransen
reviews.text: Leo Wilk did an amazing job selling my home. Very honest and hard working individual. I would use him and his team again to sell my home. 👍🏼👍🏼

reviews.name: Braden Bahen
reviews.text:
Without Leo, buying my first condo would have been a frustrating nightmare. Instead, it was a challenging but rewarding process and I've happily found a place starting in the summer!

Leo possesses a wealth of knowledge and a solid process to help out first time home buyers. I came in absolutely green and Leo quickly worked to educate me so I could feel aware and in control of the search for my condo.

I was referred to Leo by a family friend and found him to be incredibly professional and invested in ensuring that I found the place I was looking for. Throughout several months of searching and many bidding wars, Leo went over and beyond the call of duty regularly. I cannot recommend Leo enough!

reviews.name: Reshaad Ali
reviews.text: What can I say other than Leo is great at what he does?!?  He has so many qualities you hope for in a realtor, including a high degree of professionalism, a calm and personable demeanour, and is well-informed on the market and industry.   He made the process much easier for his client (me!), and I was grateful to have him on my side.  Plus, he's a really good guy.

reviews.name: ryan molesworth
reviews.text: Leo is a knowledgeable and personable realtor.  He came highly recommended from a friend for good reason and exceeded all expectations. He made the process of selling my condo easy and transparent. On top of all that getting me top dollar. I certainly wouldn't hesitate to work with Leo again in the future.

reviews.name: Louise Richardson
reviews.text: Working with Leo was an absolute pleasure! His guidance and insight resulted in a very successful sale and a purchase process that kept us safely away from costly buildings and into a well valued neighbourhood.  Leo has extraordinary  communication skills, has a high attention to detail and has an amazing client focused approach. He is a skilled marketer and a well informed source who ensured our home appealed to the greatest potential market.

reviews.name: Cory Walker
reviews.text: Leo helped us sell our Olympic Village Condo and we can recommend him without reservation.  He kept us informed and educated throughout the entire process.  He always took the time to answer all of our questions and address our concerns.  We never felt rushed or that we were anything less than his top priority.  He was able to drive a lot of attention and traffic to the open houses.  Once the day arrived, Leo managed multiple offers and we ultimately sold for well over our initial price.  Couldn't have been happier with our experience with Leo.  We'll work with him again without hesitation.

reviews.name: Sonny Gill
reviews.text:
We've had the pleasure of working with Leo on a few separate occasions. Leo was our realtor for the purchase and sale of our condo and also was our realtor when we purchased our home.

I enjoy working with Leo as he is a great communicator that understands how to communicate complicated (and often changing) information to folks that aren't necessarily involved in real estate on a day-to-day basis. I found whether it was condos or houses - Leo really knew his stuff. Additionally, I really appreciated the fact that he was patient with us as we took our (sweet) time to make decisions. The next time we need a realtor we'll be reaching out to Leo for sure.

Thanks Leo!

Sonny Gill

reviews.name: Adam Plumley
reviews.text: Leo Wilk is a fantastic realtor. He recently helped us get the best price selling a condo and find the perfect home. His knowledge and experience were so valuable to us. Leo is a pleasure to work with and we would highly recommend him to anyone in the Metro Vancouver real estate market!

reviews.name: Tomoko Kawabe
reviews.text: We are very grateful that Leo was our realtor. He is professional, easy to get along with, honest and self-less. Throughout our journey of purchasing a condo, we have never felt pressured. On the contrary, he was always patient and making sure that we find the right place. His knowledge of the market and industry helped us eliminate our anxiety as a first time home buyer. We cannot thank him enough for all the hard work he did for us. We definitely would work with him again in the future and have no hesitation recommending him to anybody.

reviews.name: David Tucker
reviews.text: Leo is a first-rate realtor who has assembled a top-notch team of stagers, photographers, videographers and support trades like painters and handymen. This team face-lifted and staged our home and produced promotional material that was among the best anywhere. His market analysis seemed very in-depth and pertinent, and his pricing of our very unique home was well reasoned and defensible. He garnered a lot of interest and guided much traffic through our home in open houses and private viewings, despite the 2018 market slowdown. During negotiations Leo showed himself to be tactically astute and very pragmatic and flexible when it came to removing roadblocks. We're very happy with the service and the result. Look no further.

reviews.name: Amber Ridington
reviews.text: Leo is the whole bundle - a realtor who loves his work and always makes you feel like his top priority.  On top of that he is genuinely a nice guy with a sense of humour!  He provided artwork and props eliminating the need for a stager and he was more than happy to keep holding open houses and showings when we wanted to wait for better offers. He always had a considered answer for all our questions, big and small. Really, the whole bundle!

reviews.name: gurj dhaliwal
reviews.text:
My wife and I purchased our condo with the help of Leo's great expertise.  We found Leo to be very knowledgeable of the marketplace, professional and dedicated.  As first time home buyers that were looking for almost 12 months, Leo always remained patient and positive throughout the process.  Leo is the best in the biz!

We have recommended Leo to our family & friends, and will continue to do so.

reviews.name: Brittany Watson
reviews.text: I would highly recommend Leo to anyone looking to buy or sell. He is professional, personable and he really cares about his clients which creates a very positive experience working with him. He is someone you can trust!

reviews.name: brenda tansley
reviews.text: Leo was very professional throughout the selling process.  He found us professionals to deal with, we were extremely pleased with the stager and photographer Leo recommended and organized. It was a tough market but Leo still managed to bring a large volume of customers through our condo. He was very responsive and patient when we had questions. He is very social media savvy.

reviews.name: Sandie Parker
reviews.text:
Leo was a great realtor to work with. He sold my Vancouver condo for me very quickly and all while I am living in Australia. Even with very difficult time zone challenges along with dealing with a tenant that did not want to leave, Leo made it feel painless. I would work with Leo again in a second and highly recommend him!

Thanks Leo!

reviews.name: J S
reviews.text: Working with Leo was a breeze. We viewed a multitude of properties within my criteria in a two week period and had paperwork filed for purchase within three weeks of our initial meeting. Leo is extremely knowledgeable and has a strong grasp on the ins-and-outs of the Vancouver condo market. He guided my purchase as a first time home buyer and was able to find a property that met my extensive list of "must haves". I would recommend him highly and will definitely work with Leo on future real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Dr. Crysta Serné
reviews.text: Leo is thorough and has an attention to detail unlike any other.  He will scour the listings and won't give up until he finds you your perfect home.  He is caring, authentic, and a true class act.  I highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Brynn Harris
reviews.text: I contacted Leo on a Friday afternoon and said "We are looking for a realtor and we need to get our place on the market by next Tuesday"... and without hesitation he said 'let's do it!' He educated us on what we needed to do to get our place ready, hired a photographer, hired a videographer, hired a stager, got our place on the market, held multiple showings... and our place was sold within a week. Leo was incredible to work with. He is an extremely hard worker and very hands on when it came to every detail of our property and sale. We felt he had our best interests at heart the whole way through. Plus, he is just a really great guy! I have already started to recommend him to all of my friends and family.

reviews.name: Chris McCann
reviews.text:
My wife and I recently had the opportunity to work with Leo to sell our condo downtown.  We found Leo to be professional, knowledgeable, and extremely dedicated to his job.  It is easy to find a realtor in this market, but difficult to find a good one and Leo is one of the best in the business.

I have already recommended Leo to others, and I will continue to do so without hesitation.

reviews.name: Lindsay Simmons
reviews.text: Working with Leo was a great experience - he helped us acquire our dream home in North Van in what felt like an impossible market. As first time home buyers, the learning curve is steep. Leo was available to us at literally any hour of the day, and somehow made the process of home buying a treat. He is honest and upfront, gives 110%, and is the type of guy you invite to your housewarming.

reviews.name: Nick Hurley
reviews.text:
Just completed my second big Vancouver real-estate deal with Leo. He helped me find the perfect condo in Gastown 3 years ago, and then helped me sell it when it was time to move on.

Leo combines a great depth of knowledge of the Vancouver market with a personable and responsive style. He's a pleasure to work with and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him.

reviews.name: Patrick Lanigan
reviews.text: Leo is a true professional in every sense of the word. His commitment to his clients is unmatched! 10 / 10 would recommend.

reviews.name: Henrietta Tan
reviews.text: Leo listed a property which I bought. He's helpful, thorough, professional. I'd rate him as one of the very best people I've ever worked with. I'm someone in the business so this is a very good recommendation. Thank you Leo!

reviews.name: Nic Jensen
reviews.text: Leo recently helped my wife and I purchase our first single family home just off of Main St.  We had been watching the single family market for the previous 12 months and continually watched homes sell for well over asking.  Leo came to us with us a house in our ideal neighborhood that was near the top of our price point.  He had seen a recent price reduction and thought this could be the perfect home for us.  Leo suggested that this home coule work well because it had been on the market for over 30 days and the sellers may be flexible on price due to the recent price drop. After much back and forth we purchased the home at almost $200,000 under the original asking price.  Leo's market awareness and negotiating skills certainly helped us with this home.  He was very patient over the past 12 months so I am sure he was almost as happy as we were to finally find the right house!  We would recommend Leo to anyone looking for their next home or condo!

reviews.name: Riaz Meghji
reviews.text: Always accessible and abundantly helpful, Leo Wilk stands out for his unwavering work ethic to help get the deal done. Having solicited his real estate services over the years, a consistent and professional effort has always been received. Trust is something he has earned, which has helped make buying and selling property a positive process.

reviews.name: Tyler Jensen
reviews.text: Let me be the first to say my wife and I didn't make the sale of our condo easy for Leo. After selling our first property with Leo in 24hrs in October our second property was a different story. Between us flip flopping and taking it off only to ask to have it put back on Leo did a unbelievable job securing a second offer when the initial buyer failed to close in the 11th hour. Having already put a offer on our dream home we would have had to walk away if not for Leo's expertise in the market!

reviews.name: Niki Cuthbert
reviews.text: Years ago I worked with Condo Leo through mutual clients and I haven't looked back. His work ethic, morals and thoroughness have lead me to refer clients, friends, family and even myself. Although he is "Condo Leo", he has helped numerous clients of ours buy single family homes in Vancouver and North Vancouver. With an "outside of the box" mentality, Leo has been able to come up with marketing techniques that have exceeded my clients expectations. I look forward to working with him for the years to come.

reviews.name: Jenna Baum
reviews.text: Leo was highly recommended, he lived up to every expectation! Professional, personable and prompt in handling any concern throughout the home buying experience. Leo was knowledgeable, reliable and dedicated to our condo search, we really felt like a priority.

reviews.name: Leah Mumford
reviews.text: Leo was a fantastic realtor.  He was knowledgeable and very easy to work with.  He made a stressful experience as smooth as possible! We would work with Leo again in a second to sell our next home- although I hope that's not for a while!

reviews.name: Harper Newsome
reviews.text: Leo was great to work with - professional, available, and knowledgeable about the market in our area. He made what could have been a stressful process easy and relaxing. I would highly recommend him to others!

reviews.name: Shaun Bon
reviews.text: I have just now bought my second home through Leo and have referred him to my brother (currently buying), co-worker (sold one apartment, listed another) and numerous friends who all agree that his service and attention to detail is unparalleled. In a market like Vancouver, Leo's constant communication helped me feel at ease when things were moving quickly. His firm grasp on the inner workings of the industry and his exhaustive research helped me find two amazing places that I would have never have found on my own. I will continue to use Leo in the future.

reviews.name: JAMES CHUTTER
reviews.text: Leo was amazing at both selling my place and finding me a new place. I highly recommend him and will continue to work with Leo for all my real estate needs. He is exceedingly honest and always goes the extra mile at every stage. He takes the stress out of what is usually a very stressful process.

reviews.name: Lori Massini
reviews.text: Leo helped us sell our Yaletown condo for the price we were hoping for, and it sold even more quickly than we expected! He brought in a stager to make it look amazing and put together an incredible sales package.  He also helped us find our dream home and get it within our price range. We are so happy we worked with Leo! I would recommend him without hesitation.

reviews.name: M Newsome
reviews.text: Fantastic experience working with Leo. An absolute professional. He sold our condo quickly and for more than expected. I would highly recommend!

reviews.name: Condo Clear Services Inc.
reviews.text: I have worked with Leo and can confirm that his dedication to his clients is unquestionable. If you are looking for a knowledgeable, professional realtor in the area the I recommend talking to Leo.

reviews.name: Bradley Sutherland
reviews.text: Leo was outstanding to work with.  As a first time home buyer and someone new to Vancouver, he really helped me navigate the market and decide what was best for me.  He's extremely patient, knowledgable and a great guy in general.  I would refer Leo to any friends or family looking to buy in the Vancouver market.

reviews.name: Ayron Howey
reviews.text: Leo handled the sale of our home with professionalism and care. I highly recommend him to handle yours.

reviews.name: Kathryn Pierce
reviews.text: I have worked with Leo a number of times and I would highly recommend him because he is very knowledgeable and great at explaining the real estate world.  Leo is organized and thoroughly takes care of each step.  Thanks!

reviews.name: Johnny Wu
reviews.text: Leo recently helped me sold my condo in Yaletown within a week. My third time worked with Leo. He is professional, passionate, and very easy going. Thanks for his excellent work!

reviews.name: Catherine Marson
reviews.text: Very professional.   Leo staged my home in Surrey so well that I almost decided to keep it.  We sold in a short time and I received the price I was hoping for - fair market value for both the buyer and the seller.  Thank you, Leo.

reviews.name: J W
reviews.text: Leo particularly stood out to me for his professionalism and clear communication. He also offers a staging consultant which is extremely helpful. Thanks Leo!

reviews.name: Chris Kraft
reviews.text: Leo is a rockstar realtor. I have purchased and sold 6 properties in the last 15 years and can confidently say that Leo is the best of the best in realtors. We are pretty picky people and Leo was patient and worked with us to understand exactly what we were looking for. He went the extra extra mile and actually found our home before it was listed in the market because he knew it would be a great place for us. He knows how to work with buyers, ensuring we are comfortable every step of the way and, best of all, can land a home in this crazy market. I could not recommend Leo any higher. To top it off, post-purchase, Leo has gone again above and beyond to help us with details of our new home when there is nothing in it for him personally beyond maintaining a strong reputation. If you are seriously shopping for a home, look no further than Leo.

reviews.name: Mike Wilk
reviews.text: Leo did a great job in all aspects of selling our home. He contacted stagers, photographers and other realtors so our lives were easy during the process. In the end we sold for a price we were very happy with and look forward to purchasing a new home with him.

reviews.name: Jeff Cooper
reviews.text: Leo's an absolute professional. Trustworthy, knowledgable, available and always a pleasure to deal with. Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.name: James Humphries
reviews.text:
Where to begin? Leo is simply the best in the business. I have used his services for both buying and selling and couldn't have been happier with the service we received and outcome in general. We sold within a week and for a great price. His knowledge of, and passion for all things real estate is 2nd to none and can be infectious at times! He goes above and beyond in his service, and always makes you feel number 1. From lending choice pieces for home staging to allowing us to install a car carseat in his car so that my family could view an open house.

Professional photos, home stager available, latest technology making signing etc a breeze, well mannered and socks (yes, socks) that are on-point! You can't go wrong...

reviews.name: Simon Neill
reviews.text: I hardly ever write online reviews, but had to for this guy -  I was incredibly impressed with his professionalism, but more importantly the honesty of his advice.  Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Katrina Zaitsoff
reviews.text:
Leo Wilk was recommended to me by a close friend, even with such a glowing recommendation we were still surprised by how great he was!
Being first time buyers not only did we have a million questions, but I'm sure we asked a few more than once and Leo was so patient and informative. After our first meeting he sent us home with a great first time buyers guide that he and Niki Cuthbert, a Mortgage Broker (who is also fantastic and they just make the best team!) put together, which was so incredibly helpful when everything just seemed like gibberish.
We really felt taken care of. Leo was always available, in fact, I remember talking to him a few times on Thanksgiving. He encouraged us to not be impulsive with our decision (I definitely needed that), which was very admirable since I've had a few people tell me they felt rushed by their Realtor.
I really can't say enough good things, anyone who needs a Realtor will just have to meet him and find out for themselves!

reviews.name: Bridget Higgins
reviews.text: As a newcomer to Vancouver and a first-time homebuyer, I had a lot of questions - everything from neighbourhood vibe, to relative value, to the mortgage and homebuying process - Leo assured me there were no stupid questions. Throughout the process he was extremely responsive and accessible. After viewing numerous properties together, I knew when I had found "the one," but was apprehensive to move forward when it had all happened in just over a week. Leo put absolutely zero pressure on me, providing balanced views and great insight into the nuances of the offering process - ultimately, the decision was all mine, but I felt totally confident moving forward armed with the market knowledge and expertise he had shared with me. Leo also referred me to an excellent mortgage broker, Niki Cuthbert, who made the process as smooth and painless as possible, while helping me secure an excellent rate. I would highly recommend Leo to any of my family and friends and he will be my first call for any future real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Scott S
reviews.text: Great experience working with Leo. Always available and looking out for us every step of the way!

reviews.name: Colin Cuthbert
reviews.text:
Leo is a rare gem.  He is truly honest; I mean completely candid and honest.  Leo is one of the few realtors in this city/market who won't sweep something under the rug (pun intended) in order to close a deal.  Incredibly knowledgeable and current in the marketplace he's a fantastic guy to have as a buyer's and/or seller's agent.

Moreover, I have enjoyed working with him on purchasing condos and a detached house.  He made the process quite enjoyable and when we made him go the extra mile (and felt bad doing so) he worked hard and late and did it so eagerly it seemed like he enjoyed it.

It was really great to work with a bona-fide expert but feel so comfortable and friendly the entire time.

reviews.name: Jennifer Jensen
reviews.text: Having Leo as our real estate agent was the best decision my husband and I ever made.

reviews.name: Yair Linn
reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic realtor, sold the apartment fast and at an excellent price. We would absolutely recommend him.

reviews.name: Chris Gill
reviews.text: Leo is our go-to recommendation for Vancouver Real Estate. We've worked together for years and continually receive great feedback from our clients that we send over to Leo. He's experienced & trustworthy, you can't go wrong working with him!

reviews.name: Lauren Webb
reviews.text: Wow!! I have a million great things I could say about Leo. I recently purchased my first condo through Leo and I have no idea what I would have done without his help. He truly cares for his clients and has their best interest in mind. He is not like many realtors who are eager to sell, take their commission, and move on to the next client. During our first meeting he gave me his 'Home Buyers 101' where he explained to me in detail how the process works, what to expect, and what 'red flags' to look out for. Leo helped me read through many different strata documents and advised me not to buy twice during the process where he felt it was a risky investment. He's honest and kind, and fun to shop for condos with! Leo will not let you make a mistake and is passionate about placing buyers in homes that will bring them happiness (not stress). From the beginning he was transparent about how he works and what to look out for on the market. He was patient and guided me through the process of finding a place to call home - I shopped for a condo for about 9 months and never felt rushed. Now it seems like a fun part of my week is missing when I don't get to hop into the car with Leo and check out some condos! Leo is a realtor who works with his heart, a rarity in todays marketplace. He also has great resources for home inspectors, mortgage brokers, and lawyers - all three of which I used his recommendations. Niki Cuthbert (askniki.ca) is a fabulous Mortgage Broker who is as up-front and honest as Leo. They are both good people who made me feel safe and confident enough to take such huge step in my life. I couldn't have done it without them and cannot say enough about how great they both are.

reviews.name: UMAR MUTA
reviews.text: Working with Leo was a great eye opener to how efficient top real estate agents operate, fantastic job Leo.

reviews.name: Pat Cuthbert
reviews.text: No question recommending Leo.  Bought and sold a condo and a house with him.  Seamless, no headaches, he was worked around the clock to make the deal go through.

reviews.name: Marcus Backun
reviews.text: One of Vancouver top agents. Nothing but a pleasure to work with.  10/10 service!

reviews.name: Chalaine
reviews.text: Very knowledgeable about the industry and wonderful to work with.

reviews.name: Chantal Johnson
reviews.text: Excellent!

reviews.name: Heather Arnold
reviews.text: Great!

title: Prompton Real Estate Services Inc
address: 179 Davie St #201, Vancouver, BC V6Z 2Y1, Canada

reviews.name: Michelle Lai
reviews.text: Our property has been well-managed by Prompton for several years now. We have always experienced efficient and professional service. Our new property manager, Jess Baddan, recently had super-ceded our expectations by securing good tenants in a quick turnaround and with a higher than expected rental income as well. Jess is diligent, responsive, and a clear communicator. What I appreciate most about Jess is how relational and personal she is; genuinely caring for her clients. We are feeling very blessed with Jess, through Prompton. Definitely 5 stars.

reviews.name: Anas Dali
reviews.text:
It all started when I was still in Toronto and decided to relocate to Vancouver for a new job opportunity. I started looking for an apartment that is facing north to enjoy the great views of the mountains and relatively in a new building, at the same time very close to the sky tram for an easy commuting to work.
I was lucky enough to see an add about an apartment on Prompton Real Estate Services Inc. website.
I’ve sent an email to the property manager Jenna and she responded promptly. She was very professional and informative from day one. She explained everything required to close the deal. And she was available to answer any questions and provided all supports required for easy and smooth transition from the previous tenant.
I’m extremely pleased with the apartment and none of this would happen without the great help of Jenna and her exceptional efforts and professionalism. I would absolutely recommend Prompton Real Estate Services Inc. for finding new rentals and thank you Jenna for everything.

reviews.name: Cohen L
reviews.text:
Horrible services.
We have been engaging with them for over 2 weeks trying to rent an apartment for my retired parents that they have listed on their website.

1) Agent does not respond to our messages, or when she does it takes 3-4 days.
2) Agent has cancelled THREE appointments with us minutes AFTER the scheduled time
3) Agent has called my professional references even though we have not yet been "approved" by the landlord
4) We have been providing them with several documents and every day there is something else we need to provide (ps* I am high earning executive, I own 2 properties in Vancouver and am certainly very qualified to rent a place for my folks).

Working with Prompton Vancouver has been an absolute disaster and I will encourage anyone not to engage with them - very unprofessional.

reviews.name: MJO Creative Services
reviews.text: We recently moved into a great apartment in Yaletown managed by Corry with Prompton. The process was quick and smooth, and we were even given access a day ahead of of our official move-in date! Couldn't be more satisfied.

reviews.name: Anson C
reviews.text: I've been in a Prompton-managed building for almost a year now and I've had a great experience. My leasing manager Monica G. has been very helpful with answering any questions I've had about the property and its facilities. I definitely recommend Prompton and Monica if you're looking for a new home - though I'm sure the rest of the team is just as great!

reviews.name: carmen Rose
reviews.text: I have been a tenant in a  Spectrum condo , run by Prompton Real Estate Services Inc. The quailty of the service that I have received from Sharmini who works at Prompton has been really great!  Superior actually! She responds to my questions immediately and any issues have been taken care right away. I have to say that I have been so pleased by the quality of care and attention to my questions and concerns.  Moving forward, if I choose to move, I will search out a condo that is run by Prompton Real Estate Services Inc.

reviews.name: Any Molina
reviews.text: 5-star to my experience with my property manager Jess Baddan who went above and beyond to help my husband and I from our very first contact up to now. She quickly replies to all of our questions and we could also notice how much she cares about providing accurate and detailed information to us. When we arrived to the building, we were still in mandatory quarantine due to international travel and she gently organised to take our garbage out while we would not be able to leave the apartment. We were definitely not expecting this such great help. We are more than happy with our experience.

reviews.name: Sasha C
reviews.text: Extremely disappointing experience. I would avoid them if you’re a prospective tenant. The units they post are listed with inaccurate photos of “similar” units and some are completely trashed by previous tenants. I can’t fathom why a property manager would even show a unit that hasn’t been fixed properly to a prospective tenant! To top it off, they use shady used car salesman tactics to get you to offer more money by telling you they have other competing “applications” pending.

reviews.name: Ron Torres
reviews.text: It was an awesome experience working alongside with Jeremy in the transition of a condo sale. He was very prompt in his responses, and eager to help and answer questions. He is both passionate and professional in what he does! Thanks again Jeremy!

reviews.name: Angela Katerelos
reviews.text: Jenna is amazing! I’ve had the privilege of receiving her services a few times. She is professional, hard working, diligent and incredibly responsive. She answered every one of my questions and made things as easy as possible for me. It has been an absolute pleasure to work with her and Prompton. I’m beyond happy with everything they have to offer and will definitely be using their services again in the future.

reviews.name: Luma Ayyoub
reviews.text: My husband and I moved from Ontario and we had an excellent experience working with Prompton, specifically with Megan Neumann and Jess Baddan. They are both very professional, understanding, kind, and really helpful. The process of initiating occupancy of a rental property in Surrey, BC was seamless and very straight forward due to Prompton. Megan and Jess made sure to handle all our needs and answered all of our questions when first moving in and also ongoing as we live in the condo. We enjoy the space and appreciate their continued assistance and support.

reviews.name: John Shahidi
reviews.text: Our experience with Prompton, (& Monica particularly) was resoundingly positive. From clear, consistent, & timely responses / information prior to tenancy, outstanding support during tenancy, and a collaborative / friendly relationship during / after. I HIGHLY recommend them! Happy tenants = happy owners :)

reviews.name: Bilal Khan
reviews.text: I just absolutely love the Prompton team and their services. I was a tenant in the past and used their services again recently. Very professional and friendly team. I highly recommend everyone using their services in finding  your new home.

reviews.name: Kit Brown-Watts
reviews.text: Very responsive and caring management team, extremely supportive for any concerns, and helpful for problem solving. Great work!

reviews.name: Icy Relox
reviews.text: Wow. I was dreading the move but I need more room for my son. But Im so glad I did. Thanks to Jeremy for being prompt and profesional. Everything was done without a hitch. Thank you so much!

reviews.name: Joshua Liberman
reviews.text: We highly recommend Megan and the whole Prompton team for all your property management needs.  Excellent communication, always ready to help, and a pleasure to work with!

reviews.name: rahul tomar
reviews.text:
We had a great experience dealing with our Property Manager at Prompton, Jess Baddan. Myself & My wife are new to BC, Jess helped us find just the right apartment with in our budget. she has been very responsive towards all our requests, as well helped us fix any minor issues we had during our move in this new apartment. I would recommend her to my friends if anyone is looking to find a new place to live.

Regards,
Rahul Tomar

reviews.name: Tyler Wilkie
reviews.text: I highly recommend renting property through Prompton. The property managers are professional, personable and...prompt. Not only were they clear and informative about the suite I was moving into, but they genuinely cared that it was right for me. I would definitely recommend them to a family member and thus I would to you as well.

reviews.name: Sepi Motamedi
reviews.text: We've had the privilege of having Corry Buchanan as our property manager for the last year, and we cannot express enough how wonderful it's been to work with her. She is professional, communicative, and responsive. Whenever we've had issues with the unit, she's been quick to provide support and solutions. She's so easy to work with, and she makes getting things fixed a painless process. We look forward to working with her for many years to come.

reviews.name: Gerald Epp
reviews.text:
My wife and I rented a condo unit in Surrey from Prompton, where we stayed almost 3 years. We were very pleased with the experience. Prior to our renting, they were very helpful, responsive and reasonable with all of the questions we had. Throughout our tenancy, whenever issues came up in our unit, Prompton responded promptly with a fix and even advice. When we adopted our second dog, Prompton was very supportive in getting this allowed by the suite owner.
I would recommend Prompton to others who are looking for professional and experienced service as they rent.

reviews.name: TH
reviews.text:
I have had a few encounters now with Property Managers from Prompton, all of which have been positive except for the most recent one. As a prospective tenant searching for a rental, I came across a unit on Craigslist that I was very interested in. Within the first 24 hrs of the posting, I emailed both the Craigslist email address, as well as the Property Manager who was named on the posting, Corry Buchanan.  The following day, I received an email back from Corry. We went back and forth a couple times trying to arrange a time that worked for both of us. Once she proposed a time that worked for both of us, I agreed and confirmed with her. I took time off work and arrived on the day of the viewing. She was nowhere to be found. 3 phone calls, 1 voicemail, and 1 email later, she was completely unreachable. I waited an hour for her with no response, so I left without seeing the unit. Hours later that same evening, she emailed me back and apologized for not having confirmed the time with the current tenant, and forgetting to tell me that. In her attempt to appease, she tried to arrange a 2:00 viewing on a Tuesday after a long weekend, which negated the entire issue we had discussed in scheduling the initial viewing. Very frustrated, I emailed back asking for a later time. She never responded. And regardless, the posting got removed very shortly after.
I am so disappointed with, not only the original miscommunication, but the lack of response and carelessness that was exhibited afterwards. It was an incredible display of unprofessionalism and I hope that other Property Managers are held accountable to a much higher level than this one.

reviews.name: Christina Bobby
reviews.text: This company has been managing my building  since I moved in 2017. They are always prompt and timely in the replies to my requests. Always have things fixed as soon as I request them to be fixed. The superstars on the team are Meagan and Jenna, they are both indispensable to the company. I would recommend this property management company to anyone. Also straight up heads up to my main man Jason at Strata Pro. Always doing the fix ups 🤟

reviews.name: Nick Kwok
reviews.text:
Prompton has been very good so far. The rental is very clean and holds extremely good value over other rentals we were considering (pets/insuite laundry/transit). Our property manager Jenna has also been exceptional.
She has consistently replied to our emails in a day and has been quick to resolve any issues that have popped up. Overall, I would definitely recommend Prompton in finding your next rental.

reviews.name: Pamela D. B.
reviews.text: I was very happy to have Monica G as my property manager. She was extremely helpful and professional. If I had any questions or concerns she would address them right away and follow up to make sure matters were resolved. During a difficult time for me when I had to move, Monica was very kind and guided me through the process which I very much needed since I was overwhelmed and stressed. Thank you for making my overall experience a graceful one.

reviews.name: A. Z.
reviews.text: The service is quite sub par for a company that rents out concord buildings. You can tell the employees don’t enjoy the work. Particularly said no pets but apartment is trashed and damaged by pets. Before moving out, they will charge their tenants any fees possible. Ended up pissing off tenants as well. Yet the charges go to them not to owner. Therefore both tenants and owner be aware.

reviews.name: umesh surywanshi
reviews.text:
I have shifted my apartment during Pandemic time. My old apartment was directly with owner and this was the first time I have used the Prompton's services. I must say - They have been responsive, professional, caring, and accommodating to me.
Jenna is our property manager. Jenna has done a great job representing Prompton. She is very efficient and professional in helping us. I faced water leakage issue in my apartment on the first day itself but she immediately arranged plumber and get that fixed. We are very satisfied with her service and would have no problem recommend her to anyone. One extra star definitely for Jenna !!

reviews.name: Moin Ahmed
reviews.text: Prompton was managing the rental management from the beginning of my stay & I must say they are very professional & swift in solving problems in the suite time to time in the last 2 years. Megan was very helpful with the initial communication & handing out the suite for us & Jenna has been wonderful with her quick reply every time & helping us with a quick solution by sending the trades to fix issues in the unit. Our move out was without any hassle in the middle of the pandemic & special thanks goes to Jenna! Thanks for all the help!

reviews.name: Joe Adra
reviews.text:
It was very easy to communicate with Monica. She was very professional and responsive.

Application process was most definitely not a hassle. It was all done through Liv.Rent .

Had a simple issue with the kitchen and she right away dealt with the issue. - can't complain!

I would most definitely recommend this team to assist you with finding the right suite!

Cheers,

reviews.name: tinghung chan
reviews.text: I moved to Concord Garden in July,2020.  With the assistance and magic arrangement of Ms.Monica Geyser from Prompton Real Estate, the move was extremely smooth and without a hitch.  I want to express my appreciation and feeling to Ms. Monica.  She did a fantastic job.  I found her to be very professional,courteous, helpful,caring,responsible  and efficient.  Again, my compliments to Monica.

reviews.name: Mama's Kitchen
reviews.text: Non responsive, arrogant and high headed staff especially Jess Baddan. Get in touch only if you have sufficient time and effort to spare. In case you are lucky enough to receive the response, the emails  reecived are casual/ authoritative and irritating. They would blast upon if you dare to call them. They dictate terms terms and treat tenants as if they are begging / taking favours from them. In case you decide to take a property in Concord Paciifc get in touch with landlords directly. I am sure they would treat you better

reviews.name: Vivian Wu
reviews.text: I've had the pleasure to work with Monica, Emily, and Ting-Yi at Prompton. Everyone is super helpful and friendly. The professionalism that this team offers surpasses anything I've experienced before. Thank you for helping me acquire my ideal home.

reviews.name: Jennilyn Caloz
reviews.text: I love how they respond quickly to my emails when I need something. They always send me all the notices from the strata which keeps me updated aside from reading it in the elevator area. Jenna sends out help quickly when I need help with something in regards to repairs in the apartment. So far, I’m pretty happy.

reviews.name: Kieran Greening
reviews.text: I recently had to move from Alberta to B.C. for work and had to deal with finding an apartment long distance, also during pandemic restrictions. Jenna Ritchie from Prompton Real Estate Services was extremely helpful with doing the virtual walk throughs and completing the necessary forms while I was in a different province. Very professional, quick with responses and answered any questions you may have. Jenna definitely helped facilitate an easier moving experience for me during a stressful time. Thank you!

reviews.name: Debaloke Roy
reviews.text: I've been renting from Prompton for the last 8 years. Been through a few different property managers who were and are all excellent. Jenna Ritchie has been extremely helpful and proactive in all matters and Jason from strata pro is also excellent! Highly recommended using Prompton.

reviews.name: Charles Ungerleider
reviews.text: When our fridge failed late on a Thursday afternoon, Prompton supplied two bar fridges to protect our food from spoiling, engaged a friendly and extremely competent tradesperson to inspect the failed refrigerator, and, when the inspection determined the fridge unrepairable, arranged for a new refrigerator that arrived by early Tuesday morning. Thank you, Prompton.

reviews.name: Karishma Kumar
reviews.text: Prompton has given us a great experience with our first home in Vancouver. A special shoutout to Jenna who has been very empathetic, professional and efficient - she sure does put the 'prompt' in Prompton! Thank you for everything, Jenna. We love our home and are enjoying our stay.

reviews.name: Justin Chiu
reviews.text: Have been using Prompton for a few years now and they've always found me excellent tenants. Currently, with all the Covid19 precautions, Jenna has handled all the Fire & Building inspections without a glitch! I highly recommend their services whether you're looking for a tenant or for a place to rent. It's been a great experience so far!

reviews.name: Jessica Snow
reviews.text:
I have been living in an apartment rented through Prompton for about 9 months, and have really appreciated how helpful and easy to deal with they’ve been for us.

They really came through for us when we needed to find a place on short notice back in January, and even went out of their way to find a second unit for us to apply for when the owners of the first unit went with different renters.

The few small maintenance issues we’ve had while living here were dealt with as soon as they were mentioned, and our contact with Prompton has been very kind and professional the whole time.

reviews.name: Luke Macnelis
reviews.text: I was dealing with Monica Geyser and found that she was always super helpful and very quick to respond to any questions I asked. She has been a great help for me as i am very new to Canada and the ways that the rental markets work here. Highly recommend dealing with Monica on behalf of Prompting Real Estates.

reviews.name: Jacqueline Chan
reviews.text: Monica Geyser is my property manager.  She is very professional, knowledgeable, and polite.  She makes sure to stay connected and I really appreciate her speedy replies.  She went out of her way to help when I needed them.  I highly recommend her to anyone!

reviews.name: Wayne Chang
reviews.text: Through the years in using Prompton services, their client communication and service delivery has progressively improved. As long as their service level commitment remains consistent for every property manager, I believe they would be worth 5 stars. Jenna has done a great job representing Prompton.

reviews.name: Anne Lee
reviews.text: I have been receiving a top-notch customer service from Monica Geyser at Prompton Real Estate Services Inc. She works 24/7 for customers and has been so responsive, intelligent, and professional. I can confidently say that their service is best of all in Vancouver. Highly recommend this company to everyone!

reviews.name: Maycon Nunes
reviews.text: During the period we had the Prompton's services we didn't have any kind of problems. They always quickly tried to solve our requests as soon as possible. Also, we don't have any negative feedbacks and we are so thankful by their support which Megan was our point of contact there. We really recommend their services.

reviews.name: Akiko Kurata
reviews.text: Monica Senior Property Manager is very supportive before I moved into their building. And after moving in, she and Emily Leasing Administrator   are taking very good care of us. I truly appreciate her professional and responsive work!

reviews.name: Dilraj Sandhu
reviews.text: I have been associated with Prompton Real Estate for almost a year now and I must say Jenna has been very helpful, responsive and co-operative. She helped me find my first apartment here in Surrey and when I had to move to a new place she found me an apartment that suited my needs. She has always been quick to address any issues that I had in relation to my units and I would recommend her and Prompton to new renters whole heartedly.

reviews.name: Tony Lo
reviews.text: Had a great experience with Prompton as a tenant of one of their properties that they manage in Surrey. Meghan and Jenna have always dealt with my concerns and questions efficiently and professionally...thank you!

reviews.name: David Li
reviews.text: We had a wonderful experience renting from Monica G. at Prompton. Even with complications due to COVID19, Monica made the renting process efficient, simple and seamless, allowing us to move in promptly without any issues. She is continuing to deliver excellent client communication and service throughout the term of our lease and has set new high standards for our expectations of property management.

reviews.name: Nirvana Z
reviews.text: Extremely helpful Manager. Her name is Monica and she is both professional and experienced! As she follows up my problems closely and tries her best to solve it diligently. Very satisfied!

reviews.name: Rhys
reviews.text: Prompton has been quick and responsive to any questions when we had had initially applied. Megan Neumann has been fantastic to work with and very trustworthy. She has worked with us through two properties that Prompton manages and every time she is attentive and makes sure we are comfortable. Absolutely recommend Prompton and Megan.

reviews.name: Elizabeth MacKinnon
reviews.text: I have rented from Prompton for more than 7 years and have always had amazing service, particularly from property manager Megan Neumann. Their team is quick to respond professionally to questions or concerns, and their attention to detail has made moving in and residing in my building a breeze. I would highly recommend renting from Prompton!

reviews.name: Lorraine Sanchez
reviews.text: Throughout the pandemic, Monica was great to deal with. She made renting an apartment as smooth and safe as possible. I appreciate her informative responses and how quickly she was able to answer my queries.

reviews.name: B.E.J.
reviews.text:
After moving to British Columbia and my living arrangements having fell through, Megan helped me view numerous apartments within my budget and desired location. Fast response, friendly service and informative made this experience easy and stress free.

10/10 would ask Megan for help again.

reviews.name: Cindy Perez
reviews.text:
I finish the contract on December 31, 2020. I leave perfect the studio that I rented for almost 2 years. The property manager which Her name is Sharmini for all the 2 years, She was very rude with me and She never ever attended me on time. She thinks She is the owner of the hole word and always wants to give orders. Because of that, I was afraid that when She was going to review the apartment on the delivery day, She was going to look for any pretext in order to get money from my rent deposit. And I was right, She did not find anything wrong on the apartment because it was perfect. But now She got a new pretext because the smell. Because of that, I do not recommend Prompton specially with Sharmini. And finally I am still waiting for my deposit! Sharmini told me that She hasn't give it because we are still on "holidays" and today is January 8th.
Finally I rented the studio in $2,000.00cad and in order not to go away, they told me that the new price was going to be $1,600.00cad. You can imagine I feel assaulted. For 2 years they could give me the monthly rent on $1,600.00 instead $2,000.00cad. They are only looking only for Clients that they can charge them more money.

reviews.name: Kevin C
reviews.text: I have been using Prompton service for my properties for years. Monica Geyser is my property manager. She and her team deliver excellent service and communicate effectively. I would rate 5 stars!

reviews.name: 伊帆
reviews.text: I had an amazing experience renting from Prompton. Monica Geyser is a very professional and experienced property manager. She made the renting process simple and efficient. Highly recommend her to everyone.

reviews.name: Dustyn Kovacs
reviews.text: I have nothing but praise to give to Prompton. Almost a year into our rental and they have treated us respectfully and professionally whilst responding rapidly to any of our questions or concerns. Even in the midst of a pandemic, Prompton has made this one of the easiest living situations I have ever enjoyed!

reviews.name: Jeff Belak
reviews.text: For Vancouver, our best rental experience yet has been with Prompton Real Estate Services, and we've been managed by several other large property management companies. A clear process and responsive, professional property management equals a pleasant rental experience. Prompton is one of the best out there.

reviews.name: Connie Chien
reviews.text: Jenna Ritchie is our property manager.  She was very efficient and professional in helping us find a tenant and deal with the insurance claims.  We are very satisfied with her service and would have no problem recommend her to anyone.

reviews.name: Cam Perkin
reviews.text:
Jenna from Prompton Real Estate has been fantastic landlord. She's addressed any concerns I've had quickly and she's attended mandatory unit inspections when I haven't been able to.

I would highly recommend the service.

reviews.name: gus igb
reviews.text: Was in a suite managed by Prompton in Surrey for 4 years. The staff I dealt with were consistently professional. I swear my particular property manager was basically some kind of wizard - every issue was resolved promptly (#seewhatIdidthere?) and, on several occasions, acted as the perfect barrier between myself and a particularly pesky landlord. 10/10 would use again.

reviews.name: Mehrdad Ghafouri
reviews.text:
I've had a wonderful experience with my Prompton leasing manager and her team. They have been responsive, professional, caring, and accommodating to me. I've used Megan's help on two separate occasions for my rental needs and she has gone above and beyond to help me secure my suites. She and Jess have treated me like family and I do recommend their services.

I had used Prompton in 2019 when I secured my rental in Surrey. And used them again for my new suite in 2020. This year I needed a place with short notice and Megan found a place for me in less than two weeks and helped me in planning my move during the pandemic lock-down.

As I've mentioned above, I've nothing but good things to say about Megan, Jess, and Prompton.

reviews.name: Allan G
reviews.text: Prompton is an outstanding property manager. throughout my 5 year tenancy, I had zero worries about any maintenance that needed to be done. Communication with individuals at Prompton could have been hire however it was still an overall great experience!

reviews.name: Joseph Chuwa
reviews.text:
For anyone new in the Lower Mainland, I suggest you get Prompton Real Estates. They ae very great on advising, showing places, explaining contracts and stuff that can be hard for new comers.
I have had a very good response from them  when I moved out here from Edmonton.
Definitely recommend them for anyone who is new to BC.

reviews.name: Jinja
reviews.text: Monica has been tremendously helpful with my first experience as a tenant. Prompt and quick responses to inquiries! Thank you!

reviews.name: Jinfang Li
reviews.text: Nice and brand new apartment. The appliances are new and of great quality. My property manager Monica G. is patient and very helpful especially during the COVID. Concierge is professional.

reviews.name: Cynthia Delmundo
reviews.text: Monica Gayser is the Property Managet who assisted us in processing our application with Prompton. She is very professional in dealing with us. She’s very organized, prompt in replying to our emails and very clear in explaining the details of the process. We can call and ask our questions to some things we’re not sure of. We’re so thankful for Monica for doing a very good job and highly recommends her. Thank you also for Prompton for this opportunity given to us.

reviews.name: Richard Yeh
reviews.text: We had amazing experience renting from Cory at Prompton. The property manager was really nice to me  showed up on time and did her best to prepare the apartment for us.  When we had problems with the building, the property manager always tried her best to help us to deal with building manager.  I do recommend Prompton for your property management and rent services.

reviews.name: Yaseen Dakouri
reviews.text: Prompton has a wonderful team, they are so friendly. We received a high quality and professional service from Monica Geyser ( the senior property manager) and her team.

reviews.name: Ajitesh Dixit
reviews.text: spoken to Jess onetime she was so rude not willing to help. I have applied couple of time and due to covid I had to change my plans. I explained her my situation and I can't understand why was yelling at me just for inquiries I have asked overtime.

reviews.name: REBALANCE CO
reviews.text: Monica is very professional and responsive.  I'm so thankful I was able to get an apartment with prompton real estate.  Beautiful place !!

reviews.name: Raj
reviews.text: no response or very late responses from Property Managers. No way to directly contact them either. My property manager prefers emails and every time I call the office I'm transferred to VM. The Service is not very good.

reviews.name: Subbalakshmi A.P
reviews.text:
I have used Prompton's services as a renter and found them very professional and responsible. The way Megan took care of the apartment and me as renter was very professional and she was very warm.

I knew then I would use their services when I buy an apartment of my own.

Now Jenna is taking care of my apartment and I have never been in any stress as she is always on top of everything. I trust her to make the right decision on my behalf.

All the staff I have dealt with till now since the start have been very polite and understanding towards my needs as a client.

All I would like to say is a big "Thank you" and keep it up.

Subbalakshmi (RCIC)

reviews.name: Victor Yu
reviews.text: It has been a pleasure to work with Jenna, Property Manager of Prompton. Everything has been taken cared. Good long term tenant.

reviews.name: Rosie R. Stone
reviews.text: I lived in one of the properties they managed for over a year. They were always really responsive, professional and fixed any issues I encountered quickly. Lynne was my property manager and she always went above and beyond to help me out.

reviews.name: Sara Barbot
reviews.text: Monica Geyser is a friendly and efficient property manager who took the time to answer all my questions before and after the move in. I can always count on her to get back to me quickly and she's constantly trying her best to help.

reviews.name: Amie Monahan
reviews.text:
