On multiple occasions while trying to get in contact with multiple different agents it has taken me up to 5 attempts to actually get a hold of the agent I was trying to get a hold of at the time. If this happened with 1 agent it wouldn't be anything to really note but FOUR different agents all the same - anywhere from 3 to 5 attempts to connect over multiple weeks- through direct emails, through messaging sent through apps they advertise on, and by phone?! Why?

Not to mention that the properties listed as "pet friendly" ALL have a weight limitation on the pets... WEIGHT.... (I know most landlords in BC do... Which is highly bias) But there is NO room for consideration with Prompton even if the pet is quiet, socialized, exceptionally well behaved, senior (low energy), trained, and the owners are responsible.

reviews.name: Hana Ehsani
reviews.text: Great Property management company, Monica and her team are great to work with; professional and prompt with responding to messages and dealing with any issues that arises.

reviews.name: Kyle Aszalos
reviews.text: Moving from Ontario during a pandemic seemed like a challenge for finding a place to live, but when I inquired about a unit with Prompton I received a quick response and I was approved for the unit within a few hours. The property manager Jenna has been very good to work with and was able to help get Internet/Cable connected before I arrived so I would not have to wait 2 weeks.  Thanks for the help!

reviews.name: Eileen Scorse
reviews.text: This is my third rental through Prompton and I highly recommend them. Everyone is very professional and helpful - my last move had to be done very quickly and Jenna went above and beyond!

reviews.name: ALEJANDRO BEREZOWSKY O
reviews.text: For several years Prompton has been managing the administration of my apartments and thanks to their excellent work I can focus on other matters with the confidence that PROMPTON is always attentive that my properties are in perfect condition and that my tenants are happy to live there . VERY RECOMMENDED!!

reviews.name: Jadi Jad
reviews.text:
This management had made everything easy for us during the pandamic.
There was no need for any physical contact to get our brand new rental unit.
Special thanks to Monica Geyser, the senior property Manager.
In thier properties you can find people from all backgrounds, which means they treat everyone equally
And these units they advertise for, look way better in reality.
Whether you are looking to buy, rent or manage your property look no furthure.

reviews.name: rcortens
reviews.text: I know Prompton represents the owner not the tenant but you would think they would want a happy tenant. For me I have got 0 support for my issues with Rancho and there threatened violations of Illegal entry and targeted video surveillance at W1.

reviews.name: jasmine lattimore
reviews.text: Really pleased with Monica as a property manager. She's very efficient! Most importantly, I don't feel like I'm getting scolded if I have to reach out to her for anything.

reviews.name: Abdullah Abdulqader
reviews.text:
I move a lot and have dealt with various real estate services. Prompton Real Estate Services was by far the worst when it comes to customer service. My partner and I drove all the way to Richmond 3233 Ketcheson Road and waited 15 minutes for Sharlene only to receive an email that she can't make it to the appointment. She also asked if we could reschedule the appointment to the next day and we accepted but then got no response confirming the rescheduled appointment.
Absolute disrespect for customer's time and extremely poor communication. Rest assured I will leave this bad review everywhere I could and hope others won't have their time wasted like you wasted ours.

reviews.name: Brad Wilde
reviews.text:
Jenna and the team at Prompton had such a big task getting our place ready for move-in as the last tenants left the apartment in a state of disrepair. Not only did Jenna dispatch cleaner right away, they did a great job and Jenna checked in on us every step of the way. There were a few things that were broken when we moved in but all issues were fixed right away, often the same day.

Thank you, Jenna for the colossal effort in getting our place to feel like home.

reviews.name: Jack Xue
reviews.text: I rented an apartment under Prompton's management, it was a delightful experience with agent Monica Geyser. With fast response and superior professionism, I think Promoton is the best choice.

reviews.name: Mohamed El-Alem
reviews.text: Professional and responsive service. Monica Geyser was always helpful and responding to all of our inquiries promptly.

reviews.name: ERIC C
reviews.text: Very bad, dishonest company. I would not recommend using them if they were the last property manament company in town. They do not respond when contacted, pass off work to one another without the proper information needed to complete the job with any level of basic competency. Very disheartening when you are putting them in charge of millions of dollars in assets. They will lie to your face when you confront them and pass the buck to somebody else.

reviews.name: Warren Nell
reviews.text: Very professional they have been my property manager for 4 years and have never faltered

reviews.name: Chris Ross
reviews.text: Monica Geyser managed the sub-penthouse we rented in Yaletown. As tenants, we found her to be very professional and incredibly responsive to our requests.

reviews.name: GSC
reviews.text: I've been a tenant of prompton Surrey for a little over 4 years now, I've rented two units from them and have had nothing but great experiences. Megan (property manager) has been very responsive and helpful when I need answers, even with simple questions.

reviews.name: Jeff Smith
reviews.text:
There was a lease rental available on Powell Street. A two story top floor unit with a large rooftop deck. I liked it. I supplied my references, a published business interview and 12 months of bank statements. I was told to have my. Tenancy insurance and proof that this was current and paid for before they would do my initial walk through.
On that same day the building manager at the address I would be moving into was pointed out to me and I was told by to be sure to get on the right side of him.
I had been looking for some time and with this decision made I turned down the other potential homes.
Packed and ready the movers spent the previous day packing the moving truck.
9 a.m. we arrive at the new place I am greeted with a gruff " you better get a move on! "
I was then told I only had the elevator for two hours until 11. ( An impossible task to unload a 2 bedroom home off the truck in the elevator and unloaded into a suite on the 8th floor )
So I asked when was the next time I could block some time?
Two weeks from that day and it would still be for only two hours.
So I asked if I could then unload into the lobby and we would then have to good it up the stairs.
No, the stairwell use was prohibited !
So I told the movers to put back in the truck what they had started to move.
This man was not helpful in any way. His manner was confrontation and uncompromsing. I clearly had no choice but to walk away.
Prompton was aware of these conditions and chose not to advise me accordingly. I was told by the Prompton real estate representative that the move in was my problem to deal with not theirs.
This has cost me overtime with the movers and truck, costs associated with now moving to a storage facility and causing me to be now in a homeless situation. I had planned a short move in town and not a move where access and organisation for stored clothes medications etc were needed.
Moving is stressful anyway. This made it all the more it upsetting. I received no apology, I did however receive a veiled threat to take me to the rental board for breaking the lease. No offer to compensate my losses and continued expenses.
Prompton Property Management has only one interest and that is to get your money, at whatever cost. Zero compassion to a situation which could have potentially been avoided had they been honest and forthcoming with the demands of a very unusual moving ii n policy.
Oh, and I had to e-transfer $100 to the building manager to have him be at the front door to let me in.
I would warn against using this property management company. Their dismissive and uncaring attitude has caused me great upset and loss of.money and home.

reviews.name: Merel Schuurman Hess
reviews.text: Very professional from start to finish. Amazing service.

reviews.name: Noam McGregor
reviews.text: Prompton makes renting easy for tenants.

reviews.name: Rosa Ho
reviews.text: Thank you Jenna for all of your help and professionalism!

reviews.name: Kira Sea
reviews.text:
Terrible service. Please don't do any property management with them. They have been my family's property manager and they have always been very slow and unprofessional. Last week, they contacted me saying my insurance policy have changed suddenly and is effective immediately. First of all, Prompton should have inform us right away since Prompton got the notification from the insurance days earlier. Suddenly, Im scrambling to find new insurance and I asked them to verify some information for my new insurance and they never even answered back even though they know this is an urgent matter. I sent emails multiple times but they never answered me back.

Also, I am trying to cancel their service but they made it really hard to cancel it. If you don't cancel it by 30 days of your renewal date, they will charge 3 MONTHES of management fee. They don't notify you when you are due for renewal so I have to ask them and hopefully, they will email me back this time.

reviews.name: Ralph Kamm
reviews.text: Been with Prompton for over 10 years now. Excellent in every way, can’t be happier with Megan, Andrew and Jenna!

reviews.name: Kiana Sousae
reviews.text: Really easy to work with and always responds in a timely matter!

reviews.name: Jce Yi
reviews.text: This is a company I really want to recommend! I moved here from Calgary 4 years ago, and as soon as I came to Vancouver, I rented an apartment from Prompton and lived there for a year and a half. They have a professional customer service more than any other company I've ever had. When I asked for something, they always acted quickly, and completely. Anyway, what I want to say is that this is a reliable company!

reviews.name: Aime Bent
reviews.text: I've worked at Prompton for over 2 years and I absolutely love this team!!

reviews.name: Alter Oxey
reviews.text: We had amazing experience renting from Inga Darii via Prompton. She was amazingly nice to us, always showed up on time and did her best to prepare the apartment for us. Prompton is now our #1 choice for landlord when it comes to renting.

reviews.name: Cynthia Lu
reviews.text: Super super super bad experience with this agency. No matter you are tenant or unit owners, please avoid it. There GM is pretty bad in customer service, no one take care about you once you signed contract, they only care about is how to earn more money from you. Every mistake is your mistake, this company never make any mistakes. Be careful everyone.

reviews.name: Naveen R
reviews.text: They have really good properties. Service is also too good.

reviews.name: Stepan Bondarenko
reviews.text: Great service, communication was pretty quick and on time.

reviews.name: Muhammad Muneeb Ejaz
reviews.text: Bad experience really terrible service. Don't go near this place.

reviews.name: 李博
reviews.text: Monica G is very good

reviews.name: Paul McAfee
reviews.text: Professional and always helpful.  I have been renting through Prompton for over a year and everyone is always so helpful.  Megan is the GOLD STANDARD when it comes to Customer Service.

reviews.name: Anton Seliverstov
reviews.text: I am looking to move to Vancouver and have been in contact with the agency for almost a month. I was ready to book my flights to take a look at a couple of suites when Aime Bent just stopped replying to my messages after hers "are you just flying in for the viewing?" Just asking to be professional with your prospective clients or simply say NO?

reviews.name: Daniel Zettler
reviews.text: I was recently a resident of Ontario and to a surprise was presented with an opportunity to move to BC. For days I was stressed about finding a new home and one that was in my budget to boot. I spent hours on the phone trying to source a reliable leasing agent with no luck what so ever. I then came across a building online and completely fell in love with it. I contacted Megan at the Prompton office immediately as I was very excited to have found my new potential home. Megan took the time to listen to my current situation, wants, and needs. We made an appointment to look at the property of my choice along with some other openings she had available. In the end, the building I desired most had no available units for rent, Megan could see the sadness this brought. I was about to settle on one of the other buildings that I was keeping on the back burner, but to my surprise Megan called me the next day with great excitement that there was a unit available in the building I really wanted to live in! My interactions with Megan were very professional, follow up was immediate, she shared her passion, picked up on my thoughts and delivered 110% I have to give this company a 5 star rating! Anyone moving into any area where Prompton services they come highly recommended from me!

reviews.name: Ik
reviews.text:
Very poor management
Totally not recommended this management company
My unit has no heater and no hot water in snowing winter time
Their manager MG, she was telling me to go to Costco to buy heater and once it’s fixed, go back and returned it”
What kind of manager said that kind of stuff???
Every year ,, they raise the rent
But very poor response , every time, we have problems
One of my electronics plug is not working since I moved , more that years,
They never fixed.
Not recommend at all
All stuff here are very rude

reviews.name: Mike M
reviews.text: I recently moved in the Alexandra. Jennene is my new property manager. I found her to be friendly, considerate and very able. She answered all my questions, provided me with every document swiftly and even a kind reminder when I failed to fill send everything back as instructed. My unit was clean and ready for my move in and she was very thorough with me during the inspection to ensure I was covered fully. I highly recommend her and Prompton. I wish I had their services for my own properties out East.

reviews.name: hello hi
reviews.text:
Been trying to get an appointment to view a 3 bedroom place at W1 but it's apparently a no because of the ages of who will be sharing rooms. Who makes up these stupid policies? Do i need to draw out a sleeping plan to hand in? Trying to rent a place is made into such a big deal. Chill.

What's next? Someone physically wanting to watch us sleep?

reviews.name: Suraj Singh
reviews.text: Worst service

reviews.name: Samantha W
reviews.text: I have condo that I was personally managing and things got out of hand as it was too much to handle on top of my full time job . Candice from Prompton has helped me with the process from a - z , and I didn't have to stress and worry. She got me a high rent that covered my entire mortgage + strata fees.

reviews.name: Grace M
reviews.text: Had a viewing appointment scheduled. Made a 3 hour drive from Kelowna, only to be notified 2 hours before that the apartment was already rented. Im assuming they were well aware the apartment was already rented well before our viewing time. Complete waste of time, and completely disorganized. I'll count this as a blessing in disguise because if this was my first impression I can only imagine the nightmare of having a years lease with them.

reviews.name: Vincent Strgar
reviews.text: Easy to work with, friendly, professional and helpful. They answer all questions. I worked with JT and JD; they set me up with a nice suite. I recommend them highly.

reviews.name: Stephanie Cavaghan
reviews.text:
Prompton bought the building which my partner and I have lived in for three years about a year ago. The service and treatment that we have received from them has been extremely unprofessional.

Last summer, our deck rotted and was a danger to us and the tenant who lived below. We requested that it be repaired and it took over two months for it to be completely repaired. The repair man showed up unannounced, he did a poor job and left a mess in our apartment.

We sent a letter to Prompton suggesting that due to the inconvenience and not being able to use our deck during the summer our rent should be reduced. We also included pictures of the mess left by the repairman and the poor job he did repairing the deck. We provided a them with a suggestion of what we thought was a fair reduction of our rent for the two months (based on the square footage of the deck in regards to the rest of the apartment and our rent). The response we received from Prompton said exactly this,

"Just so you know that in measuring space, you never include the balcony size so your suite is the size stated and the balcony is extra.  Typically if the balcony is unusable it is about $50 a month taken off. Thank you"

There was no apology for the inconvenience or the poor service. The response was not addressed to us specifically or signed off on.  It was simply rude.

There have been numerous people in our building that have received similar service. I would not recommend renting from a building managed by Prompton.

reviews.name: Jimmy Singh
reviews.text:
Me & My Wife are extremely happy with Prompton as they have qualified Property Mangers who are very happy to serve you. My Property Manager Jennene Thomas is one of the best that i have ever met, she is extremely friendly, always on time and takes a lot of time explaining each and everything in details so that we are not left in doubt. I would like to recommend Jennene Thomas to everyone who is looking for real estate services @ Prompton. I am giving her 5 stars because she totally deserves it.
Jimmy

reviews.name: Sarah Pouttu
reviews.text: I am proud to be part of such a professional and highly trained sales team at Prompton! I am confident that clients will be impressed by the quality of service they receive when they visit the office or kiosk location.

reviews.name: Brenda T.
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I recently moved into a home managed by Prompton Real Estate Services with Jennene Thomas as our lease representative. From day 1, it has been an incredibly positive experience. Professionalism from the showing through to the application process and any home repair deficiencies that have come up along the way since moving in. In addition to always being professional, Jennene stands above the rest because she genuinely cares. If you are at all familiar with the Vancouver rental market, landlords have their pick of the litter which leads to some very stressful waiting periods as you await the outcome of their tenant selection. During this time, Jennene kept us apprised of our application status, what stage it was in and when we could look forward to a decision. After securing the home, she was accommodating with key hand over and home inspection and very responsive to any maintenance requests we’ve had. Communication appears nearly instant at times and it is obvious there is a high level of client care from her and her colleagues. The reality is a single landlord doesn’t have the strength of a full property management firm such as Prompton. I need my door fixed, they have a door specialist. I need my caulking fixed, they have a caulking specialist. It truly services us the way we should be through the residential tenancy act, which greatly protects the tenant. As much as we are held accountable for being good tenants, having a team like Prompton keeps the landlord accountable too. Rents are high in this city, no denying it. Get what you deserve as a tenant and work with Prompton!

reviews.name: Matthew Lynch
reviews.text:
Update: while I had a good experience with Prompton in the past, my experience with  them in December 2017 was horrible. The Prompton agent would not show me a suite in anything by work hours. To accommodate, I left work early, and due to unforeseen delays was 15 mins late and she did not want to wait. She said it was Prompton's policy to only work till 4:45 and 5:00 was too late. While I understand everyone has a schedule, when your job is to show places to rent to people who can actually afford it, that means you need to be flexible and offer evenings and weekends. 9-4:45 means the only clients you are attracting are those who are rich or not working at all.  Bravo Prompton for clearly showing your stripes.  I suggest those who are considering renting with them proceed with caution.

December 2013 Review: My wife and I moved from Calgary to Vancouver on January 1st, and of all the rental places and property managers that we dealt with, Prompton was BY FAR the most professional and organized.  Our agent was Megan Neumann and she was fantastic.  Punctual, transparent, warm energy, offered alternatives and then after move in, was there to address any issues...even 4 weeks later.  It looks like others have had a bad experience here which was surprising.  Maybe it is Megan that delivered such a great experience.    We love our new home and are totally enjoying this awesome city that feels like home more than Calgary ever did.

Feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss.

reviews.name: Sal Rismani
reviews.text: Unprofessional and rude by all means! I waited for half an hour for an appoitment that was set 5 days in advance. No one showed up, agent's direct line went on VM. Called their office, spoke with 3 different girls, none of which knew were Judy (the agent) is. At first they told me she is looking for parking, then they said she has claimed to have met you. After finally meeting the agent (35 minutes after) she refused to show me the unit because I was upset that she was late for half an hour... Such an unprofessional agent...

reviews.name: Handy Chap
reviews.text: Solid company with outstanding customer service.   We work with them as a trade with great Prompton team members including Megan Neumann and Tessa Polman-Tuin - they are constantly asking us to take care of their residents and make them happy.

reviews.name: Peter Ho
reviews.text:
I found their representatives very unreliable and rude.  My agent Jennene Thomas cannot be reached by phone.  She has an outdate voicemail, and cancels on her appointment just 1-2 hour before the scheduled appointment.  I came from out-of province just to view the property.

She did not even bother calling to cancel the appointment.  Overall their agents are very difficult to get through, and I am not going to be dealing with them both now and in the future.

If they cannot even be reliable about showing up on time for viewing a property, what does it say about the service they offer to their actual tenants?  I guess my mistake is I didn't read the reviews from other people who have dealt with this company, as it looks like the same problem is happening to many other people, and they are not making any effort to do anything about this.

reviews.name: uday jain
reviews.text: Doesn't deserve a even 1 star as well. Worst experience.

reviews.name: Sammy Liu
reviews.text:
(Translated by Google) I have lived here for a year. I rented two bedrooms and two bathrooms. My rental economy Lynne is very responsible. She solves any problems quickly. The manager of this building is also good. Often what is missing is needed and everything is quickly resolved throughout the apartment. The management is very good and the furniture is complete. Living here is really convenient and comfortable, safe and secure. I highly recommend that you come here for long or short stays.

I am very satisfied with the manager Lynee and Ahmed. They are very responsible for tenants as well as the unit. I live here for one year and I love my unit. Due to my own personal reasons I need to move to other places, otherwise I will rent longer than one year.

(Original)
我在这里住了一年了 租的两室两卫 我的租房经济 Lynne 非常负责任 有任何问题 她都很快解决 公寓的 这栋楼的manager也不错 经常缺什么需要什么都很快解决 整个公寓管理非常好  家具齐全 住在这里真的是交通便利又舒服，安全又放心。我非常建议大家来这里长住或短住。

I am very satisfied with the manager Lynee and Ahmed. They are very responsible for tenants as well as the unit. I live here for one year and I love my unit. Due to my own personal reasons I need to move to other places, otherwise I will rent longer than one year.

reviews.name: Frankhil Contreras
reviews.text:
(Translated by Google) Our experience with Sharmini Due is that it conveys warmth and confidence. She was always willing to clarify each of our doubts, support us in the rental process, even accessing an additional visit before signing the contract. Later, when there were repairs to be made, I immediately took steps to solve it. We absolutely recommend Sharmini Due as a Landlord, when searching for a new home (in our case 11000 km away from our old house).

(Original)
Nuestra experiencia con Sharmini Due es que transmite calidez y confianza. Siempre estuvo dispuesta a aclarar cada una de nuestras dudas, apoyarnos en el proceso de renta accediendo incluso a una visita adicional antes de firmar el contrato En forma posterior cuando hubo reparaciones que realizar, inmediatamente efectúo las gestiones para solucionarlo. Absolutamente recomendamos a Sharmini Due como Landlord, durante la búsqueda de un nuevo hogar (en nuestro caso a 11000 km  distancia de nuestra antigua casa).
